* We take full ownership of marketplace projects in close collaboration with our clients. We’re a close-knit in-house team who love working together. We don’t outsource core functions.


If you are looking for a fast-growing company that ticks all these boxes and more, working at CobbleWeb may be the opportunity you’ve been looking for.  

**Job requirements*** Strong fundamentals in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, HTML, and CSS.
* Expert-level knowledge of and proven experience working with JS libraries such as React, Redux for state management, React Query, etc.
* Expert-level knowledge of and proven experience working with component-based architecture (React components, Storybook, Design system, Lerna, NPM/Yarn).
* ***Experience building design systems - creating reusable components used by other developers.***
* Proficient with modern testing frameworks (e.g. Cypress).
* Strong debugging and testing skills.
* Strong communication skills in English.
* Experience in backend development with Node.js (Express or Nestjs) would be a great bonus.
* Experience in designing UX/UI journeys would be a great bonus.

  

**Our tech stack:*** ReactJS and React Native.
* NextJs.
* Bootstrap.
* NestJS.
* MongoDB, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch.
* AWS.
* Figma.
* Storybook.
* Lerna / Bit.dev.
* Strapi Headless CMS.

  

Read more about our tech stack https://www.cobbleweb.co.uk/marketplace-technology-stack/  

  

**THIS JOB IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR AGENCIES.**

title: Technical Writer
description:
Are you looking for a place where you can be an important part of creating new ways of working, think outside the box and in the meantime working in a company with high tech cool products?
  
We are the global leader in eye tracking, a position we earned through our passion for technology and our ambition to create tech for a better future. Our journey began over 20 years ago when we delivered the world’s first plug-and-play eye tracker. Since then, we’ve been on a mission to build technology that understands human attention and intent. Our diverse client roster includes carmakers, science labs, elite sports teams, UX design agencies, and many more. Our audience is fascinating, and our growth potential is huge!
  
Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, Tobii covers the global market with offices in Belgium, China, Germany, Ireland, Japan, Switzerland, Romania, Taiwan, the UK, and the US.
  
If you want to work with an enabling technology with the potential to help solve some of the world’s greatest challenges, then we might be the company for you.
  
Are you our next Tobiian?
  
﻿This role is a fixed-term one (1) year contract.
  
As our Technical Writer, you will create written material, provide both online and offline user manuals, tutorials & blog posts. You will develop a comprehensive and user-friendly documentation that translates complicated information into easily understood content that users can understand. You will amaze our customer and provide them a coherent and flawless customer onboarding and experience.
  
  

**A week could look like this:**  

Write, edit, publish, and distribute new and existing content, and work closely with various departments (Customer Services, Marketing, Product Management, and R&D) to participate in and understand projects and their specific requirements
  
Gather information from Subject Matter Experts (SME) to develop, organize, and write user manuals, tutorials, technical specifications, API manuals, and metrics reports
  
Work with product development teams (Product Managers, Product Owners, Customer Services) to plan and prioritize work related to product releases
  
Develop content in different forms for maximum usability with varying product tones, yet with a consistent and cohesive brand voice
  
Build-up, adhere to, and uphold style guides, company-specific documentation standards, and terminology requirements
  
Review existing publications and recommend revisions, changes, and/or enhancements in approach, scope, and format
  
Drive the technical review process
  
**Additional:** Create digital content (graphics, videos, voice-over demos, animations)
  
  

**To succeed in this role, we would love you to have:**  

2-4 years of industry experience as an effective technical writer
  
Bachelor’s degree in a relevant technical field
  
Experience writing documentation and procedural materials for multiple audiences
  
Experience working with engineering to improve user experience: design, UI, and help refine content and create visuals and diagrams for technical support content
  
Experience using XML authoring tools to create documentation
  
Firm understanding of the systems development life cycle (SDLC)
  
A native of English language or superior written and verbal communication skills
  
Proven ability to quickly learn and understand complex topics
  
Proven ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously, with an eye for prioritization, including attention to detail and organization
  
  

**Not a hard requirement, but a good merit if you have:**  

Experience using Canva or Adobe Creative Cloud
  
Experience as an Instructional designer
  
Experience in software development
  
  

Sounds like you?
  
Let us know about your background, experiences and where you’re heading. Due to GDPR, we will only review those applications directed to our career page - so please submit your resume or LinkedIn profile through the apply button!
  
Being a Tobiian
  
We believe in diversity and equal opportunity. At Tobii we want you to be yourself and we welcome applicants from all walks of life. It’s all about passion, innovation and making things real. Each day is different here at Tobii, hopefully, this is something that motivates you! We want you to be comfortable at work, as long as you feel that's who you want to be. We're looking for a good personal fit and believe that diversity is the spice of life!

title: Design Lead
description:
**Design Lead Job Opportunity**


Are you a visionary design leader with a passion for creating seamless and consistent user experiences? We are seeking a **Design Lead** to spearhead our design efforts across key customer-facing platforms, including our admin panel, website, and order flow. This role reports to the Chief Commercial Officer and is crucial in ensuring that our design and UX elements provide a cohesive and exceptional user experience.

**What You'll Be Doing:**

* **Design Leadership**: Oversee and guide the design and user experience across our customer-facing platforms, ensuring a unified and high-quality experience for our users.
* **Team Leadership**: Lead, mentor, and develop a team of UX/UI designers, fostering a culture of creativity, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
* **Consistency Guardian**: Act as the guardian of design consistency across our platforms, maintaining a single line of design and UX elements in all customer interfaces.
* **Collaboration**: Work closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to integrate design seamlessly into the development process, ensuring that design and UX are central to all product decisions.
* **Design System Management**: Develop and maintain a comprehensive design system that serves as the foundation for all our digital products, ensuring that it is adhered to across all projects.
* **User-Centered Design**: Champion a user-centered design approach, conducting user research, usability testing, and gathering feedback to inform and refine design decisions.
* **Innovation & Trends**: Stay on top of design trends and innovations, ensuring our design practices remain cutting-edge and our products continue to delight users.
* **Quality Assurance**: Oversee the implementation of design elements, ensuring that the final product aligns with the intended design vision and user experience goals.

**Success Metrics**  

* **User Satisfaction:** Increase user satisfaction scores such as NPS and cSAT and reduce friction across customer journeys.
* **Design Consistency:** Achieve and maintain a unified design across all platforms.
* **Efficiency:** Reduce design-related development issues by integrating design early in the process.
* **Adoption:** Drive the successful adoption of the design system across all relevant teams.

**What We’re Looking For:**

* **Cultural Fit:** We value co-creation, dedication, simplicity and care for our colleagues and our customers. Our ideal candidate will share these values and contribute to a positive and inclusive work culture.
* **Experience**: Extensive experience in design leadership, with a strong portfolio demonstrating your ability to create and oversee cohesive design experiences across multiple digital touchpoints.
* **Team Leadership**: Proven experience in leading and developing design teams, with a focus on fostering talent, prioritizing and driving collaboration.
* **Strategic Vision**: A strategic thinker who can align design goals with business objectives and drive the overall design direction across customer-facing platforms.
* **Communication Skills**: Exceptional communication abilities, capable of articulating design concepts and strategies to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* **Analytical Mindset**: Strong analytical skills, with the ability to use data and user feedback to inform design decisions and measure the impact of design on user experience.
* **Problem-Solving**: A solution-oriented approach, with the ability to identify and address design challenges proactively.
* **Technical Proficiency**: A solid understanding of design tools, UX principles, and front-end technologies, with the ability to work closely with development teams to bring designs to life.
* **English Proficiency**: Strong English skills, enabling you to effectively communicate your ideas and lead discussions across teams.
* **Attention to Detail**: A keen eye for detail, ensuring that every design element contributes to a cohesive and polished final product.

**Bonus Points For:**

* **Cross-Platform Experience**: Experience leading design across various platforms, including web, mobile, and desktop applications.
* **Design System Expertise**: Proven experience in creating and maintaining design systems that have been successfully implemented across multiple products.
* **Accessibility Leadership:** Experience championing and integrating accessibility best practices, ensuring products meet or exceed accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 Level AA).
* **Industry Knowledge**: Familiarity with hosting, domains, or online services, with an understanding of the unique design challenges in these industries.

**Ready to Lead Our Design Vision?**


If this opportunity excites you, send us your portfolio and CV or anything else that showcases your qualifications. We’ll respond within 7 days with the next steps. If selected, you’ll receive an assignment, followed by a first-round interview. A second interview will follow if needed, and if all goes well, you’ll receive an offer to join our team!

title: Product Manager
description:
We are looking for a talented and creative **Product Manager** to join our team. This role places you at the heart of our product innovation process, shaping the direction and success of our AI solutions. The successful candidate will work closely with cross-functional teams to align our product vision with customer needs and market opportunities.

#### **Company description**


Hypertype is an AI-powered text based communication platform that finds the most relevant information and writes smarter customer emails & live chats, using real-time company data.


305 billion emails sent and received every single day. We live in an information overload era, with ever-changing customer scenarios to process and answer. Customer facing roles still spend 20-30 mins just to find the right answers and draft high quality email, connecting the dots from millions of data sitting inside their company. Our vision is to make the smartest experience for customer communications with data.


Only a single digit % of SMEs has adopted AI in their customer facing teams. We have over 200 paying companies including Mynt, Yazen, Remote and many more.


Our customers proudly recognize us for delivering the "highest quality answers in the market... outsmarting Gemini, Fin, Microsoft Copilot etc". —a testament to our unwavering commitment to excellence and precision in every interaction.


Join us on our mission to build the world’s smartest and most accurate AI brain across customer domains and beyond. If you're driven and ready to contribute to something groundbreaking, this is your chance to be part of a mission that is setting new industry standards.

#### **The Position**


As a Product Manager, you will help shape the strategy, vision and objectives, working closely with your Design, Engineering peers in the product trio. You connect the dots from vision all the way down to the deliverables, making sure effort is spent on the most valuable things. This requires effective communication and leadership skills, as success is dependent on the continuous collaboration, ensuring Hyperbrain delivers exceptional user experiences. Your focus will be on conducting UX research, gathering insights, and collaborating with teams to create intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that make complex, AI-driven data accessible.

  

* Shape a compelling vision and strategy for your part of our product, based on a deep understanding of the industry, competitive landscape, macro and technology trends
* Define and align meaningful objectives and key results and own the roadmap for your domain
* Formulate hypotheses that help validate what experiences to design, implement, run and evaluate product experiments to reach your objectives
* Ensure that valuable features, enhancements, and bug fixes are prioritized and shipped, making thoughtful product decisions along the way, and sharing insights with the rest of the company
* Lead UX research efforts, gathering and analyzing feedback to ensure Hyperbrain’s interfaces are intuitive, user-friendly, and make complex data accessible to users.
* Collaborate with the founders to prioritize product features and development pipelines to form product roadmap based on user insights, business goals, and market opportunities.
* Work closely with Engineers to create seamless interfaces for Hyperbrain’s AI-driven solutions, improving customer experiences and interactions.
* Assist the founders in delivering compelling sales pitches and help close deals and partnerships by showcasing the value of Hyperbrain’s AI-powered solutions.
* Communicate findings and recommendations to founders and stakeholders to influence product direction and business strategy.
* Stay informed on AI trends, emerging technologies, and UX/UI best practices to continuously refine and enhance Hyperbrain’s offering.
* Exploring visual design in Figma and translating it into high-fidelity, web-native experiences.

#### **Qualifications**

* 4+ years experience as a Product Manager, with a strong focus on UX research (NB: not project management).
* Experience working with SaaS products, AI focus is a plus.
* Able to communicate your vision for the product in a compelling way, engaging your team, stakeholders to align, contribute and deliver the best outcomes
* Ability to collaborate effectively with engineering teams to deliver interfaces that make AI-driven data accessible and useful.
* Experience supporting sales efforts, including delivering product expertise during pitches and helping to close sales deals and partnerships.
* Strong communication and analytical skills to external and internal stakeholders, with the ability to translate user data into actionable recommendations.
* A team player with a creative and proactive approach, adapted to problem-solving and prioritisation in a fast-paced startup environment.
* Are analytical, innovative, with a strong business acumen and driven to deliver user value and business results.

##### **Bonus Qualifications:**

* Strong understanding of AI/ML technologies and how they can be applied to enhance user experiences and automate complex processes.
* Familiarity with user testing, analytics, and prototyping tools e.g. Figma.


#### **Why Join Us**

* Opportunity to be part in a generative AI startup before the next AI inflection point.
* A role and position that enables you to be part of building and shaping the way how customer information is shared and communicated.
* Take part of our journey as we grow to be at the forefront to solve AI challenges and work towards building Hyperbrain AI for every domain for a decision-making AI.
* Competitive salary, equity options, and opportunities for growth in a rapidly scaling AI startup.


If you're excited about working at the intersection of UX research, AI, and product development while supporting high-impact sales and business initiatives, apply today and help us shape the future with Hyperbrain!

title: Design Lead (UI/UX)
description:
**Resourced** is a fast-growing FashionTech startup supporting modern fashion brands find and manage production. We help brands such as Axel Arigato, Stronger, Veja, Icebug, Chimi, Eytys, Ralph Lauren, H&M (to name a few). We´re digitally transforming one of the largest, fastest-moving industries in the world. By joining Resourced you will work in a truly global setting – we employ and work with clients on all continents.


We are looking for an **talented Design Lead** with a skillset spanning **graphical design**, **interaction design** and **user experience** who can continue our work on designing the most compelling PLM system (web application) in the industry.


We go to great lengths to **build a product users truly love to use – a product that have great, well-thought-out UX that looks awesome!** We pay big attention to details and expect close-to-perfect result – but still ensure never to get stuck and keep a good pace moving forward. You will work closely with the co-founders, in particular the CTO/Product Owner, and utilize our strong relationship with, and insights into, our customers and users. We run a simple process using Figma, starting with rough wireframes, gradually enhancing them iteratively using internal and external feedback as needed until we’ve reached a “pixel perfect” result.


To succeed as a designer at Resourced we believe you will need to **fully immerse yourself with the problems** we’re trying to solve and **relentlessly seek the most beautiful solution** – often using an outside-the-box perspective!

**The job**
-----------

* Turn wireframes and ideas into pixel-perfect designs, ready for our software devs to develop
* Provide clear specifications, in particular regarding interactivity
* Efficiently explore and find creative solutions to UI/UX challenges
* Work closely with the CTO/Product Owner and the rest of the team
* Take ownership and help lead/drive our product development efforts; from idea, exploration and analysis to handover

**Requirements**
----------------

* A strong curiosity of how to build products and services that customers will embrace
* Excellent graphic design skills – fluent in Figma, Adobe Illustrator and other design tools
* Excellent and fluent in interface design, allowing you to work seamlessly with UI/UX design
* Attention to detail and strong understanding of web application UX
* Communicate clearly without any hinders
* Proven track record of designing successful products – in particular complex web applications (which you undertake with ease)

**Nice-to-haves**
-----------------

* Frontend web development experience/skills
* A degree (Bachelor’s or Master’s) in interaction design, industrial design, or equivalent
* Background in the fashion industry

*We’re all about finding a person who can deliver the right results – not the right resume!*

**What we offer**
-----------------


A unique opportunity to join an early-stage startup and a small team, become highly influential on what we build, and grow your career alongside the company!

* Competitive salary and compensation package
* Work with a team who believes in having fun while working!
* Work for users who really cares about beauty in their digital tools!
* And of course, the hardware and environment you desire in order to do your best work possible!


Start date: ASAP  

Work extent: Full time  

Location: Gothenburg (Gårda), on-site


Contact: Carl-Johan Blomqvist, CTO/Product Owner (Co-founder) @ carl-johan@resourced.com / 0706458618

title: Senior UX/UI designer
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en UX/UI designer och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.
   

  

**Vår ambitioner**
 Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Iterativt skapa och testa prototyper, mockups och wireframes för ny funktionalitet
* Utveckla interaktions- och designriktlinjer
* Delta i teamets sprintplanering och andra agila planeringsmöten
* Vardaglig kontakt med interna- och externa användare för att få djupare förståelse av deras behov och arbetssätt
* Kontinuerlig avstämning av arbetet med teamet för att bygga upp gemensam kunskap och kultur


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Högskole-/universitetsutbildad inom mjukvaruutveckling där UX/UI-design har ingått, omfattande minst 120/180 hp, alternativt yrkeshögskola 400 YH-poäng, där UX/UI-design har varit huvudinriktning


**Kompetens och Erfarenhet:**
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet i rollen som UX/UI-designer
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med användarintervjuer och användbarhetstestning
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med responsiva webbaserade applikationer
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet under de senaste 4 åren av att ha arbetat med tillgänglighet för webbplatser och/eller applikationer enligt riktlinjerna/standard WCAG 2.1 eller WCAG 2.0


**Meriterande**
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med frontend utveckling i HTML, CSS eller JavaScript
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med plattformen Microsoft Azure
* Tidigare arbetslivserfarenhet (minst 2 projekt/uppdrag) från att ha arbetat med att ta fram och införa en UX-strategi för en organisation/företag med syftet att öka mognadsgraden inom aktuellt området
* Tidigare arbetslivserfarenhet (minst ett projekt/uppdrag) från att ha arbetat med att ta fram minst ett designsystem där bl.a. bibliotek för styling och färdiga komponenter ingått


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 20-09-2024
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.
   

  

 Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: Glad & ödmjuk UX/UI designer
description:
**This is Everone ✌🏼**
 Vi är ett bolag för duktiga och ambitiösa systemutvecklare och designers. Våra kollegor arbetar i
 **backend** 
 ,
 **fullstack** 
 ,
 **frontend** 
 och med
 **design** 
 . Med moderna plattformar och ny teknik bygger vi digitala lösningar och innovationer för framtiden hos våra kunder.
   

  

 Vi förstår att du är grym på att koda och designa, därför är det exakt just det du ska lägga din dyrbara tid på. Fokusera på det medans vi tar ansvar för att förhandla ditt timpris och dina förmåner, sköta administrationen och hjälpa dig utvecklas i karriären.
   

  

 Du gör det du trivs med och är bäst på! Vi sköter resten! Bra va!?
   

  

**Som en del av Everone**
* Har du 100% koll på vad som faktureras för ditt arbete
* Är du aldrig bunden - inga begränsande konkurrensklausuler eller annat trams (freedom first)
* Stöttar vi dig med struktur, administration, försäljning och coaching
* Blir du en del av vårt fantastiska community av drivna utvecklare och designers
* Har du en lönemodell med ett pottsystem där du själv styr över vad dina uppdragsintäkter går till
* Styr du själv hur ditt förmånspaket ska utformas


**Nu söker vi dig 🦸🏼**
 Till en av våra kunder söker vi dig som jobbar med
 **UX/UI** 
 . Kanske har du också erfarenhet av frontendutveckling men det är inget krav. Uppdraget innebär att övergripande stödja vår kunds utvecklingsavdelning inom området
 **UX/UI-design** 
 . Uppdraget kan även komma att involvera prototypframtagning samt en del frontend utveckling.
   

  

**Vad ska du göra?**
 Rollen som UX/UI-designer i projekt och förvaltningen kommer bl.a. omfatta följande arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Iterativt skapa och testa prototyper, mockups och wireframes för ny funktionalitet
* Utveckla interaktions- och designriktlinjer
* Delta i teamets sprintplanering och andra agila planeringsmöten
* Vardaglig kontakt med interna- och externa användare för att få djupare förståelse av deras behov och arbetssätt
* Kontinuerlig avstämning av arbetet med teamet för att bygga upp gemensam kunskap och kultur


**Du har**
* Högskole-/universitetsutbildad inom mjukvaruutveckling där UX/UI-design har ingått, omfattande minst 120/180 hp, alternativt yrkeshögskola 400 YH-poäng, där UX/UI-design har varit huvudinriktning
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet i rollen som UX/UI-designer
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med användarintervjuer och användbarhetstestning
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med responsiva webbaserade applikationer
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet under de senaste 4 åren av att ha arbetat med tillgänglighet för webbplatser och/eller applikationer enligt riktlinjerna/standard WCAG 2.1 eller WCAG 2.0


**Meriterande**
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med frontend utveckling i HTML, CSS eller JavaScript
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från att ha arbetat med plattformen Microsoft Azure
* Tidigare arbetslivserfarenhet (minst 2 projekt/uppdrag) från att ha arbetat med att ta fram och införa en UX-strategi för en organisation/företag
* Tidigare arbetslivserfarenhet (minst ett projekt/uppdrag) från att ha arbetat med att ta fram minst ett designsystem där bl.a. bibliotek för styling och färdiga komponenter ingått


**Vi tror också att du**
* Har goda analys- och kommunikationsförmågor
* Arbetar självständigt och målinriktat men innehar även förmåga att arbeta i grupp
* Arbetar strukturerat och dokumenterande genom hela arbetsprocessen
* Är flexibel och anpassningsbar efter arbetsbelastning
* Är ödmjuk och ha lätt för att skapa förtroende
* Har en pragmatisk inställning till utveckling och förstår att det ibland krävs fler eller färre steg för att nå målet
* Att du kommunicerar flytande i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska


**Placering 🏠**
 Placering hos vår kund i Stockholm med möjlighet till hybrid remote. Vi ser att du är bosatt någonstans kring Stockholm, Uppsala eller strax norr därtill.

title: Senior UI/UX Designer with Brand Skills
description:
Do you want to wake up every day and create world-class designs?
   

  

 Do you get a thrill from creating stunning UI/UX solutions and building brands that make people say, "Wow!"? If so, we need YOU!
   

  

 Who are we?
   

  

 Webicient is a design and tech agency with 8 happy employees internationally. Our work involves solving creative and technical challenges with a focus on digitalization for companies with high ambitions.
   

  

 Our projects range from graphic design and web design to web development and system development. Through our smooth SaaS platform, our customers can order various services within the creative and technical fields, both at fixed prices and on a subscription basis.
   

  

 In a world of digitalization, our vision is to always make it easy for our customers to move forward. Our goal is to always be at the forefront of technology and ensure that we deliver the most modern solutions to our customers.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Brand Designer with creative height AND UI/UX experience!
   

  

 Your Responsibilities:
   

  

* Create brands that make clients communicate in the best way
* Create user-centered design solutions that are aesthetically pleasing and functional.
* Work with both new and existing clients to understand their needs and create customized design solutions.
* Develop wireframes, prototypes, and user interfaces with a focus on user experience.
* Create illustrations and graphic elements that support our digital products.
* Work closely with the development team to ensure that the design is implemented according to specifications.
* Stay ahead of the curve by keeping up with the latest design trends, techniques, and tools.


 Who you should be as a person...
   

  

* Creative and driven, with a love for pixel-perfect designs.
* Enjoy working towards measurable goals and strive to exceed them.
* Proactive and structured in your approach.
* Excellent in communication, both spoken and written, in English
* Have good analytical skills and a deep understanding of user behavior.
* Comfortable working in a culture where open feedback and suggestions for improvement are encouraged.
* Stand by your decisions and can argue for your design choices.
* Ready to embrace the future of design and even dabble with AI to take your work to the next level!


 Our requirements for you to come closer to the role...
   

  

* Fluent communication in English, both spoken and written
* Expert level knowledge of Figma
* At least 6 years of experience in UI/UX design.
* Experience working on projects with creative height.
* Creative agency experience or Freelancing experience
* Experience creating both wireframes and high-fidelity mockups.
* Experience in branding and the ability to design brand books and guidelines.


 It would be awesome if you had but not a must...
   

  

* Knowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus but not required.
* Experience working with animations and micro-interactions.
* Experience with AI tools for creative usage- Experience leading design projects from start to finish.
* Interest and knowledge in typography and color theory.
* Experience working in agile teams.
* Experience designing e-books and presentations.
* Experience designing campaigns for social media and ads.
* Experience designing prototypes for merch and packaging.
* Experience designing email templates


 What you can expect from us...
   

  

* A workplace that listens to your ideas and embraces open feedback.
* A team that’s more like a family—diverse, talented, and ready to support you.
* Opportunities to grow, learn, and lead projects that will challenge and excite you.
* All the tools you need to work efficiently and love what you do every day.


 Do you feel like the RIGHT person for the job? APPLY!
   

  

 To apply, fill out the form below. Criteras to apply:
   

  

* A Figma file that you are proud of to showcase your design structure.
* Portfolio of previous work
* Approval of performing a small design test

title: Design Lead
description:
**Design Lead Job Opportunity**
 Are you a visionary design leader with a passion for creating seamless and consistent user experiences? We are seeking a
 **Design Lead** 
 to spearhead our design efforts across key customer-facing platforms, including our admin panel, website, and order flow. This role reports to the Chief Commercial Officer and is crucial in ensuring that our design and UX elements provide a cohesive and exceptional user experience.
   

  

**What You'll Be Doing:**
* Design Leadership: Oversee and guide the design and user experience across our customer-facing platforms, ensuring a unified and high-quality experience for our users.
* Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and develop a team of UX/UI designers, fostering a culture of creativity, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
* Consistency Guardian: Act as the guardian of design consistency across our platforms, maintaining a single line of design and UX elements in all customer interfaces.
* Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to integrate design seamlessly into the development process, ensuring that design and UX are central to all product decisions.
* Design System Management: Develop and maintain a comprehensive design system that serves as the foundation for all our digital products, ensuring that it is adhered to across all projects.
* User-Centered Design: Champion a user-centered design approach, conducting user research, usability testing, and gathering feedback to inform and refine design decisions.
* Innovation & Trends: Stay on top of design trends and innovations, ensuring our design practices remain cutting-edge and our products continue to delight users.
* Quality Assurance: Oversee the implementation of design elements, ensuring that the final product aligns with the intended design vision and user experience goals.


**Success Metrics**
* User Satisfaction: Increase user satisfaction scores such as NPS and cSAT and reduce friction across customer journeys.
* Design Consistency: Achieve and maintain a unified design across all platforms.
* Efficiency: Reduce design-related development issues by integrating design early in the process.
* Adoption: Drive the successful adoption of the design system across all relevant teams.


**What We’re Looking For:**
* Cultural Fit: We value co-creation, dedication, simplicity and care for our colleagues and our customers. Our ideal candidate will share these values and contribute to a positive and inclusive work culture.
* Experience: Extensive experience in design leadership, with a strong portfolio demonstrating your ability to create and oversee cohesive design experiences across multiple digital touchpoints.
* Team Leadership: Proven experience in leading and developing design teams, with a focus on fostering talent, prioritizing and driving collaboration.
* Strategic Vision: A strategic thinker who can align design goals with business objectives and drive the overall design direction across customer-facing platforms.
* Communication Skills: Exceptional communication abilities, capable of articulating design concepts and strategies to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Analytical Mindset: Strong analytical skills, with the ability to use data and user feedback to inform design decisions and measure the impact of design on user experience.
* Problem-Solving: A solution-oriented approach, with the ability to identify and address design challenges proactively.
* Technical Proficiency: A solid understanding of design tools, UX principles, and front-end technologies, with the ability to work closely with development teams to bring designs to life.
* English Proficiency: Strong English skills, enabling you to effectively communicate your ideas and lead discussions across teams.
* Attention to Detail: A keen eye for detail, ensuring that every design element contributes to a cohesive and polished final product.


**Bonus Points For:**
* Cross-Platform Experience: Experience leading design across various platforms, including web, mobile, and desktop applications.
* Design System Expertise: Proven experience in creating and maintaining design systems that have been successfully implemented across multiple products.
* Accessibility Leadership: Experience championing and integrating accessibility best practices, ensuring products meet or exceed accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 Level AA).
* Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with hosting, domains, or online services, with an understanding of the unique design challenges in these industries.


**Ready to Lead Our Design Vision?**
 If this opportunity excites you, send us your portfolio and CV or anything else that showcases your qualifications. We’ll respond within 7 days with the next steps. If selected, you’ll receive an assignment, followed by a first-round interview. A second interview will follow if needed, and if all goes well, you’ll receive an offer to join our team!

title: Product Manager
description:
We are looking for a talented and creative
 **Product Manager** 
 to join our team. This role places you at the heart of our product innovation process, shaping the direction and success of our AI solutions. The successful candidate will work closely with cross-functional teams to align our product vision with customer needs and market opportunities.
   

  

**Company Description**
 Hypertype is an AI-powered text based communication platform that finds the most relevant information and writes smarter customer emails & live chats, using real-time company data.
   

  

 305 billion emails sent and received every single day. We live in an information overload era, with ever-changing customer scenarios to process and answer. Customer facing roles still spend 20-30 mins just to find the right answers and draft high quality email, connecting the dots from millions of data sitting inside their company. Our vision is to make the smartest experience for customer communications with data.
   

  

 Only a single digit % of SMEs has adopted AI in their customer facing teams. We have over 200 paying companies including Mynt, Yazen, Remote and many more.
   

  

 Our customers proudly recognize us for delivering the "highest quality answers in the market... outsmarting Gemini, Fin, Microsoft Copilot etc". —a testament to our unwavering commitment to excellence and precision in every interaction.
   

  

 Join us on our mission to build the world’s smartest and most accurate AI brain across customer domains and beyond. If you're driven and ready to contribute to something groundbreaking, this is your chance to be part of a mission that is setting new industry standards.
   

  

 The Position
   

  

 As a Product Manager, you will help shape the strategy, vision and objectives, working closely with your Design, Engineering peers in the product trio. You connect the dots from vision all the way down to the deliverables, making sure effort is spent on the most valuable things. This requires effective communication and leadership skills, as success is dependent on the continuous collaboration, ensuring Hyperbrain delivers exceptional user experiences. Your focus will be on conducting UX research, gathering insights, and collaborating with teams to create intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that make complex, AI-driven data accessible.
   

  

* Shape a compelling vision and strategy for your part of our product, based on a deep understanding of the industry, competitive landscape, macro and technology trends
* Define and align meaningful objectives and key results and own the roadmap for your domain
* Formulate hypotheses that help validate what experiences to design, implement, run and evaluate product experiments to reach your objectives
* Ensure that valuable features, enhancements, and bug fixes are prioritized and shipped, making thoughtful product decisions along the way, and sharing insights with the rest of the company
* Lead UX research efforts, gathering and analyzing feedback to ensure Hyperbrain’s interfaces are intuitive, user-friendly, and make complex data accessible to users.
* Collaborate with the founders to prioritize product features and development pipelines to form product roadmap based on user insights, business goals, and market opportunities.
* Work closely with Engineers to create seamless interfaces for Hyperbrain’s AI-driven solutions, improving customer experiences and interactions.
* Assist the founders in delivering compelling sales pitches and help close deals and partnerships by showcasing the value of Hyperbrain’s AI-powered solutions.
* Communicate findings and recommendations to founders and stakeholders to influence product direction and business strategy.
* Stay informed on AI trends, emerging technologies, and UX/UI best practices to continuously refine and enhance Hyperbrain’s offering.
* Exploring visual design in Figma and translating it into high-fidelity, web-native experiences.


**Qualifications**
* 4+ years experience as a Product Manager, with a strong focus on UX research (NB: not project management).
* Experience working with SaaS products, AI focus is a plus.
* Able to communicate your vision for the product in a compelling way, engaging your team, stakeholders to align, contribute and deliver the best outcomes
* Ability to collaborate effectively with engineering teams to deliver interfaces that make AI-driven data accessible and useful.
* Experience supporting sales efforts, including delivering product expertise during pitches and helping to close sales deals and partnerships.
* Strong communication and analytical skills to external and internal stakeholders, with the ability to translate user data into actionable recommendations.
* A team player with a creative and proactive approach, adapted to problem-solving and prioritisation in a fast-paced startup environment.
* Are analytical, innovative, with a strong business acumen and driven to deliver user value and business results.


**Bonus Qualifications:**
* Strong understanding of AI/ML technologies and how they can be applied to enhance user experiences and automate complex processes.
* Familiarity with user testing, analytics, and prototyping tools e.g. Figma.


**Why Join Us**
* Opportunity to be part in a generative AI startup before the next AI inflection point.
* A role and position that enables you to be part of building and shaping the way how customer information is shared and communicated.
* Take part of our journey as we grow to be at the forefront to solve AI challenges and work towards building Hyperbrain AI for every domain for a decision-making AI.
* Competitive salary, equity options, and opportunities for growth in a rapidly scaling AI startup.


 If you're excited about working at the intersection of UX research, AI, and product development while supporting high-impact sales and business initiatives, apply today and help us shape the future with Hyperbrain!

title: Product Owner
description:
**Product Owner, Online Services**
 At the Electrolux Group, a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home!
   

  

**All about the role:**
 CDI Experience Organization is looking for an experienced Product Owner to join the Digital Post-Purchase Product Domain – Direct to Consumer Sales / Online Services Product Area, which is responsible for enabling consumers to self-service online by creating an excellent digital post-purchase journey online.
   

  

 As a Product Owner, you will be accountable for defining and prioritizing the product backlog and ensuring that the team is working on the right things to meet business objectives. You will play a pivotal role in the global development, implementation, and enhancement of the products within the domain. You will collaborate closely with the Product Manager and cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, data and finance analysts, and key business stakeholders to define the product roadmap and drive its successful execution.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Product discovery & development:
+ Lead and/or support the product teams with the product discovery process.
+ Coordinate and plan for joint-development projects with other business areas that involve cross-functional development across several domains. Ensure that all stakeholders are aligned at each stage of the development lifecycle.


- End-to-End Ownership of the Product Area assigned

* Owner of the development backlog - planning and prioritization
* Work closely with Product, Engineering & Delivery team to ensure priorities are correctly established and followed, based on the global product roadmap and Product Domain and Product Area strategy (short and long term).
* Run sprint planning, backlog refinement and sprint reviews.
* Prepare and coordinate requirements with detailed acceptance criteria to ensure development teams get the necessary details to deliver on timelines.
* Analyze product performance to make informed decisions about what to iteratively improve.
* Communicate regularly with stakeholders to keep them informed about product progress and to gather feedback.
* Responsible for the coordination of the QA:
* Coordinate & ensure fulfillment of acceptance criteria at the end of development.


**Who you are:**
* 3-5+ years of experience in product management in digital/web products
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Proficiency in agile methodologies and product management tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence)
* Understanding of product development and design principles
* Used to collaborating with UX/UI designers, front-end developers, and marketing/commercial teams to create seamless user experiences
* Experienced on taking product decisions based on user research and usability testing for web products
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
* Bachelor’s degree in a related field (e.g. business, computer science, engineering)


**Where you'll be:**
 This is a full-time position, based at our Global Headquarters in Stockholm, where we are 60+ nationalities under the same roof and we enjoy the look and feel of the office!
   

  

**Benefits highlights:**
* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment
* Discounts on our award-winning Electrolux products and services
* Family friendly benefits
* Insurance policy plan
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path


 As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.
   

  

**Find out more on:**
 Electrolux Group: https://www.linkedin.com/company/electrolux/life/lifeatelectrolux

title: Sitevisionutvecklare
description:
Har du passion för teknologi och vill vara med och forma framtidens digitala lösningar? Vi på Skolverket är mitt i en spännande teknikomställning och söker nu en erfaren Sitevisionutvecklare som vill vara med på vår resa mot modernisering och innovation.
   

  

****Om jobbet****
 Som senior Sitevisionutvecklare blir du en central del av teamet Informera och Kommunicera. Teamet ansvarar för att utveckla och förvalta Skolverkets webbapplikationer: skolverket.se, Utbildningsguiden och Skolverkets intranät.
   

  

 Vi är mitt i en spännande teknikomställning där vi arbetar med att lyfta och modernisera våra applikationer. I detta arbete är steget från on-premises-miljöer till molnbaserade lösningar central. Här kommer du spela en nyckelroll och med din expertis kan vi ta nästa steg för att framtidssäkra våra applikationer.
   

  

 Vi är även övertygade om att artificiell intelligens (AI) kommer att spela en avgörande roll i vår framtid. Därför inkluderar vi AI i vår tekniska strategi och planerar att implementera det i flera av våra applikationer för att bidra till att forma vår framtid.
   

  

 Du kommer tillhöra en av våra enheter för utveckling och förvaltning, där du jobbar tillsammans med andra systemutvecklare, UX:are, testare, scrum masters, Objektledare IT med flera. Enheten ingår i avdelningen för verksamhetsutvecklingsstöd med ca 120 medarbetare.
   

  

 \* \* \* \* \*
   

  

 "Här får du chansen att vara med och driva en viktig förändring av en viktig verksamhet. Du blir en del av ett härligt gäng med engagerade och kunniga kollegor."
   

  

* Ann-Charlotte Djuphammar, enhetschef


 \* \* \* \* \*
   

  

 På den här sidan kan du möta några kollegor inom it och övriga Skolverket www.skolverket.se/mot-oss
   

  

 Du arbetar på vårt moderna och rymliga kontor i Solna Business Park. Du kan också ha möjlighet att arbeta upp till 50% på distans.
   

  

****Om dig****
 För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss behöver du stå för och leva upp till den statliga värdegrunden och till våra kärnvärden för medarbetarskap: förebild, tillit, ansvar, samarbete och utveckling. Läs mer på skolverket.se/jobb
   

  

**I det här jobbet ska du ha**
* relevant utbildning inom IT som eftergymnasial eller högskoleutbildning alternativt erfarenhet som Skolverket bedömer som relevant,
* minst 3 års erfarenhet av JavaScript, HTML och CSS,
* minst 5 års praktisk erfarenhet av Sitevision CMS inklusive mallar, moduler och plugins,
* Sitevisions sök och sökfunktioner,
* Sitevisions webapp-2 lösningar (React- typescript), Sitevisions Restapier,
* förståelse för och erfarenhet av responsiv webbdesign och utveckling,
* goda kunskaper av versionshanteringssystem t.ex. GIT,
* erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnbaserade lösningar och applikationsmodernisering,
* erfarenhet av att utveckla webbsidor enligt WCAG-krav,
* erfarenhet att arbeta med ärendehanteringsverktyg såsom t.ex. Jira,
* erfarenhet av agil metodik t.ex. Scrum,
* mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i både i tal och skrift.


**Det är meriterande** 
 med erfarenhet/kunskaper inom flera av följande: CI/CD – kontinuerlig integration, kontinuerlig leverans och testautomatisering. Webbsäkerhet, inklusive CSP, X-XSS-Protection och behörighetsstyrning på olika nivåer (mall, fil, sida, grupp). REST API samt applikationer med Java i backend. Andra CMS, samt arbete med Angular eller React. Förståelse för webbprestanda och SEO.
   

  

**Som person behöver du**
* vara prestigelös, initiativrik, ha en god analytisk förmåga och ha förmåga att lösa problem,
* hålla uppsatt plan för leverans, kunna arbeta strukturerat och ha en vilja att lyckas i din yrkesroll,
* vara entusiastisk över teknik och innovation och hålla dig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna inom området,
* ha ett starkt intresse för AI och hur det kan tillämpas för att skapa värde,
* ha förmåga att se detaljerna i helheten och samarbeta obehindrat inom organisationen.


****Viktigt att veta****
 Sista ansökningsdag är 18 september. Anställningen är tillsvidare och inleds med provanställning i sex månader.
   

  

 När du registrerar din ansökan får du svara på några frågor i stället för att bifoga ett personligt brev. Läs gärna igenom ansökningsformuläret och förbered dina svar innan du gör ansökan.

title: Senior SEO Specialist
description:
Hi there 👋🏼 We’re looking for new SEO Specialist to join us after summer.
 



 We believe that a workplace should be a space where everyone feels welcome, no matter their background or unique perspectives. Simply put, we want people to enjoy working with us.
 



 NoA Connect/Bluebird is a part of The North Alliance – one of Scandinavia’s largest agency networks in design, media, and marketing. At NoA we believe that we are stronger together than as standalone agencies and that collaboration is the way to growth.
 



  





 Noa Connect has three business areas - Advisory, Performance (Bluebird) and Data & Analytics. This role is within Performance. With the combined capabilities of NoA and Bluebird we will be able to provide our clients with a true end-to-end solution with everything from brand strategy to performance marketing, and everything in between.
 



  





 The SEO team
 
 operates both strategically and hands-on with SEO on some of our key projects together with a team of specialists across the different business areas (SEM, Social, SEO, and Web analytics). They also play an integral part in business development both within SEO as well as other parts of the business.
 



  





**In short this is what you will be doing** 



* Continuously improve best practices for Technical SEO by developing existing ways of working and adapting to industry change
* Making sure best practices for Technical SEO are communicated and followed throughout the whole organization
* Lead the external communication including create or quality proof materials for workshops, seminars and Bluebird news for all matters related to Technical SEO
* Set and lead processes for quality assurance within the channel, both for ongoing delivery and audits for all related to Technical SEO
* On-boarding of product specialists in how we work with Technical SEO
* Manage the client relationship throughout the entire project lifecycle, ensuring seamless execution from initiation to completion
* Work closely to our Development Lead in developing our SaaS products and automate processes
* Work closely with our UX/UI Designer to set processes and find synergies between the two, as well implement this in our deliverables
* Liaise with sister companies within the group to foster a collaborative culture
* Ensure that we have a structured on-boarding process for specialists at different level of seniority to get new hires within the product area up and running as fast as possible



  





**We’d be thrilled if you can tick a majority of the following boxes:** 



* Several years relevant SEO experience with a strong grasp of best practices
* You are client-focused with a strategic approach to resolving issues.
* You have strong understanding of the entire digital media landscape
* Established experience in SEO processes, including quality assurance and audits.
* You are up-to-date on industry trends, adapting strategies as needed.
* Experience in onboarding and training new hires effectively.
* Enjoy working in a collaborative environment, fostering strong relationships across teams and sister companies within a larger group.



  





**A few things that we’ll provide you with as an employee here:** 



* Opportunity to expand and develop your digital marketing skills while working together with the most interesting client cases and passionate co-workers
* Excellent work-life balance with flexible hours and the possibility to work remotely
* Competitive salary package with benefits
* Pension



  





**Our recruitment process** 




 No need for a personal letter or a CV-document. Just provide us with the link to your LinkedIn profile and answer a few initial questions - that's it.
 



 After that, you will get the chance to talk to someone from the team and show off your marketing skills. This interview is all about your technical skills and your team fit. Let's do this!

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Vill du utveckla morgondagens webbapplikationer, är du innovativ och gillar att lösa problem med dina kollegor? Vi söker dig som är en senior systemutvecklare med fokus på backendutveckling. Var med och bidra till skolans framtid!
   

  

****Om jobbet****
 I rollen som senior backendutvecklare blir du en del av teamet Informera och Kommunicera, som ansvarar för Skolverkets webbapplikationer såsom skolverket.se, Utbildningsguiden och Skolverkets intranät.
   

  

 Vi är mitt i en spännande teknikomställning där du arbetar med våra applikationer i Java och migrerar dem från Spring Boot till OpenShift, tar oss från SolR till Elasticsearch, samt är delaktig i arbetet som innebär att ta steget mot DevOps. Samtidigt arbetar vi med att ta applikationerna från on-premises-miljöer till molnbaserade lösningar. Vi är en bra bit på väg men du är med och påverkar den fortsatta utvecklingen.
   

  

 Vi är övertygade om att artificiell intelligens (AI) kommer att spela en avgörande roll i vår framtid. Därför inkluderar vi AI i vår tekniska strategi och planerar att implementera det i flera av våra applikationer för att bidra till att forma vår framtid.
   

  

 \* \* \* \* \*
   

  

 ”Hos oss får du möjlighet att utvecklas som utvecklare. Du får samtidigt vara med och utveckla vår viktiga verksamhet tillsammans med engagerade och kunniga kollegor.”
   

  

 Ann-Charlotte Djuphammar, enhetschef.
   

  

 \* \* \* \* \*
   

  

 Du tillhör en av våra enheter för utveckling och förvaltning, där du jobbar tillsammans med andra systemutvecklare, UX:are, testare, scrum masters, objektledare IT med flera. Enheten ingår i avdelningen för verksamhetsutvecklingsstöd med ca 120 medarbetare.
   

  

 På den här sidan kan du möta några kollegor inom it och övriga Skolverket www.skolverket.se/mot-oss
   

  

 Du arbetar på vårt moderna och rymliga kontor i Solna Business Park. Du kan också ha möjlighet att arbeta upp till 50% på distans.
   

  

****Om dig****
 För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss behöver du stå för och leva upp till den statliga värdegrunden och till våra kärnvärden för medarbetarskap: förebild, tillit, ansvar, samarbete och utveckling. Läs mer på skolverket.se/jobb
   

  

**I det här jobbet ska du ha**
* relevant utbildning inom IT som eftergymnasial eller högskoleutbildning alternativt erfarenhet som Skolverket bedömer som relevant,
* minst 5 års erfarenhet av Java och Spring Boot eller motsvarande,
* minst 5 års praktisk erfarenhet av Elasticsearch,
* kunskap om relationsdatabaser/databasdesign,
* goda kunskaper och erfarenhet REST APIer med JSON samt SOAP tjänster,
* goda kunskaper av versionshanteringssystem t.ex. GIT,
* erfarenhet att arbeta med ärendehanteringsverktyg såsom t.ex. Jira,
* erfarenhet av agil metodik t.ex. Scrum,
* mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i både i tal och skrift.


 Det är meriterande om du har praktisk erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps eller motsvarande, arbetat med CI/CD – Kontinuerlig integration, kontinuerlig leverans och testautomatisering och arbetat med att förädla byggprocesser med Jenkins och Maven. Det är även meriterande med erfarenhet av API-design med Swagger2 eller OpenAPI specification 3.0 och om du har arbetat med fler Java-ramverk, verktyg och applikationsservrar.
   

  

**Som person behöver du**
* vara prestigelös, initiativrik och ha förmåga att lösa problem,
* kunna arbeta strukturerat och ha en vilja att lyckas i din yrkesroll,
* ha en god analytisk förmåga och kunna hålla uppsatt plan för leverans,
* ha förmåga att se detaljerna i helheten och samarbeta obehindrat inom organisationen.


****Viktigt att veta****
 Sista ansökningsdag är 18 september. Anställningen är tillsvidare och inleds med provanställning i sex månader.
   

  

 När du registrerar din ansökan får du svara på några frågor i stället för att bifoga ett personligt brev. Läs gärna igenom ansökningsformuläret och förbered dina svar innan du gör ansökan.

title: Solution Architect
description:
**Solution Architect To Portal Experience**
**Do you want to be a part of an innovative work environment where you will have the opportunity to influence the future of our digital customer experience together with a motivated and skilled team? Then this could be the role for you!**
 As a Solution Architect for Portal Experience in our Stockholm office at GlobalConnect, you will collaborate with our product -, UX -, development - and architect teams. You will work with applications, data, users/customers, and business processes. Through your technical competence you’ll assist in enabling the portal roadmap. Your role as a Solution Architect demands that you drive change, take initiative, and build key relationships and networks within the company.
   

  

 As a key member of our team, you will play a crucial role in our portal journey where we are building a digital customer interaction. We have a complex portal landscape, spanning cross multiple markets with different user groups and needs. You will be responsible for developing and implementing architecture solutions, for and through our portals, to meet all expectations from our customers. In addition, you will be responsible for aligning the solutions with the company IT strategy and business requirements.
   

  

**Requirements:**
* The ability to engage and create impact in a global organization.
* Effective communication skills, both for technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience from working as a developer or close to developers.
* Fluency in English, both spoken and written. If you understand Swedish that is advantageous.
* A genuine interest in customer - and user experience.


**Desirable but not essential:**
* Experience from Jira
* Experience from ArchiMate
* Experience from microservices and rest-APIs
* Experience from working with devops - and infrastructure teams
* Experience from customer facing web solutions


 At GlobalConnect you will work in an inspiring and innovative work environment, with a hybrid remote policy. To thrive in this role, personal drive is crucial. We are looking for a a collaborative person who also has the possibility to travel (when if/ needed) across the countries GlobalConnect operates in. If you share our enthusiasm for shaping the future of digital customer interfaces within telecom, this is the right role for you. We will be focusing on individual qualities, welcoming candidates with experiences from other domains.
   

  

 If you're ready to take the next step in your career as a Solution Architect and believe you have what it takes, we look forward to receiving your application. Come and shape our future digital customer experience with us!

title: Software/IT Architect
description:
Are you an experienced IT architect with a deep understanding of hybrid environments and security? Do you want to work in a dynamic startup environment where your ideas can be realized, and you get to lead technical projects from start to finish? We are looking for a driven and committed architect with experience in both cloud services and traditional IT infrastructure to strengthen our team.


We are an entrepreneurial company within the Nexer Group, leading the digital revolution with cutting-edge technology. Our mission is to lead the change (not follow it) and ensure that our customers stay at the forefront. We are a strategic partner for our customers, working with strategy, technology, and communication. Within our team, you will find a strong culture where passion and execution are our core values.


Our vision is: 1) Cybersecurity must become business relevant. 2)Cybersecurity needs a higher degree of automation and industrialization. 3)The outcomes of cybersecurity must be measurable and visualized at all levels within the organization.

**Key Roles and Responsibilities:**

* **Design and Planning:** Create comprehensive technical solutions, from applications to infrastructure, that work seamlessly together.
* **Technical Leadership:** Lead development teams through technical guidelines and standards, including the choice of technology stacks and tools.
* **System Integration:** Ensure that the organization's various systems can communicate and function smoothly, both on-premises and in the cloud.
* **Security:** Design secure systems that follow relevant security standards (ISO 27000, CIS Controls). Implement security features from the start and regularly review them.
* **Scalability and Performance:** Design systems that are scalable and optimized for high performance, ready for future growth.
* **Innovation and Future Orientation:** Stay updated with the latest technology and contribute to the development of innovative solutions.

**Requirements and Qualifications:**

* **Experienced Architect (Senior):** You have several years of experience in designing and implementing technical solutions in both cloud and on-premises environments.
* **Coding and DevOps:** You have hands-on experience with coding, preferably in Python, and working with DevOps processes and CI/CD pipelines. Experience with container solutions like Docker and Kubernetes is a strong plus.
* **Security Focus:** You have a deep understanding of security architecture and experience with risk management, identity and access management, and encryption.
* **Startup Focus:** You thrive in an entrepreneurial environment where you have the opportunity to contribute to business goals and build from the ground up.
* **Leadership and Goal Setting:** You can delegate tasks, set goals, and guide teams to achieve technical objectives effectively.
* **Language:** Fluency in English, both spoken and written, is required; Swedish is desirable but not mandatory.
* **Requirement Management:** You can clearly set requirements both internally and externally with suppliers.

**Personal Qualities:**

* **Open and Responsive:** You are communicative and open to feedback to improve solutions.
* **Driven and Proactive:** You see what needs to be done and take the initiative to move things forward.
* **Efficient:** You work in a structured and focused manner to deliver high-quality solutions on time.

**We Offer:**

* A dynamic and innovative work environment where you have the opportunity to influence both technical and strategic decisions.
* Challenging projects where you can contribute to and lead the organization’s IT architecture toward a secure and efficient hybrid environment.
* Flexible working conditions and the opportunity to grow in an entrepreneurial organization.

**About Nexer Cyber Security**


Nexer Cyber Security was founded in 2021, and today we have 24 employees with significant diversity in experience and background. We do not strive to do what has been done before, but to optimize and change the way we work with cybersecurity, truly integrating it into the general operations of all organizations.


We are part of the Nexer Group, which is Sweden's largest privately-owned technology company, with over 3,000 employees in 18 countries. We are an entrepreneurial company within Nexer Group, leading the digital revolution with cutting-edge technology. We are a strategic partner for our customers, working with strategy, technology, and communication.


At Nexer, we value competence development and offer our employees courses through Nexer Academy and Pluralsight, provide certification bonuses, and organize inspiring lectures and Meetups. As an employee with us, it is essential that you feel you have the opportunity to develop and constantly be challenged. That’s why we are proud that development and knowledge-sharing permeate our entire business, and our success lies with our employees!

title: IT-Projektledare - Underkonsultuppdrag
description:
Kunden söker en erfaren IT-projektledare med djup kunskap inom informationssäkerhet och projektledning. Som senior projektledare kommer du att leda och driva IT-projekt i en säkerhetskänslig miljö, med fokus på att leverera projekt inom tidsramar och budget, i linje med statliga krav och riktlinjer.

**Start**: 2024-12-01  

**Slut**: 2025-11-30

### **Uppdragsbeskrivning**


Som IT-projektledare kommer du att ansvara för att leda och driva ett eller flera IT-projekt relaterade till införandet av ett nytt registerkontrollsystem och etablering av en ny IT-miljö. Ditt arbete kommer att omfatta planering, genomförande och uppföljning av projekt med höga säkerhetskrav, i samarbete med interna resurser, konsulter och verksamhetsspecialister.


En viktig del av uppdraget är att säkerställa att projekten uppfyller krav inom säkerhetsskydd, informationssäkerhet och kontinuitet. Du kommer att implementera tekniska lösningar för att skydda känslig information på flera nivåer, såsom nätverk, applikationer och datalager. Du kommer även att ansvara för att projektet följer företagets projektmodell PPS samt använda projektverktyget Antura för rapportering och resursallokering.


Som projektledare kommer du också att:

* Stötta projektägare med att ta fram projektdirektiv och nödvändiga underlag.
* Planera och leda projektets framsteg mot uppsatta mål och säkerställa att projektplanen följs.
* Hantera leverantörskontakter och vid behov upphandla lösningar enligt LOU.
* Rapportera regelbundet om projektets framdrift och risker till styrgrupp och andra intressenter.
* Ansvara för projektets budget och resursallokering, samt säkerställa att leveranser sker inom ramarna.
* Vid behov stödja andra projekt inom företaget med liknande arbetsuppgifter.


Placeringen är på kundens kontor i norra Stockholm, med möjlighet att arbeta från eget kontor under vissa förutsättningar. Uppdraget är säkerhetsklassat och kräver säkerhetsprövning innan projektstart.

### **Krav på dig som underkonsult**

* Certifiering inom PPS/PRINCE2/XLPM/PROPS/PMI
* Minst 9 års erfarenhet som IT-projektledare i stora organisationer
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet som projektledare för IT-uppdrag med höga informationssäkerhetskrav
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av upphandling inom statlig myndighet eller offentlig sektor av IT-lösningar
* Projektlett minst 2 införanden av standardsystem med krav mot externa parter
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt och verktyg som Azure DevOps eller Jira
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av ITIL kopplat till IT-produktion, förvaltning eller projektverksamhet
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


Mervärdeskrav:

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom verksamheter med hög skyddsklass och kritiska IT-system
* Projektlett minst ett flerårigt IT-infrastrukturprojekt

**Ansök till uppdraget senast 18 September med:**  

  

* CV i **Word-format** som visar matchning mot uppdraget
* Motivation till varför du passar för uppdraget
* Tillgänglighet
* Önskat timpris

title: Nätverkstekniker till konsultuppdrag i Norrköping
description:
Nu har du chansen att hoppa på ett spännande konsultuppdrag hos vår kund i Norrköping. Har du några års erfarenhet av nätverksarbete och trivs med praktiskt arbete? Då kan detta vara uppdraget för dig!

  

**Om tjänsten**  

Vår kund söker en driven och kompetent nätverkstekniker för ett konsultuppdrag i Norrköping. Detta uppdrag innefattar både högt och lågt arbete inom nätverk, inklusive installation av switchar, konfigurering av routrar, och hantering av brandväggar.  

  

**Här får du möjlighet att:**

* Arbeta på plats hos en spännande kund med varierande uppgifter.
* Ett uppdrag där du får möjlighet att utvecklas och ta eget ansvar.
* En dynamisk och stödjande arbetsmiljö.

**Anställningsform:** Konsultuppdrag via Ed:Za  

**Uppdragslängd:** Initialt 6 månader, chans till förlängning

  

**Du kommer bland annat att jobba med:**

* Installation och konfigurering av nätverksutrustning (switchar och routrar).
* Hantering och underhåll av brandväggar, specifikt Fortinet.
* Routing och switching arbete.
* Granskning och optimering av befintliga nätverkslösningar.
* Samarbete med kundens IT-avdelning för att identifiera och lösa problem.

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* Erfarenhet av nätverksarbete, gärna ett par års praktisk erfarenhet.
* Kunskap om Fortinet och brandväggar, gärna på en nivå tre på en femgradig skala.
* Självgående, driven och flexibel i arbetssättet.

Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och som en del av ett team.  
* 

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**  

Tror du att detta skulle passa dig, eller kanske någon du känner? Vi har ett löpande urval och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag, tveka därför inte - utan skicka in din ansökan redan idag!


Rekryteringen kommer hållas av Ed:Za Group. Har du några frågor eller funderingar relaterade till tjänsten och processen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta oss på charlotte.hoffstrom@edzagroup.se

title: Embedded Software Engineer to Nira Control
description:
**About the Role**  

As a Software Engineer, you will be deeply involved in creating software models and working on exciting projects with clients around the world. Currently, our client's main markets include the EU, US, India, and the United Kingdom. You will support customers throughout the entire process—from specification and prototyping to certification and mass production.

**Example of Work Tasks:**

* Develop specifications in collaboration with Cloud and Application engineers.
* Experience of Embedded C-code development
* Develop and conduct functionality tests during the development cycle, both in the lab and on customer applications.
* Manage software releases.
* Document strategies, including software design descriptions and handbooks.
* Ensure the timely delivery of agreed-upon products with the correct scope.


To thrive in this role, you should have a strong interest in understanding your clients and their applications. You will need to be hands-on, validating systems and occasionally meeting clients on-site, which may require travel.

**Required Skills and Experience**

* Have a relevant university degree e.g. within computer science, electrical, mechatronics engineering or similar
* Have a strong interest in Application Software Development that you have either acquired through studies or own projects
* Implement functionality in C#
* Have good knowledge in C/C++
* Fluent English in both speech and writing

**We’re Looking For**  

We’re looking for someone who is responsible, service-minded, thorough, and solutions-oriented. You should be someone who takes ownership of your tasks and gets things done efficiently. A focus on helping others and maintaining positive relationships is important. You should also pay close attention to detail and be good at finding practical solutions to problems

 **EEZE**  

At EEZE, we look forward to helping you find your next career opportunity and supporting you throughout the entire recruitment process. With our personalized and professional assistance, we strive to make your transition into the new role as smooth and successful as possible.

**Application & Salary**  

Start: Immediately  

Work extent: Fulltime, flexible working hours Monday-Friday  

Location: Enebyberg, Danderyd

**Ready for the Challenge? Apply Today!**

title: Erfaren Nätverkstekniker
description:
### **OM JOBBET**


Som Nätverkstekniker kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att designa, implementera och underhålla avancerade nätverkslösningar för våra kunder. Du kommer att vara involverad i projektstyrda arbeten, från designfas till drift och underhåll av aktiva kommunikationsnät, inklusive switching, routing, brandväggar och trådlösa nätverk.  

Precis som vi, så är du en innovativ och ärlig lagspelare som vill ha kul tillsammans på jobbet. Du ansvarar för dina egna kunder, driftavtal och leveranser samtidigt som du samarbetar med övriga kollegor och partners. Med din hjälp säkerställer vi att våra kunder får den bästa lösningarna inom säker infrastruktur. Avdelningen har 24/7 jour året runt.


Har ett stort eget driv och engagemang för att driva våra kunders utveckling samt är genuint intresserad av IT- och nätverk och har god teknisk förståelse  



  

### **ARBETSUPPGIFTER**


Vi jobbar i team på projektuppdrag mot kund. Det kan inkludera design, projektering, installation, felsökning, drift och underhåll och nyinstallation av kommunikationsnät.

* Dokumentation av arbete/projekt.
* Effektivisering och förbättringsförslag.
* Ansvar för kunders leveransförväntningar.

### 

### **ERFARENHETER OCH EGENSKAPER**

* Gedigen kunskap inom LAN/WAN, switching/routing, felsökning, nätanalys, brandväggar, Wifi.
* Erfarenhet av att implementera och genomföra konfigurationer av nät och aktiva komponenter.
* Gärna certifieringar inom Aruba, Fortinet, Juniper och Cisco eller har motsvarande kompetens.
* Affärsmässigt uppträdande gentemot kund.
* Gedigna kunskaper i det svenska och engelska språket.


Vi ser gärna att du har körkort.

### **ÖVRIGT**


Om du är nätverkstekniker och gillar att arbeta både strategiskt och operativt med teknik så tveka inte att höra av dig, skicka in din ansökan idag!

### **OM D-SOURCE**

*Your source to IT*  

D-Source är ett modernt konsultbolag med bredden mellan helpdesk, infrastruktur och Tech. Vi har lång erfarenhet av att förstå kunders IT-behov! Tveka inte att höra av dig om du är intresserad av att ta reda på mer.


Vad kan vi göra för dig och vad kan vi göra tillsammans?  



  

### **INGET JOBB FÖR DIG?**


Lugnt! Du kan alltid registrera dig förutsättningslöst på D-Source jobbsida genom att Connecta med oss. Då hamnar du i vår kandidatdatabas och får koll på våra kommande aktuella tjänster.

title: Libera söker Driftchef i norra Stockholm
description:
**Uppdraget**


Vi på Libera söker för vår kunds räkning en driftchef till deras logistikcenter i norra Stockholm. Som driftchef ansvarar du för en avdelning inom logistiken där du leder och fördelar arbetet för att se till att den dagliga driften flyter på. Du samarbetar löpande med de andra driftcheferna och rapporterar till Operations manager.


Förutom detta innebär rollen även nedan ansvarsområden:


* Coacha, utveckla och leda personal för driften
* Säkerställa och förbättra produktivitet, kvalitet och ledtider
* Arbetsmiljöansvar i form av att rapportera incidenter och informera om tillbud, olycksfall och arbetsskador samt meddela händelser, avvikelser och allvarliga risker
* Förmedla företagets strategier och bryta ned dessa till individuella mål
* Arbeta nära dina medarbetare och stötta dem i det vardagliga arbetet


Arbetet är förlagt på dagtid.

**Vem du är**


För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du är en aktiv ledare, som tar initiativ, är ansvarsfull samt stödjer dina medarbetare i dagliga driften. Du behöver ha gedigen erfarenhet inom logistik och god kompetens vad gäller analysarbete, system och processer. Som person är du rättvis, målinriktad och förstår vikten av uppsatta regler och rutiner för att kunna upprätthålla en mycket god kvalité samt nå uppsatta mål. Vi ser gärna även att du har erfarenhet av automation inom logistik.

  

Vi ser att du som söker har minst en gymnasial utbildning, du har god IT-vana och är trygg i att använda Excel som dagligt verktyg. Du behöver kommunicera väl på både svenska och engelska, övriga språkkunskaper är meriterande.
