title: Senior Solution Architect - Order and distribution
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**The Position**
----------------


As Solution Architect, you will take on the responsibility to details the solution based on business need. We want you to drive our digital agenda of our cloud ERP environment and future technologies like IoT. You should be able to convert the epic to business feature.

  

You manage IT integration solutions using relevant platforms, support services, methods, and guidelines. You need to have the ability to design solutions/systems following modern patterns such as citizen features like orchestration, watchlist, IoT and different UDO’s features. From a technical perspective you will be working with the ERP system JD Edwards towards Volvo Penta. This position will expose you to many different business stakeholders as well as other architect and also the IT delivery. Your task will be to translate from the business stakeholders into the different layers in business with the correct acceptance criteria.

  

You will be part of a global team where you will be driving analysis and architecture in portfolio pre-studies and act as Lead architect in prioritized initiatives.

**Your profile**
----------------


To thrive in this position, we think you are a person who enjoy problem-solving and are intrigued when faced with a challenge. You should have the ability to work under changing conditions but still keep the big picture perspective, since our environment constantly evolves in unexpected ways. You enjoy working with people and business aspects as much as with the technology and architecture side.

  

You are structured, innovative and have a strong customer focus in combination with a business-oriented attitude. You enjoy teamwork, contribute with team spirit and likes taking on responsibility.

  

Your personality is your major reason for success, but we think you also have:

* Several years of experience as Architect/Business Analyst in an international environment.
* Relevant university degree, Bachelor or higher.
* Hands on experience with ERP systems (JD Edwards, SAP or similar).
* Have experience from order and distribution area.
* Great communication and presentation skills.
* Ability to build relationships and bridge Business and Tech.
* A curious mindset to understand and work on all layers of a solution or service stack, from the presentation layer down to the infrastructure layer.
* A global and agile mindset with strong customer focus.
* Capability to drive and lead a technical pre-study of an initiative.
* Fluent in English - both written and spoken.
* Valid work-permit for Sweden, if not EU-citizen.

  

The location for this position is Gothenburg, Sweden. This is a hybrid work model and you will be required to be on site at the office a few days per week.

**Want to know more? Contact us!**
----------------------------------


Mikael Zander - Digital Product Area Owner - mikael.zander@volvo.com

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Embedded Software Application Engineer
description:
September 13, 2024
Full Time
Sweden
Posted 18 hours ago
We are hiring for skilled **Embedded Software Application Engineer** for the position based in **Sweden****.**


**Educational Qualification:** Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field.


**Job Summary:**


* The ideal candidate with relevant experience to join our Software Platforms team as a developer, leading system engineering and collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop new software products. The successful candidate will be responsible for **functional development**, including requirement **breakdown, software design, documentation, implementation, testing, and verification**. Additionally, the role involves leading system engineering efforts in technical teams and integrating deliverables from various sources (GTO, AMT, IT).


**Required Experience / Competences:**


* **1)** 8+ years of exp & **2)** 12 + years of exp in **Embedded Software Development.**
* Strong proficiency in **C++ programming** and **Embedded Linux.**
* Hands-on experience with **DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines**.
* Proficiency with **Docker** and **containerization** technologies.
* Strong knowledge of **cybersecurity** like **TSPKI**, certificate handling, and secure coding practices.


**Soft Skills:**


* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities to navigate complex technical challenges.
* Ability to lead technical teams, inspire collaboration, and drive project success.
* Flexibility to adapt to new scenarios, learn quickly, and apply knowledge in diverse situations.
### **Job Features**


Job Category Embedded SW

title: Systemtekniker inom Automation
description:
**Om jobbet**
-------------


Som systemtekniker kommer du ingå i ett team där vi tillsammans utvecklar, förvaltar och underhåller beställningsportalen för IT-Infrastrukturtjänster med dess automation. Det innefattar bland annat att skapa virtuella klienter och automatisera administrativa tjänster för att underlätta för Trafikverkets medarbetare. Du underhåller och utvecklar tjänster och funktioner för att möjliggöra ökad automation samtidigt som du har ett stort kundfokus då det styr vad vi ska göra.


Vi jobbar agilt och veckorna är planerade i iterationer där du har möjlighet att styra din arbetsdag gällande nyutveckling i front- och backend. Du ansvarar även för kontinuerlig drift, underhåll och felsökning samt har rollen som produktionssättningsledare för nya arbeten som inkommer ifrån ditt team och hjälper där andra tekniker att belysa eventuella problem/hinder som en ny produktionssättning kan innebära. Arbetet innebär mycket kontakter inom vår IT organisation och andra verksamhetsområden på Trafikverket samt dialog med externa parter. I denna roll tror vi att du kommer stimuleras av lösningarnas komplexitet med inriktning mot automation.


Några ord från din framtida chef: *Jag som blir din chef heter Maria Sundkvist och mitt ledarskap bygger på ett ömsesidigt förtroende, delaktighet, tydlighet och att gemensamt leverera resultat. Jag strävar alltid efter att vara en närvarande ledare som aldrig är längre bort än ett telefonsamtal. Jag vill ha en löpande och nära dialog med mina medarbetare samt skapa en kreativ och utvecklande miljö för alla.*


På Trafikverket erbjuder vi en modern arbetsplats där vi möter varandra med respekt och omsorg i en öppen och nyskapande kultur. Vi tror att goda prestationer kommer när du har förutsättningar för en god balans mellan arbete, familj och fritid och du kan därför förlägga en del av din arbetstid på distans.

**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------

**Vem är du?**


För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du är en lagspelare med en god samarbetsförmåga. Du kommer ha många kontakter inom Trafikverket och vi ser därför att du har en god kommunikativ förmåga och förmedlar information på ett enkelt sätt anpassat till mottagaren. Du har en god problemlösningsförmåga och arbetar noggrant för att leverera kompletta och kvalitetssäkrade lösningar. Vidare motiveras du av ett aktivt medarbetarskap där du på ett målmedvetet sätt tar ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och bidrar till vår fortsatta utveckling.

**Vi söker dig som har**

* en avslutad gymnasial utbildning inom IT alternativt annan gymnasial utbildning i kombination med arbetslivserfarenhet inom området som av oss bedöms likvärdig
* arbetslivserfarenhet av produkten Zervicepoint
* arbetslivserfarenhet av JavaScript och PowerShell
* arbetslivserfarenhet av databaser såsom MS SQL
* erfarenhet av produktionssättningar i komplexa IT miljöer
* erfarenhet av drift/felsökningar i komplexa IT miljöer
* god kunskap i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

**Det är meriterande om du har**

* kunskap om Windows server 2019 samt 2022
* kunskap om ärendehantering i Remedy ITSM
* körkort för personbil
**Övrig information**
---------------------


Placeringsort för tjänsten är Västerås. Önskar du att arbeta delvis på distans? I den här tjänsten finns det möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån upp till 40 procent av din arbetstid. #LI-Hybrid


I denna rekrytering används webbaserade tester som en del i urvalet. Intervjuer sker initialt via Skype och planeras till v. 42.


Vi använder främst mail (från mejladress: noreply@heroma.se) för att göra utskick och kallelser. Kolla din inkorg och även skräppost/SPAM regelbundet under denna tid för att vara säker på att du får all information från oss!

**Ansökan**
-----------


De frågor som du får besvara när du skickar in din ansökan kommer att ligga till grund för det första urvalet vi gör. Om det inte står något annat i annonsen vill vi att du bifogar ditt CV. Vi har slutat begära in personligt brev eftersom vi inte har med det som del av urvalsunderlaget.


Inom vår IT-organisation är du med och utvecklar Sverige med hjälp av moderna och innovativa lösningar. Vi är mitt i en spännande förändring där vi försöker ta vara på digitaliseringens möjligheter till fullo. Digitaliseringen ställer allt större krav och vi vill därför anpassa oss vad gäller kompetens, arbetssätt och organisation i takt med utvecklingen. Vi har ett helhetsansvar för IT och telekom, en verksamhet som pågår dygnet runt, året om - precis som Sveriges transportsystem.


På Trafikverket jobbar vi med att göra Sverige närmare. Vi tror på att en förening av olika erfarenheter, bakgrunder och perspektiv är den bästa grunden för att bygga en arbetsplats fri från diskriminering och en miljö där alla trivs och gör sitt bästa. Vi tror på mångfald där den gemensamma nämnaren är pålitlighet, engagemang och mod. För det är så vi bäst representerar vårt samhälle.
company_description: Trafikverket ansvarar för långsiktig planering av transportsystemet för vägtrafik, järnvägstrafik, sjöfart och luftfart.

title: Country IT Manager - Sweden & Oversight Countries
description:
**Description**


Join Hitachi Energy as Country IT and Oversight Manager – Shape the Future of IT Solutions!  

  

Are you ready to take the lead in driving IT efficiency and innovation across multiple countries? As a Country IT and Oversight Manager, you’ll spearhead a dynamic team of IT specialists, ensuring top-tier IT services and solutions are seamlessly delivered across your designated region. You’ll play a key role in compliance, stakeholder management, and aligning local operations with international standards and business needs.


If you're passionate about delivering IT services that enhance business efficiency and compliance, while leading and inspiring teams, this is the opportunity for you! Take the next step in your IT leadership journey with Hitachi Energy. Apply now!  

  

**Your responsibility**

* Collaborating with the business unit IT Management, internal and third party IS suppliers and IT service management of related countries and R&D sites and other sites as defined. All other sites are managed by business solution teams (BST).
* You will be accountable for the assigned scope towards management stakeholders and Functions that delivery of processes or projects supporting IT systems or projects is aligned to business and functions needs, resulting in improved efficiency, effectiveness, quality and/or operational functionality
* You will prioritize tasks and responsibilities to manage country requirements and escalations seamlessly accordingly to the global targets and strategy along with ensuring operational tactics supporting the business.
* Provides experience in delivery and management of local services in the scope of country IT and process at both tactical and operational levels, understanding and applying IT best practices to assess, review, manage and monitor country IT services and products.
* Responsible for compliance of IT services to local law, local license compliance & local IT controls compliance and responsible for local IT budget in the country, where required.
* Ensures with HR support that the area of responsibility is properly organized, staffed, skilled and directed, guides, motivates and develops direct and indirect subordinates within HR policies, for the benefit of both company and the employee.
* Living Hitachi Energy's core values of safety and integrity means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.

 **Your background**

* Proven professional prior experience in IT management of a large site or country
* Hands on experience in different IT roles or relevant non-IT management roles
* Good IT management, organizational change management, financial savvy, stakeholder or people management, analytical skills or data analytics, learning agility
* Communication skills, demand management, compliance management, innovation, IT domain knowledge
* Fluency in English and Swedish mandatory and other languages are meritorious

 **What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

 **More about us**


Are you ready for a new exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!

  

Recruiting manager Andreas Toth, andreas.toth@hitachienergy.com will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer: Bo Westman, +46 107-38 38 04; Unionen: Karin Ulvemark, +46 107-38 51 42; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43. All other questions can be directed to Talent Acquisition Partner Renee Lundgren, renee.lundgren@hitachienergy.com.

title: Juniora Revisorsassistenter till Audit & Assurance (Stockholm) – Aug 2025
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
-----------------------

Deloitte är en globalt ledande leverantör av Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal och Consultative Services. Med mer än 457 000 medarbetare i över 150 länder hjälper vi våra klienter och vår omvärld att lösa komplexa problem och nå högt uppsatta mål. Det som definierar Deloitte är vår strävan efter att göra en meningsfull skillnad. För oss innebär det långsiktig utveckling och resultat för våra klienter och deras företag, idéer och handlingar, som också bidrar till en positiv samhällsutveckling. Det handlar även om att stärka våra medarbetare och främja deras utveckling.


**Om rollen**
-------------

Vill du bli en del av vårt framgångsrika team med branschens mest nöjda klienter och ingå i världens största konsult– och revisionsnätverk? Deloittes affärsområde Audit & Assurance består idag av cirka 500 medarbetare, varav 200 arbetar inom revision i Stockholm. Vi söker nu blivande revisorer till vårt kontor i Stockholm för anställning i augusti 2025.


I rollen som revisorsassistent ingår du i team med både juniora och mer seniora kollegor som ger dig kontinuerlig stöttning. Vi erbjuder fantastiska utvecklingsmöjligheter och du får möjlighet att arbeta med några av Sveriges största och mest välrenommerade företag i olika branscher. I arbetet ingår att granska interna kontroller och finans- och hållbarhetsrapporter. Du jobbar i en internationell miljö med fina möjligheter till arbete utomlands. Arbetet är mycket varierande och ingen dag är den andra lik. Du har möjlighet att påverka ditt arbete och din utveckling redan från start.


I rollen förväntas du tillsammans med seniora medarbetare skapa dig en förståelse av revisionsklienters verksamhet, processer och redovisningsmässiga frågeställningar. Du kommer få stötta med att granska klienters interna kontroller och olika resultat- och balansposter, och därmed hjälpa klienterna utveckla sina processer, sin dokumentation och kontrollmiljö. I tätt samarbete med klienten och resten av revisionsteamet, bidrar du till att tillförlitligheten till de finansiella rapporterna ökar.


**Kravspecifikation**
---------------------

Vi söker dig som är nyutexaminerad ekonom eller har något års erfarenhet från en ekonomiroll, och drivs av att utveckla både dig själv och din omgivning. Du är en lagspelare, men trivs även med att jobba självständigt. Du är utåtriktad, målmedveten, engagerad, initiativrik och drivs av nya utmaningar.


Vidare ser vi gärna att:


* Du har goda studieresultat och engagemang vid sidan av studierna.
* Du har mycket goda språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska i såväl tal som skrift.
* Du har ett intresse för att utveckla affärer och verksamheter.
* Relevant arbetslivserfarenhet (exempelvis inom ekonomi, bank, kundkontakt) är meriterande.

I rollen som revisorsassistent arbetar du med en rad olika verktyg för att bearbeta och analysera stora mängder data samt med artificiell intelligens och automatisering. Det är därför även meriterande med studier inom IT-relaterade ämnen vid sidan av dina ekonomistudier, och/eller god systemförståelse samt mycket goda Excel-kunskaper.


**Ytterligare information**
---------------------------

**Vi erbjuder**

Som en del av Deloitte får du tillgång till världens största konsultnätverk med kollegor världen över som du kan nyttja för att utveckla både dig själv, våra klienter och vår verksamhet. Du får arbeta med spännande, komplexa uppdrag, både på global och nordisk nivå, i team som alltid värderar ditt perspektiv och på en revisionsavdelning i framkant av digitaliseringen. Du får möjlighet att arbeta i ett företag som hjälper andra aktörer i deras resa mot en mer hållbar organisation, samtidigt som vi arbetar målmedvetet med våra egna ambitioner inom både klimat, miljö och socialt ansvar. Vi ser ett värde i att våra medarbetare har olika erfarenheter vilket främjar nytänkande och bidrar till fler perspektiv.


**Ansökan**

Du ansöker online. Din ansökan ska bestå av:


* CV
* En motivering till;
	+ Varför du är intresserad av Deloitte och rollen som revisorsassistent
	+ Vad du tror att du kan tillföra i rollen

Ladda gärna upp din motivering och dina betyg som ett dokument. title: IT-Projektledare - Underkonsultuppdrag
description:
Kunden söker en erfaren IT-projektledare med djup kunskap inom informationssäkerhet och projektledning. Som senior projektledare kommer du att leda och driva IT-projekt i en säkerhetskänslig miljö, med fokus på att leverera projekt inom tidsramar och budget, i linje med statliga krav och riktlinjer.
  
**Start:** 2024-12-01Slut: 2025-11-30
  
UppdragsbeskrivningSom IT-projektledare kommer du att ansvara för att leda och driva ett eller flera IT-projekt relaterade till införandet av ett nytt registerkontrollsystem och etablering av en ny IT-miljö. Ditt arbete kommer att omfatta planering, genomförande och uppföljning av projekt med höga säkerhetskrav, i samarbete med interna resurser, konsulter och verksamhetsspecialister.
  
En viktig del av uppdraget är att säkerställa att projekten uppfyller krav inom säkerhetsskydd, informationssäkerhet och kontinuitet. Du kommer att implementera tekniska lösningar för att skydda känslig information på flera nivåer, såsom nätverk, applikationer och datalager. Du kommer även att ansvara för att projektet följer företagets projektmodell PPS samt använda projektverktyget Antura för rapportering och resursallokering.
  
  

**Som projektledare kommer du också att:**  

Stötta projektägare med att ta fram projektdirektiv och nödvändiga underlag.
  
Planera och leda projektets framsteg mot uppsatta mål och säkerställa att projektplanen följs.
  
Hantera leverantörskontakter och vid behov upphandla lösningar enligt LOU.
  
Rapportera regelbundet om projektets framdrift och risker till styrgrupp och andra intressenter.
  
Ansvara för projektets budget och resursallokering, samt säkerställa att leveranser sker inom ramarna.
  
Vid behov stödja andra projekt inom företaget med liknande arbetsuppgifter.
  
  

Placeringen är på kundens kontor i norra Stockholm, med möjlighet att arbeta från eget kontor under vissa förutsättningar. Uppdraget är säkerhetsklassat och kräver säkerhetsprövning innan projektstart.
  
Krav på dig som underkonsult Certifiering inom PPS/PRINCE2/XLPM/PROPS/PMI
  
Minst 9 års erfarenhet som IT-projektledare i stora organisationer
  
Minst 3 års erfarenhet som projektledare för IT-uppdrag med höga informationssäkerhetskrav
  
Minst 2 års erfarenhet av upphandling inom statlig myndighet eller offentlig sektor av IT-lösningar
  
Projektlett minst 2 införanden av standardsystem med krav mot externa parter
  
Minst 3 års erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt och verktyg som Azure DevOps eller Jira
  
Minst 2 års erfarenhet av ITIL kopplat till IT-produktion, förvaltning eller projektverksamhet
  
Flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift
  
  

**Mervärdeskrav:**  

Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom verksamheter med hög skyddsklass och kritiska IT-system
  
Projektlett minst ett flerårigt IT-infrastrukturprojekt
  
  

**Ansök till uppdraget senast 18 Septembermed:** • CV i Word-format som visar matchning mot uppdraget• Motivation till varför du passar för uppdraget• Tillgänglighet• Önskat timpris

title: IT-supporttekniker sökes i Stockholm!
description:
Övergripande uppdragsbeskrivning
  
IT-Support har till uppgift att stödja användare inom bolaget med ärenden som handlar om PC-, skrivar-, telefoni-support m.m. IT-Support har även hand om ärenden som berör konto och behörighetshantering, mail, Teams och konferensrum.
  
  

IT-Support är en grupp på ca 6 personer tillhörande avdelningen IT-Operations med huvudfokus på support till bolagets användare samt förvaltning av delar av bolagets IT-infrastruktur.
  
  

**Som supporttekniker kommer du att jobba med följande:**  

1st –och 2nd line ärenden
  
Ärenden kommer via mail, telefon, serviceportalen och på plats.
  
Administration samt djup kunskap i användarstöd inom Office365 och dess applikationer så som Teams, Planner, OneDrive, OneNote, Forms, Word, Excel m.m.
  
Interna och externa kontaktytor
  
  

**Skallkrav:**  

Ett par års dokumenterad erfarenhet av IT-Support (PC hårdvara, telefoni, skrivare, användare, felsökning etc.)
  
Mycket goda kunskaper kring Office365 administration, främst Exchange online
  
God förståelse i hur en Office365 miljö är uppbyggd vid behov av felsökning.
  
Goda kunskaper om Microsofts standardapplikationer och operativsystem.
  
Goda kunskaper i Active Directory, kontoadministration.
  
Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift
  
Goda kunskaper inom ITIL
  
  

**Personliga egenskaper:**  

Du som söker denna tjänst har arbetat med IT-support/drift samt administration av Exchange/Office365 i ett par år, har en mycket god teknisk kunskap samt erfarenhet av att lösa inkommande ärenden självständigt och effektivt. Du triggas av att lösa problem och gör alltid ditt bästa för att hjälpa användarna. Uppdraget bygger på ett stort eget ansvar och ordningssinne och att du självständigt löser de problem som uppkommer.
  
Du är stödjande, kommunikativ, social och trivs med att ha många kontaktytor. Vi tror att du har eftergymnasial utbildning inom it eller har motsvarande kunskap förvärvad på annat sätt.
  
  

**Önskat startdatum:** 2024-10-01
  
**Önskat slutdatum:** 2025-03-31 med möjlighet till förlängning!
  
**Omfattning:** 100%
  
  

Urval sker löpande, vänta inte med din ansökan!

title: Junior konsultchef till Knowit Sundsvall
description:
**Vi söker en driven junior konsultchef**


Vi på Knowit i Sundsvall söker en junior konsultchef som vill vara med och forma framtiden för vårt kontor. I den här rollen blir du en del av ett team med två seniora konsultchefer där ni tillsammans arbetar för att skapa de bästa förutsättningarna för både våra medarbetare och kunder. Är du vår nästa stjärna?

**Din roll som junior konsultchef:**


Konsultchefsrollen är inledningsvis motsvarande 50% av en heltid och övriga 50% kommer du lägga på konsultuppdrag och/eller andra uppgifter, då vi ser att detta är en roll att växa in i så kommer det till en början vara en delad roll.


I din roll som konsultchef kommer ditt ansvar att stötta och utveckla medarbetare. Du kommer att ha ett nära samarbete med ledningsgruppen och tillsammans säkerställa att alla våra konsulter har rätt förutsättningar för att lyckas i sina uppdrag. Du kommer också att spela en viktig roll i att vidareutveckla och stärka våra kundrelationer, samt bidra i vår affärsutveckling.


**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har erfarenhet av ledarskap och förmågan att inspirera och motivera ditt team.
* Har en högskoleexamen, gärna inom IT, teknik eller liknande.
* Har några års erfarenhet inom IT-branschen, gärna som konsult eller i en liknande roll.
* Är en lösningsorienterad person med positiv och flexibel inställning
* Har en affärsmässigt driv
* Har en god kommunikativ förmåga och kan bygga långsiktiga relationer med både medarbetare och kunder.


Vi vill att du gillar att utvecklas tillsammans med dina kollegor, har roligt på jobbet och delar våra värderingar – Allt är möjligt, vi har attityd, står aldrig stilla, tar initiativ och vi är lagspelare.

**Vad kan Knowit erbjuda dig?**


På Knowit är vi inte bara ett IT-konsultbolag – vi är ett hem för specialister. Hos oss får du möjligheten att växa både i din professionella roll och som person. Vi lägger stor vikt vid ledarskapet och erbjuder dig som chef stöd och coachning genom både interna och externa utbildningsprogram.


Vi strävar efter att skapa balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder flexibla arbetsförhållanden. Våra medarbetare har tillgång till friskvårdsbidrag, förmånliga försäkringar och attraktiva pensionslösningar.


Vi arbetar aktivt med jämställdhet och inkludering eftersom vi tror att mångfald stärker vår innovationskraft och kvaliteten på våra tjänster. Tillsammans strävar vi efter att skapa ett mer hållbart och mänskligt samhälle genom digital innovation.

**Ansök redan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade team!**

*Sista dag för ansökan är 4 okt 2024**. Vid frågor eller funderingar vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare*

title: Senior SysAdmin/IT Support Technician
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.


We are looking for **Senior** **SysAdmin/IT Support Technician** **based in** **Gothenburg, Sweden****.**

**The company:**


The Boeing subsidiary Jeppesen is one of the largest software development companies in Digital Aviation. We develop optimization solutions for the world’s leading airlines. We focus on innovation and continuous improvement to bring more value to our clients, and explore emerging technologies such as quantum computing, AI and big data analytics.


The Crew Portfolio is based in Sweden, Gothenburg. You will work in a one-of-a-kind software development organization with fascinating solutions that make a real difference to people around the world. You will be working in an agile learning organization, surrounded by a team of talented and creative colleagues who are dedicated to our customers. You will learn and broaden your perspective by working with 400 IT professionals from more than 30 different nations, as part of a global organization where you collaborate with customers and colleagues across the world. Most importantly, you will be expected to make a difference.

**Position Overview:**


We are looking for a motivated individual with very strong technical and problem solving capabilities combined with the ability and desire to learn about and master complex system installations.


This is an opportunity for you to work in an international environment with a team of like-minded infrastructure experts in a cutting edge expanding Software Company. The global hosting and deployment team operates from six different locations: Gothenburg, Montreal, New York, Denver, Bangalore and Singapore.


Our team is providing Platform as a Service for airlines that are using our Flight Operations (Crew and Network & Operations Management) optimization products.


We are looking for someone that can help us support all of our customers globally in general and the EMEA customers in particular. You need to have an expert knowledge about both local IT infrastructure and Cloud hosting environments. This position will be responsible for the daily and long-term support and services of cloud-hosted customers.

**What’s in it for you?**


You will be joining one of the largest companies in the world which means access to a wide range of products, technologies, training and benefits.


You will be able to work with colleagues and customers from all over the globe in an expanding and demanding business.


You get the opportunity to work with the biggest airlines in the world and help them with their Flight Operations (Crew and Network & Operations Management) production systems.

**What do we do?**


As a Sysadmin/IT Support Technician you will spend a significant part of your time in the following areas:

* Work close to our customers globally to provide appsystem administration and advanced technical support to our Airline Crew and Network & Operations Management systems
* Work close to customers (both external and internal) as an infrastructure expert
* Assist clients with knowledge injections, proactive problem solving and daily management of production installations.
* Act as the primary infrastructure contact for the customer and work internally with different teams to ensure issues are resolved with quality and within expected time frames
* Install and maintain cloud based servers
* Support and maintain client’s production deployments on a daily basis and 24/7 through periodically on-call assignments'

**Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* 7+ years work experience in Networking/Infrastructure/Sysadmin (Installation, configuration & maintenance)
* VMware
* Red Hat Linux Enterprise Server

 **Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**

* Network design, administration and troubleshooting, Routers/Firewalls
* Microsoft Windows Server
* Microsoft Windows Active Directory
* Citrix XenApp
* Citrix Netscaler ADC
* Cloud computing, (provisioning, maintenance)
* Databases (Oracle, MongoDB, Postgres)
* Grafana (monitoring platform)
* Network administration and troubleshooting (NAT/DNS)
* Shell scripting
* SSL Certificates
* Experience/knowledge of working with either development, configuration, support or infrastructure of Jeppesen Crew and Network Operations products
* Exceed Turbo X
* Python, Ansible
* Univa / Altair Grid Engine
* Experience with IPA, SAML, LDAP and similar technologies


We put great emphasis on your personal characteristics. We value individuals who:

* Have excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
* Ability to perform troubleshooting under time pressure
* Take ownership of issues and work well both independently and within a team
* Are service-minded and enjoy helping customers and colleagues
* Get excited from technical challenges and solving technical problems
* Enjoy a variety of challenges of a highly technical nature


The team you will be working with, consists of 21 IT Infrastructure experts (globally). The team is today serving about 45 airline customers. We are supporting all our customers 24x7 with a Follow-the-Sun support model on weekdays and periodically on-call rosters during the weekend.

**Employer is willing to sponsor applicants for employment visa status.**

**Relocation:**  

This position does not offer relocation. Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expense.

**Join us if you want to:**  

* make a true difference for airline clients across the world
* be a part of something big, challenging and meaningful
* have the opportunity to work for the biggest player in the aviation world
* have flexible working hours and hybrid work place
* have a private medical care and subsidized gym and sports activities
* join our sports teams
* get professional skills development with our virtual learning tools and platforms (Digital Campus, LinkedIn Learning, Degreed, EdX, Enterprise Mentoring, and Communities of Excellence & Practice)
* enjoy additional days off for Christmas break (December 24th-January 1st)
* participate in employee recognition program (Boeing PridePoints)

Applications for this position will be accepted until the end of 26th September 2024.

 **Export Control Requirements:** Not an export control position **Equal Opportunity Employer:**


We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not accept unlawful discrimination in our recruitment or employment practices on any grounds including but not limited to; race, color, ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military and veteran status, or other characteristics covered by applicable law.


We have teams in more than 65 countries, and each person plays a role in helping us become one of the world’s most innovative, diverse and inclusive companies. We are proud members of the Valuable 500 and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. Applicants are encouraged to share with our recruitment team any accommodations required during the recruitment process. Accommodations may include but are not limited to: conducting interviews in accessible locations that accommodate mobility needs, encouraging candidates to bring and use any existing assistive technology such as screen readers and offering flexible interview formats such as virtual or phone interviews.

title: Technical IT support specialist
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.

**At Jeppesen (Boeing DAS)** we work with breakthrough technology, exciting customers and fantastic colleagues from around the world. Our culture is characterized by creativity, professionalism and hard work within an open and flexible work environment. We believe that our employees must be allowed to think big and have fun for us to remain one of the top companies in the industry. To get the best out of each talent, we encourage and enable our employees to continuously develop and explore.


We are currently looking for a **Technical IT support specialist** **(with expertise in Python and Linux) for our office in Gothenburg, Sweden** to join an international environment with a team of like-minded system experts in a leading edge expanding software company.


The team you will be working with consists of Technical Support Specialists (internally referred to as Service Managers), Systems Experts and Service Account Managers handling multiple customers globally.

**Position Responsibilities:**

* Become an authority on several production system installations in terms of managing the technical aspects of the applications.
* Participate in ongoing implementation projects
* Provide advanced technical support for day of operation flight and crew tracking and related products, in relation to the Service Level Agreement(s)
* Assist the client with knowledge injections, proactive problem solving and daily management of the production installation
* Maintain Linux installations on company servers and make recommendations to clients on patches/upgrades
* Work with System requirements with internal and external stakeholders
* On call based roster (24x7 standby) every fourth to fifth week-additional compensation(overtime) and time off applies.


This position is hybrid. This means that the selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite 2-3 days a week. This is at the hiring team’s discretion and could potentially change in the future.

**Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.**

**Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* 3+ years in software development or advanced technical support role
* Good knowledge in Python language or similar
* Good knowledge of Unix and/or Linux
* Good knowledge with shell scripting
* Familiarity with AWS
* Good knowledge in version control systems such as Git and Mercurial
* Fluency in English language

**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**

* 6+ years in software development or advanced technical support role
* Particular interest in technical problem solving
* Experience with AWS
* 24X7 work environment on call
* Strong programming skills (Java an advantage)
* Databases (Oracle or Postgresql)
* Knowledge of Kubernetes is beneficial
* Messaging systems such as Activemq
* Customer relationship experience is advantageous
* Highly responsible, able to take ownership of issues
* Strong technical & analytical aptitude
* Able to work independently and within a team


Typical Education/Experience:


Education/experience typically acquired through advanced technical education (e.g. Bachelor/Masters) and typically 3 or more years' related work experience.

**Relocation:**

**Relocation assistance is not a negotiable benefit for this position. Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expense.**

**Join us if you want to:**

* Get professional skills development with our virtual learning tools and platforms (Digital Campus, LinkedIn Learning, Degreed, EdX, Enterprise Mentoring, and Communities of Excellence & Practice)
* Broaden your experience in international projects, technical workshops and hackathons
* Enjoy additional days off for Christmas break (December 24th-January 1st)
* Participate in employee recognition program (Boeing PridePoints)
* Have Private Medical Insurance (Skandia)


Applications to this role will be accepted until the end of 26th September 2024  



  

**Export Control Requirements:** Not an export control position **Equal Opportunity Employer:**


We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not accept unlawful discrimination in our recruitment or employment practices on any grounds including but not limited to; race, color, ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military and veteran status, or other characteristics covered by applicable law.


We have teams in more than 65 countries, and each person plays a role in helping us become one of the world’s most innovative, diverse and inclusive companies. We are proud members of the Valuable 500 and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. Applicants are encouraged to share with our recruitment team any accommodations required during the recruitment process. Accommodations may include but are not limited to: conducting interviews in accessible locations that accommodate mobility needs, encouraging candidates to bring and use any existing assistive technology such as screen readers and offering flexible interview formats such as virtual or phone interviews.

title: Application Specialist
description:
BCB Medical is the leading Nordic company focused on gathering and analyzing clinical information. Our goal is to revolutionize how clinical information affects the everyday life of people. We help healthcare professionals and pharmaceutical companies improve the patient's quality of life. The company headquarter is in Turku, and we also have offices in Espoo, Oulu, Stockholm, and London.


Among our clients are all the biggest university hospitals in Finland, Sweden, and the UK as well as many of the global top 20 pharmaceutical companies. For that reason, security and trust mean everything to us. Read more about our company and our products on our website https://bcbmedical.com/.

 **APPLICATION SPECIALIST**


We are expanding our business in Sweden and in the UK, and we are therefore looking for an **Application Specialist** to manage our solutions and join our team in Stockholm!

  

As an **Application Specialist** at BCB Medical, you will act as a key liaison between customers and the company's technical, project and sales teams. Your primary role will be to provide expert product knowledge and support on the company's solutions, helping customers understand, implement, and optimize their usage. The role also includes data handling, such as data exports and processing. Together with your colleagues of project managers and developers, you will manage existing business to ensure timely deliveries, meet customer needs, and maintain strong customer relationship. While the role requires strong technical knowledge, you will define and refine solutions. Our software developers will manage the technical implementation and development of new features. This position is full-time and permanent, based in Stockholm.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

* **Technical Expertise**: Provide in-depth technical and application support for our solutions, including troubleshooting, workflow optimization, and product integration.
* **Customer Engagement**: Act as the primary contact for customers, offering guidance on the use of products and services, ensuring customer satisfaction.
* **Training and Demonstration**: Conduct on-site or remote product demonstrations, technical training sessions, and workshops for customers.
* **Product Configuration**: Collaborate with product development teams to translate customer needs into technical solutions, ensuring products are optimized for our end users.
* **Collaboration**: Work closely with sales, project managers and IT team to provide technical insight into product improvements, market needs, and competitive positioning.
* **Documentation**: Develop and maintain technical documentation, application notes, and FAQs to support customer training and product usage.
* **Analytics**: Data handling with knowledge of statistics as processing of data.

 **Qualifications:**

* **Education/Experience**: Bachelor’s degree in IT and computer science or medical informatics or related field OR 2+ years’ experience as system administrator or application specialist. Experience within health or biotech is an advantage.
* **Technical Skills**: Database knowledge.
* **Communication Skills**: Strong ability to convey technical concepts in a clear and customer-friendly manner. Experience in conducting training and presentations is a plus.
* **Problem-Solving Skills**: Ability to troubleshoot technical issues, understand customer challenges, and develop practical solutions.
* **Language**: Fluent in Swedish and English, knowledge of Finnish is considered an advantage.

 **What Can You Expect from BCB Medical?**


We offer a meaningful and dynamic Application Specialist role in an internationally growing company. You’ll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge life science technologies and help shape the future of research and healthcare. Our flexible working environment emphasizes work-life balance and gives you the chance to influence your own work.


We are committed to fostering an open and collaborative atmosphere with a strong team spirit. We work together, inspire one another, and continuously learn and grow as a team. At BCB Medical, we value honesty, respect, and loyalty. Our Stockholm office is home to experienced professionals, who are excited to welcome a new colleague. Join us and be part of a company that's driving toward a healthier future!

 **How to Apply?**


Please submit your application in English no later than **October 10th, 2024**. If you have any questions, we are happy to tell you more about the job via email at careers(at)bcbmedical.com.


Our goal is to review applications and invite potential candidates for interviews already during the application period. So please don't hesitate to submit your application. We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate**.**

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description:
Sympower is accelerating the global transition towards ‘net-zero’ by helping to build smarter, cleaner, renewable energy systems.

  


We are looking for talented **Fullstack** **Software Engineers** to join Sympower's engineering team who is currently working on solutions that help balance electricity grids. Get to know our Software Engineering team in this video.



Let's build the future of energy systems together!

 **What is in it for you**



We are committed to creating an inclusive and values based culture where everyone feels that they belong, and where everyone has the opportunity to do meaningful work.



We offer a market competitive compensation package, including but not limited to:


* 30 Days Paid Holiday Leave
* 1 Day Paid Wellness Leave
* 1 Day Paid Birthday Leave
* Paid Maternity and Partner Leave
* Paternity Leave
* Mental Health and Wellbeing Support
* Remote Office Budget
* Internet Allowance
* Development Plan & Budget
* Stock Appreciation Rights
* 2 Days Paid Volunteer Leave



Learn about all of our benefits on our careers page.

 **What you will need**


* 5+ years of professional experience in Java
* Having an eye for detail, taking ownership, flexible and eager to learn
* Passionate about problem solving and proactive, someone who won't hesitate involving colleagues for support when needed
* Familiarity with some of the following technologies: Spring framework, JPA/Hibernate, RDBMS/PostgreSQL
* Fluent in English


**Beneficial skills**


* Experience in independently running small projects end-to-end with little or no supervision
* Interest in scaling services and IoT
* Interest in data science and machine learning is a plus
* Experience with stream-based architectures such as event sourcing and/or CQRS using technologies such as Pulsar or Kafka
* Experience with Kotlin


**Who we are**



Sympower is accelerating the global transition towards ‘net-zero’ by helping to build smarter, cleaner renewable energy systems. Using our proprietary software platform, we help balance the supply and demand of electricity across international energy networks.

  

We help businesses, grid operators, asset owners and other energy stakeholders around the world reduce their carbon emissions, integrate more distributed renewable energy resources, and generate new revenue streams by participating in demand-side response services.

  

In 2022, Sympower became a certified B Corp, which shows the company is meeting high standards of verified performance, accountability, and transparency across 5 impact areas: governance, workers, community, environment, and customers.

  

Sympower is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage a diverse workforce and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees!



Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

 **MESSAGE TO RECRUITMENT AGENCIES: support for filling this position is not required, so proposals for recruitment services will not be reviewed or responded to.**
company_description: Sympower is a cleantech scaleup driven by the mission of shaping an intelligent and green power system via advanced flexibility software solutions that enhance the value of energy assets.

title: Mjukvaruarkitekt
description:
***På Prevas tror vi på att teknik gör världen bättre. Och för att lyckas göra den bättre, behöver vi personer som dig. Vi kommer att ge dig ansvar och har full tilltro till att du som expert inom området har de bästa lösningarna. Vi har nämligen en stark tro på människan och är övertygade om att din utveckling är vår utveckling. Vi vet också att vår gemensamma kompetens blir starkare när vi hjälper varandra och bryr oss. Därför bygger vår kultur på just det, att finnas där för varandra och ha kul längs vägen.***

 **Hello Opportunity!**  

*På Prevas i Karlstad är vi specialiserade på att utveckla robusta, pålitliga och kundanpassade systemstöd för produktion. Vi är ett väl sammansvetsat gäng som hjälps åt för att tillsammans ta fram de allra bästa lösningarna för att effektivisera och digitalisera produktionsflöden hos våra kunder.*

*Vi söker nu en ambitiös mjukvaruarkitekt för att förstärka vårt team. Du kommer att ha en nyckelfunktion i våra kundprojekt där du intar en ledande roll för att ta fram den bästa lösningen. Som mjukvaruarkitekt kommer du konsultera, ge råd och leverera innovativa tekniska lösningar som bidrar till att skapa mervärde för våra kunder. I rollen blir även omvärldsbevakning en viktig del för att kunna värdera ny teknik och metoder så att vi hela tiden håller oss uppdaterade.*

*Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:*

  

* *Ansvara för att omvandla krav till en detaljerad lösningsarkitektur och fungera som teknisk kontaktperson i olika kundprojekt.*
* Ansvara för teknisk utforskning och Spike/POC-implementering för att uppfylla verksamhetsmässiga och tekniska krav.
* Producera högkvalitativa och välkommunicerande tekniska lösningar som svar på verksamhetsmässiga krav.
* Fatta välgrundade affärsbeslut baserade på teknisk genomförbarhet, komplexitet, tillvägagångssätt, värde och kvantifierad risk.
* Säkerställa att tekniska och arkitektoniska standarder upprätthålls och förbättras, samt att kundprojekt genomförs effektivt och med hög kvalitet.
* Säkerställa kundnöjdhet och upprätthålla relationen med befintliga kunder.

**Hello You!**  

*Vi söker dig som har dokumenterad erfarenhet som senior lösningsarkitekt i utvecklingsprojekt, med erfarenhet att designa komplexa digitala lösningar. Du är van att jobba i agila projekt nära kund eller produktägare. Antagligen har du en teknisk universitetsutbildning i botten eller på annat sätt har skaffat dig motsvarande kunskaper. Du är en person som gärna delar din kunskap med andra och aktivt diskuterar olika förslag för att tillsammans kunna hitta den bästa lösningen. I rollen behöver du även ha en kundorienterad inställning, kunna sätta dig i kundens verksamhet och förstå hur de kan dra nytta av dagens teknologier. Det är meriterande om du har verksamhetskunskap från produktion och produktionsnära IT-lösningar.*  

  

*Som person är du nyfiken, noggrann och genuint teknikintresserad. Du är strukturerad och metodisk med en god planeringsförmåga. Du tycker det är kul att hitta nya innovativa sätt att för att lösa problem och har ett eget driv för att hela tiden ta dig framåt. Dina kunskaper är viktiga för oss men vi värdesätter lika mycket dina personliga egenskaper och din drivkraft.*

 **Hello Team Player!**  

För oss är gemenskap och delaktighet viktigt där alla bidrar med sin kunskap i en lärande miljö. Trivs du att arbeta i en familjär atmosfär där vägen från idé till handling är kort och möjligheten att göra skillnad stor så är Prevas något för dig. Vi erbjuder spännande uppdrag, trevliga kollegor, en inspirerande arbetsmiljö och individuella utvecklingsplaner. Vi strävar alltid efter att finna rätt upplägg som passar just dig för att få ihop livspusslet.


Även om du inte känner dig helt speglad i varje jobbkrav som listas i annonsen uppmuntrar vi dig ändå att kontakta oss och ansöka! Forskning har visat att kvinnor och underrepresenterade grupper ofta bara ansöker när de känner sig 100% kvalificerade. Vi är engagerade i att skapa ett rättvist, inkluderande företag med mångfald och vi uppmuntrar starkt sökande av alla kön, åldrar, etniciteter, kulturer, förmågor, sexuell läggning och livserfarenhet att ansöka.


**Hello Next Step!**  

Du är varmt välkommen att kontakta rekryterare Emmelie Dahlin, emmelie.dahlin@prevas.se , Tel: 072-147 72 45 om du vill veta mer om tjänsten eller helt enkelt bara vill ha en öppen dialog kring en gemensam framtid.

  

Och du, följ oss gärna på **LinkedIn** och **Instagram.**

  

Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser

*Gemensamma kärnvärden är nyckeln till vår framgång. De banar vägen för bättre kommunikation och samarbete, minskar behovet av detaljerade regler och förordningar och gör vår organisation mer agil och dynamisk. Att dela värderingar ger större frihet att agera utan detaljerade regler. Att dela gemensamma värderingar betyder inte att vi alla är lika. Vi älskar skillnader och främjar mångfald. Vi tror att unika individer är viktiga för att skapa starka och framgångsrika team. Våra värderingar styr vårt dagliga beteende gentemot både kunder och medarbetare. När vi respekterar våra värderingar och uppträder i enlighet med dem, ger vi uttryck för vår företagskultur. På Prevas sammanfattar vi våra värden i akronymen BOAT – Business driven, Open-minded, Active och Team player.*

title: Senior Customer Responsible Software Engineer
description:
### **Ongoing is searching for focused and experienced engineers to strengthen our team**

### 

### **About the company**


Ongoing is a successful and growing software company developing a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for logistics-intensive companies. The service contributes to millions of consumers and businesses receiving what they need with a great customer experience. The software service has been developed and improved over many years with close collaboration with our customers and partners. Ongoing strives every day to simplify and connect a complex world of Logistics. The company is the market leader in its niche in the Nordic countries and has built the largest software ecosystem in the market. Join the company in its expansion throughout the world.


Many employees prefer to work from the office, but some prefer to mix or work completely remotely. If you choose to work from the office, you will be on the top floor, in top modern real estate, and have a great view over Johanneberg.#### **About the position**


As an engineer, you will help new and existing customers to develop their businesses by using our web-based Logistics solution. The work will give you a unique insight into the ever-changing market of Logistics and its software ecosystem. You will at the same time further nurture your skills in software development and implementation. The work is primarily done from our pleasant office at Johanneberg, Gothenburg, but can also include visits to our customers. The position is full-time.


Ronny, working as a Senior Software Engineer, helps our customers integrate their ERP and e-commerce services to Ongoing WMS.#### **About you**


Ongoing is looking for software engineers with at least a few years of experience who are interested in using their skills to further help simplify and connect the world of Logistics. We are a company with a strong focus on close collaboration and helping our customers and are therefore looking for flexible, focused, and customer-oriented engineers. We think that you can understand and analyze our customers' businesses but also have the capacity to understand, learn and improve a large Software as a Service solution. To enjoy working in our team you should be open-minded and without prestige.


Ongoing WMS handles large amounts of data. Performance, reliability, and security are important. In the role, you will help our customers manage large data quantities using Microsoft SQL Server.#### **Qualifications**


It is expected that you have experience in software development. Further, you should be excited about working in an entrepreneurial-driven software company where curiosity, responsibility, and flexibility are important parts of future success. Full professional working proficiency in English and a European language is required. It is meritorious if you speak additional languages. Master's Degree holders are eligible. Our employees have backgrounds from all engineering specializations and almost all have a master's degree in Technology as well as other qualifications.


We work with the following technologies and languages (and many more) and it is therefore meritorious if you have experience in them or similar:

* C#
* .NET
* Relational Database - Microsoft SQL Server
* Web (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
* REST-APIs and Webhooks

Ongoing WMS is powered by .NET and can be reached from any device via the web. Skills in C#, the web and related technology are meritorious.### **Terms**


At Ongoing, you can expect the employer to challenge as well as care about you. We pay competitive salaries for skilled employees which can help the company to further develop. We also offer a healthy working environment with many other perks. Learn more about how we work at Ongoing.

  

Our top-floor ping-pong table is appreciated for breaking off between hard work. Many, but not all, colleagues also like using the health benefits for running, gym, padel, squash, tennis, golf, or other activities.

title: IT Specialist
description:
Job description:
 
  
 



**About the job** 




  
 



 As an IT Specialist at Hyundai Motor Sweden, you will act as an important part of the IT team and support the entire organization with coordination, administration and IT planning. In this role you will manage a lot of different stakeholders and you should have a collaborative and service minded focus. This position is located in Stockholm and will report to the Head of IT.
 



  
 



**Key Responsibilities** 




  
 


* Project Planning and Execution: Define project scope, goals, and deliverables that support business objectives in collaboration with senior management and stakeholders.
* Resource Management: Identify and manage project dependencies and critical path, allocate resources effectively, and ensure team members have the tools and support they need.
* Budget Oversight: Develop and manage project budgets, monitor expenditures, and ensure that projects are completed within financial parameters.
* Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure project success.
* Quality Assurance: Ensure that project deliverables meet quality standards and project goals.
* Reporting and Communication: Provide regular updates to stakeholders, senior management, and project teams on project progress, risks, and issues.



  
 


 Profile description:
 
**Required education, experience, knowledge and skills** 




  
 


* A minimum of 5-7 years of experience in project management, preferably in a multinational or cross-functional environment.
* A bachelor’s degree in business administration, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
* Project Management Professional (PMP), PRINCE2, or equivalent certifications are highly desirable.
* Experience in technology, manufacturing, or other relevant industries with a global or pan-European scope.
* Experience in managing large-scale projects with multiple stakeholders across different countries or regions.
* Understanding of relevant regulations and standards across the EU.
* In-depth knowledge of project management principles, practices, and methodologies (e.g., Waterfall, Agile, Scrum).
* Proficiency with project management software tools such as Microsoft Project, Jira, Asana, or similar platforms.
* Strong understanding of risk management processes and best practices.



  
 



**Desired competencies** 




  
 


* Techniques for effective communication and collaboration.
* Flexibility to adapt to changing project requirements and priorities.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to address project challenges and obstacles.
* Well-organized, detail oriented, and structured.
* Ability to operate under pressure and meet time critical deadlines• Ability to understand and manage the technical aspects of projects, including IT infrastructure, software development, or engineering processes.



  
 



 Become part of a global company with a history of success and ambitious plans for the future. Please apply by creating your candidate profile and attaching your application documents in English.
 



  
 



**About Hyundai** 




  
 



 Driven by our vision of 'Progress for Humanity' – at Hyundai we work relentlessly to make high-quality, environmentally-friendly mobility available for all. The industry is re-inventing itself and we plan to lead this change with zero-emission vehicles, electrified powertrains, hydrogen fuel cell technology, and smart cities. At Hyundai, we don't just build cars – we are a leader in future mobility.
 



 At Hyundai, you get the opportunity to work in an international, dynamic, and challenging environment, where you will be encouraged to push boundaries and challenge conventions. We believe that the future of our organization lies in the passion and capabilities of individual members, and we support and encourage the development of their full potential.

title: Incident Manager
description:
**PostNord Group AB is a leading provider of communication and logistics solutions in the Nordic region.** 
**The Nordic Support department is responsible for enabling and ensuring the service management in Group function IT. The unit contributes with designing processes, concepts and implementing them in the service management areas to ensure that the processes provide desired business result.** 




  





**Position Overview:** 




 Do you want to be part of a dynamic and rapidly changing environment at one of the Nordic region´s largest companies? If you work in IT Service Management and are interested in deveoping IT processes this is the job for you!
 



  





 In the role as Incident Manager, you will be responsible for maintaining the standards, rules and policies for IT Incident management. The primary objective is to restore normal IT service operation as quickly as possible when an incident has occurred and minimize the adverse impact on business operations. The goal is to have a structured way of working that ensures that agile teams and vendors can easily solve incidents.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Ensure continuous progress by driving and following up on high-priority and escalated incidents.
* Collaborate with Technical Resolution Groups to diagnose and resolve complex issues.
* Ensure incidents are managed according to agreed processes and procedures, reporting any deviations.
* Coordinate incident responses to ensure swift resolution and minimal service impact.
* Maintain effective communication with stakeholders, providing updates and translating technical details into understandable information.
* Document incidents and response actions in incident reports for future reference and continuous improvement.
* Monitor incident trends and provide feedback to problem management.
* Participate in on-call duty for a week every 8 weeks.



  





**We are looking for you who have** 




  




1. Minimum 5 years of work with proven experience in incident management or a related role
2. University degree or similar, in relevant field (Computer Science or technology/IT).


* Strong understanding of incident management principles, methodologies, and best practices (e.g., ITIL).


1. Leadership, communication, and decision-making skills, with the ability to remain calm and focused under pressure.
2. Proficiency in incident management tools and software (e.g; Jira Service Management)
3. English in speaking and writing.



  





**System requirement:** 



* JIRA SM
* Microsoft Office (including visio)
* Sharepoint



  





**Meritorious experience:** 



* Certification in incident management (e.g., ITIL Incident Management Practitioner) is a plus.
* Incident Management experience preferably in a technology or cybersecurity environment.
* Familiarity with incident response frameworks (e.g., NIST, ISO 27035) is desirable.



  





 We belive you are a person that is thorough, analytical and easy to get acquaninted with and learn new systems. Your way of working is inclusive, structured and responsible. You thrive in a challenging environment and even if the work is at a high pace you are able to prioritize job tasks independently.
 







 You are communicative and easy to collaborate with, and are unpretentious in your way of creating and nurturing long-term relationships. You are willing to share knowledge as well as learn new skills.
 



  





**We Offer You** 
 :
 


* Work in a Nordic and dynamic environment
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord´s own personnel foundation PostNord PlusGreat occupational pension terms
* Great development opportunities



  





**We make everyday life easier** 




 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.
 



  





 We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at www.postnord.com
 



  





**Apply** 




 Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. In this recruitment, PostNord collaborates with Experis IT, which has extensive experience in recruiting IT specialists and managers. If you have any questions or need more information, please contact Recruitment Consultants Carina Eyoma at carina.eyoma@se.experis.com, +46 73-086 22 75 and Pia Boström pia.bostrom@se.experis.com, +46 70-3146866
 



  





 We look forward to receive your application! The last application date, 2024-10-14
 



  





 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga
 



  





 We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Cloud Consultant
description:
***Senior Cloud Architect - Azure***




***Leading Nordic IT Consultancy Company - Sweden***




  





 Would you like the opportunity to join Sweden's fastest-growing IT organizations in the Nordics, renowned for delivering secure and cutting-edge Cloud solutions to high-profile enterprises and public entities.
 



  





 In the last 3 years they have grown their market leading business to over 500 colleagues, with significant growth and investment occurring in their cloud division.
 



  





 You will be responsible for architecting and programme managing significant multi-tenant cloud solutions for some of the most prestigious companies in Sweden. In the first instance, you will be the lead, working with two significant clients who are in the early stages of a significant cloud transformation.
 



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 5+ years of designing public or hybrid cloud solutions.
* Fluent proficiency in Swedish (spoken and written).
* Good experience of working on or managing significant cloud migrations.



  





  





 My client offers a flexible hybrid position, recognition and rewards programs, plus a highly competitive salary.
 



  





*Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. If your application is successful, we will contact you to discuss the position in more detail within 48 hours of receiving your CV. Please assume your application has been unsuccessful if you do not hear back from us within 48 hours.*

title: Configuration Manager
description:
**PostNord Group AB is a leading provider of communication and logistics solutions in the Nordic region.** 
**The Nordic Support department is responsible for enabling and ensuring the service management in Group function IT. The unit contributes with designing processes, concepts and implementing them in the service management areas to ensure that the processes provide desired business result.** 




**Position Overview:** 




  





 Do you want to be part of a dynamic and rapidly changing environment at one of the Nordic region´s largest companies? If you work as a Configuration Manager or Transition Manager and are interested in developing IT processes this is the job for you!
 



 The Configuration Manager is responsible for overseeing the configuration management process within an organization's IT environment. This role involves maintaining accurate and up-to-date records of configuration items (CIs), managing configuration baselines, and ensuring that changes to the IT infrastructure are controlled and documented. The Configuration Manager plays a vital role in supporting other IT service management (ITSM) processes, such as change management and incident management, by providing a reliable and consistent configuration management database (CMDB).
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Coordinate Configuration Management: Oversee all configuration management activities, including designing, implementing, and managing configuration management process.
* Coordinate Transition management: Oversee all transition management activities, including developing, executing and managing transition plans
* Manage Change Control: Control changes to configuration items and documentation to ensure system integrity.
* Maintain Documentation: Keep accurate records of system configurations, dependencies, and relationships.
* Ensure Compliance: Conduct audits to verify adherence to the configuration management plan.
* Collaborate with Teams: Work with various teams to implement the configuration management plan effectively.
* Monitor Performance: Track problems and changes in product documents, reporting updates and current configurations.



  





**We are looking for you who have** 




  




1. A couple of years of work experience within configuration management or transition management or a related role.
2. University degree or similar, in relevant field (Computer Science, logistics or technology/IT).
3. Process Management framework Knowledge & certification (ITIL).
4. English in speaking and writing



  





**System requirement:** 



* JIRA SM
* Microsoft Office (including visio)
* Sharepoint



  





**Meritorious experience:** 



* Configuration Management experience preferably in a complex and large IT landscape
* Transition management experience in cloud applications



  





 We believe you have strong communication and interpersonal skills, enabling you to clearly articulate ideas and foster meaningful relationships with others. Furthermore, your strong analytical and problem-solving abilities empower you to navigate complex challenges and deliver creative, effective solutions.

 :
 


* Work in a Nordic and dynamic environment
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord´s own personnel foundation PostNord PlusGreat occupational pension terms
* Great development opportunities

 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region.
