We use logic and personality tests in our selection process and background control will be made for final candidates.
   

  

 Do you want to join us and be one of us in our Value creation team? I´m looking forward to hear from you!
   

  

 Scania is a world-leading provider of transport solutions. Together with our partners and customers we are driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. In 2020, we delivered 66,900 trucks, 5,200 buses as well as 11,000 industrial and marine power systems to our customers. Net sales totalled to over SEK 125 billion, of which over 20 percent were services-related. Founded in 1891, Scania now operates in more than 100 countries and employs some 50,000 people. Research and development are mainly concentrated in Sweden. Production takes place in Europe and Latin America with regional product centres in Africa, Asia and Eurasia. Scania is part of TRATON GROUP. For more information visit: www.scania.com.

title: DevOps Engineer Stockholm
description:
Are you an experienced DevOps engineer who wants to be a part of building the new organization within ALTEN Software Automotive. Join us at ALTEN in Stockholm and work with cutting-edge technologies to create a sustainable future together with our clients, and get the opportunity to work with world leading companies within the Automotive Industry.
 



*Does this sound interesting? Apply today!* 




  





**What we offer you** 




 Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We meet future challenges by supporting our clients’ projects and enabling our people to reach their full potential. We do so by offering technological challenges, fulfilling opportunities, inspiring togetherness and the possibility to contribute to a sustainable future.
 



  





**Who are you?** 




 To be a good match for the role we see that you hold at least 3 years of experience of DevOps. Besides from being passionate about DevOps, we think you are communicative, responsive and collaborative. We also think our new colleague has experienced in:
 



 • Python
 



 • GoLang or Bash
 



 • AWS
 



 • CI/CD
 



 • Docker or Kubernetes
 



 • Git or Jenkins
 



  





 Meritorious if you have:
 



 • Work experience in agile environments
 



 • Swedish language skills
 



  





**About ALTEN** 




 ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest consulting companies within Engineering, IT and Life Sciences with over 57,000 employees in more than 30 countries. We’re a global actor with a local presence with 1400 committed colleagues in offices from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the product development chain of the most prestigious companies in sectors such as Automotive, Aerospace & Defense, Energy, Manufacturing, Public Sector and Life Sciences.
 



  





 For four years in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden's most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers that offer unique career and development opportunities.
 



  





 Welcome to read more about us at alten.se

title: IT Project Manager
description:
Vi söker en Senior IT Projektledare som ska leda, utveckla och driva resultat framåt mot vårt mål Störst på riktigt. Det här är en strategisk och operativ roll där du b.la kommer driva större och komplexare projekt, koordinera och arbeta nära ATG ITs teknikområden samt koordinera initiativ för flera avdelningar. Vidare kommer du säkerställa och driva att alla arbetar enligt kravställning och levererar enligt plan.
   

  

**I rollen får du:**
* Projektleda en mycket framåtlutad IT Produktorganisation
* Stor möjlighet till inflytande och påverkan
* Ansvara för End-to-End initiativ och projekt
* Hålla samman och koordinera alla delar avseende framdrift och leveranspunkter
* Bygga förtroende, rapportera och kommunicera med intressenter på alla nivåer
* Fungera som mentor inom projektledar-skråt samt för våra mindre seniora projektledare


**Är det här du?**
 Vi söker dig som har drivit tekniknära projekt som även omfattar affärskritiska system, har skapat struktur kring planer, dokumentation och uppföljning i en agil context, samt har förmågan att med ett holistiskt synsätt förstå hur olika delar hänger ihop. Du skriver och talar svenska och engelska obehindrat, är en vinnarskalle som gör allt för att leverera samtidigt som du värnar om goda relationer. Du förstår vikten av god kommunikation och har ett strukturerat sätt med stakeholders på alla nivåer. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av transaktionstunga system inom t.ex. branscherna bank, spel eller telekom samt är familjär med Safe.
   

  

**Vi ser att du har erfarenhet med dokumenterat goda resultat av:**
* Liknande roller i en Produktorganisation
* Erfarenhet av att driva komplexa initiativ i en miljö där många team är involverade och kraven på samplanering är höga mot gemensamma mål
* Kommunikativt ledarskap


**” Jag har stort förtroende för mina medarbetare”**
 Jag trivs fantastiskt bra tack vare tydliga mål och hela bolagets strävan framåt. För mig är det coachande ledarskapet viktigt och jag trivs bäst i en öppen och tillitsfull miljö där jag har stort förtroende för mina medarbetare. Vi utvecklas tillsammans och levererar mot våra gemensamma mål. Jag värdesätter ATGs syn på balansen mellan arbete och fritid och när jag inte jobbar umgås jag med min familj och vänner och reser gärna.
   

  

**Rekryterande chef, Christina Hörner Larsson, Head of IT Office**
**We are the game**
 I mer än 50 år har vi på ATG levererat spänning och underhållning till svenska folket. Vi drivs av att trygga den svenska hästnäringen och att fortsatt vara ett ansvarsfullt spelbolag i framkant. Vår vision att leverera världens bästa spelupplevelse. Vi gillar att samarbeta och uppmuntrar varandra att tänka och testa nytt. Självledarskap och kompetensutveckling är viktiga delar för oss. Vi bryr oss om varandra och våra kunder och vi vill så klart också att alla tävlingshästar ska må bra. Hela vårt överskott går till hästnäringen – något som både känns och gör gott.
   

  

**Join the game!**
 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan via vår rekryteringsportal antingen med ditt cv eller din LinkedIn-profil – det som är enklast och smidigast för dig. Läs gärna mer om oss på vår karriärsida och tveka inte att höra av dig om du har frågor om tjänsten.
   

  

 Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning och kommer att göra en bakgrundskontroll för denna roll. Tjänsten är på heltid och utgår från vårt kontor vid Solvalla, alldeles intill travbanan. Vi har ett flexibelt arbetssätt vilket innebär att du har möjlighet att kombinera distansarbete med arbete från kontoret. Var med och bygg världens bästa spelupplevelse tillsammans med oss!
   

  

 Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
   

  

* Occupational pension
* Tjänstepension
* Work-life balance
* Personal trainer and gym facilities at the office
* Personlig tränare och gym på kontoret
* Wellness allowance
* Friskvård
* Fri parkering
* Free parking
* Hund på jobbet
* Dog at the office


 Om företaget
   

  

**Så här har vi det** 
 Hos oss är du del av en innovativ miljö och med hjälp av den senaste tekniken utvecklar du den bästa spelupplevelsen. Vi gillar att samarbeta och hos oss får du stort utrymme att påverka ditt arbetssätt. Här hittar du nyfikna, nytänkande medarbetare och ledare – viktiga egenskaper för att kunna utveckla och utvecklas. Liksom energi , mod och motivation.
   

  

 För att må bra är skrattmuskeln lika viktig att träna som alla andra muskler. Både den fysiska och den mentala hälsan skapar balans i livet. Hur vi har det på jobbet påverkar privatlivet- och vice versa. Vi ser det som en självklarhet att ge det stöd och de verktyg som behövs. Ditt val av arbetsplats och arbetssätt är flexibelt och vi lägger stor vikt på självledarskap.
   

  

 Vi bryr oss om varandra och respekterar varandras olikheter på ATG. Och vi vill att våra kunder ska må bra och ha roligt när de spelar. Vi bryr oss också om sportens välmående, dvs. idrottarna och hästarna - och samhället runt omkring oss. Vi drivs inte av privata vinstintressen utan allt överskott går tillbaka till våra ägare, svensk trav- och galoppsport, något som både känns och gör gott.

title: MedTech Junior Digital Project Engineer (m/f/d)
description:
A motivated team in a successful, solid company structure looking forward to the support of a resilient and team-friendly personality. As a qualified, communicative, and service-oriented (Junior) professional, you will be responsible for the Project engineering of all dialysis digital products. Our target is to develop you as an Expert with advanced training and Mentorship.
   

  

 In this role you will join the sales or project meetings with clients. You analyse their needs and plan the projects. You install, update, and customize the software based on your plan on the IT infrastructure and test the functionality. Moreover, you may support the existing clients.
   

  

**Your tasks:**
 (Pre-)Sales Support
   

  

  

* Consulate local/regional sales team and the customer on Digital Solutions in providing pre-tender/pre-sales.
* Determining required software/hardware configuration to ensure correct ordering of required articles.


 Project Management
   

  

  

* Providing project management for implementation projects at customers
* Collaborate as sub-project manager in complex projects led by a senior project engineer.
* Advising customer IT to ensure the customer IT infrastructure requirements fulfilled.
* Planning and organizing end user application training with responsible application trainer.


 Project Execution
   

  

  

* Install and configure, testing digital solutions on customer systems.
* Follow-up on open topics after project closure.
* Complete documentation of the executed work in accordance with the Medical Device Regulation and Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) in all required systems (e.g. ticketing system, system for medical device registration)


**Your Profile:**
* Qualified training or studies in computer science/IT and project management or equivalent
* Bachelor's degree or higher, Information Technology or Computer Science major or equivalent
* Experience of 2+ years in technical project management and 1+ years of direct customer.
* Experience in the MedTech (e.g. healthcare IT or other similar company) is an advantage
* Ability in analyzing data for use in reports to support decision making.
* Language: Fluent in Danish and English is a must and Swedish is an advantage.
* Willing to Travel within own region and internationally if applicable, including B-Driver license.
* IT skills:
* Basic IT user skills (MS Office, Intranet, remote maintenance tools, etc.)
* Basic IT skills (MS OS, MS Server OS, MS SQL Server, Cyber Security, O365, PowerPoint, etc.).
* Understand the basics of e-health, data security, and related topics.
* Basic knowledge of software/digital life cycle is an advantage
* General knowledge of communication protocols, e.g. HL7, TCP/IP, etc. an advantage
* Experience with common systems in a clinic/hospital (e.g., PDMS, HIS, EHR, etc.) is an advantage
* Knowledge in connectivity, networks, clouds and mobile technologies is an advantage
* ITIL certification an advantage
* Certification for PMP, PRINCE2, PMI-ACP or CSM an advantage
* Knowledge of FME digital solutions is an advantage


**What We Offer:**
* Opportunity to work with a talented and passionate team in an international leading Medical Device company.
* Professional development and growth opportunities in a collaborative and inclusive work environment
* Competitive salary and benefits package
* The chance to make a real impact on patient care and healthcare innovation.


**Please apply in English**

title: Webstores Platform Lead
description:
**Solve complex problems. Decode the future.**
 At Electrolux Group, as a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home.
   

  

**All about the role:**
 As a Platform Lead, you will oversee the technological vision for Electrolux's webstore channels, which includes evaluating and refining current systems, leading optimization efforts, and promoting cutting-edge web technologies within the company.
   

  

 As a key figure in managing Electrolux webstore technology infrastructure, you will ensure scalability, security, and peak performance. The role will craft and communicate a strategic technical vision that supports company’s digital products, keeping pace with new technologies and market developments.
   

  

 Collaboration with the product management team is essential to define the technological infrastructure that supports our product development trajectory, breaking down business objectives into actionable components, and overseeing the technological aspects of these initiatives.
   

  

**What you'll do:**
 You will foster the development of Electrolux brand's web solutions by offering a comprehensive view of the technology landscape, collaborating with product teams (especially the product owners and technical leads), and providing technical guidance to enhance systems and capabilities, in the following areas:
   

  

* Platform architecture:


 Lead the architecture design of the Electrolux branded webstore’s platform/technology infrastructure
   

  

 Define the technical architecture and design of the Electrolux branded webstore’s platform, ensuring scalability, security, and performance of Akamai and Azure cloud services
   

  

* Engineering leadership:


 Provide guidance, mentorship, and support to Engineering team members, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment
   

  

* Platform technology strategy:


 Develop and communicate a technical vision and strategy for the branded webstore’s platform, aligning it with the product goals
   

  

 Stay informed about emerging technologies and industry trends to make informed decisions regarding branded webstore’s platform development
   

  

 Work closely with engineering managers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
   

  

 Collaborate with cross-functional teams (even outside Digital Commerce) to ensure that the branded webstore’s platform meets the needs of various product teams
   

  

 Leverage and foster API first approach in the execution
   

  

* Collaboration with stakeholders:


 Together with Electrolux Cloud Office team, actively participating in the system roadmap definition providing technical depth
   

  

* Security and compliance:


 Design web security strategy to protect the Electrolux branded webstore’s platform and user data
   

  

 Ensure compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations
   

  

* Documentation and training:


 Ensure comprehensive documentation of the Electrolux branded webstore’s platform architecture, codebase, and processes
   

  

 Act as EPiServer/Optimizely and Akamai technical and functional subject matter expert within the Electrolux Digital Commerce community
   

  

* Continuous Improvement:


 Foster a culture of continuous improvement, encouraging the team to explore new technologies and methodologies to enhance the Electrolux branded webstore’s platform
   

  

**Who you are:**
 You are an experienced, dynamic, and motivated Platform Lead with a robust background in web development and architecture, particularly in web front-end technologies, content management, and security. This role at Electrolux involves spearheading the expansion of its web commerce presence and steering its technology direction in line with emerging web trends.
   

  

 Ideally you possess a proven track record in overseeing system architecture practices, with a comprehensive grasp of technical environments comprising CMS, web front-end technologies, microservice-based architectures, and CDNs.
   

  

 A history of working with scaled agile teams will be considered an advantageous addition. The ability to articulate complex concepts effectively to a diverse audience spanning IT, business units, vendors, and high-level stakeholders, is paramount.
   

  

**Qualifications** 
**:**
* Bachelor's Degree in a technical field with 5+ years of Microsoft.Net development experience.
* Expertise in Optimizely CMS, with certification being advantageous.
* Proficiency in high-traffic web system performance and web security, including familiarity with Akamai technologies (CDN, etc.).
* Prior experience in technology leadership roles such as Technical Lead or Architect within the domain of web and content management
* Solid experience with Microsoft Azure cloud services and infrastructure.
* Demonstrable experience in Agile and Scrum methodologies, with a preference for those who have led technical teams.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities, with experience in JIRA & Confluence.
* Advanced problem-solving skills and the ability to conduct ongoing system reviews.


**Where you'll be:**
 You will be based at Electrolux office in Stockholm, Sweden or Pordenone, Italy.
   

  

**Benefit highlights include:**
* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment.
* Attractive social benefits package.
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path.


 We look forward to receiving you application!
   

  

 As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.
   

  

**Find out more:**
 Electrolux Group

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
Sinch is a global leader in the growing market for Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. We are specialists in allowing businesses to reach everyone on the planet, in seconds or less, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
   

  

 With presence in more than 50 countries, whether you know us or not, you've definitely used our tech. We reach every phone on earth, with over 147 billion conversations every year.
   

  

 Sinch's core values are Make it Happen, Dream Big, Keep it Simple and Win Together. These values describe how our global organization works and inspire every of our more than 3,000 employees across 55 different countries.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Role and Responsibilities**
 Develop, architect and scale the core infrastructure for Sinch's web applications. Be part of in a small cross functional team that sets its own objectives and goals with responsibility for every stage of product development life cycle from planning and design to implementation, testing, deployment, monitoring and maintenance, you build It you run it.
   

  

 Your work will be focused around the common platform used to that makes up the core of the product line; The code you write will be consumed by used by many different teams and is a key enabler in the product line. You will solve problems across the enterprise, focusing not only on how to deliver a great product today but setting the foundations for the future.
   

  

 Tech Stack: NodeJS, Java, React, Typescript
   

  

**Please apply your resume in English!**
**In Order To Contribute To This Role, You Have**
* A strong software engineering background
* In-depth knowledge of the web platform and ecosystem
* Expertise in modern front-end technologies.
* Solid track record working with Typescript in a professional or open-source setting.
* Experience building services on the backend
* Fluency in English


**Big Plus!**
* Experience using design systems
* Experience making architectural decisions that have high impact
* Experience with Web components and the latest Web APIs
* Experience with AWS, Kubernetes and other cloud native technologies


**Benefits**
 Sinch is a global company composed of people from different countries and cultures. Our benefits adjust regionally to support employees and help them to thrive in every stage of life. We offer valuable benefits and resources, including health and life insurance, a flexible work environment, retirement savings plans, and more.
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 In Sinch, we are committed to following a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and non-discriminatory. Our Talent Acquisition team, together with hiring managers and the rest of the interviewing team, persistently work towards identifying the candidates that best fit each open job, based on Sinch' s hiring needs and candidates' career expectations.
   

  

 We encourage applications from strong candidates with relevant professional backgrounds for this role. Not all applicants will meet all job requirements exactly! Even if you do not meet all job requirements, don't let that stop you from considering Sinch for the next step in your career. We are always open to candidates that could bring new ideas and perspectives to Sinch!e

title: Sr. Technical Program Manager, AWS International Security Team
description:
***This job is with Amazon, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.***
**Description**
 Come and join a creative, diverse, and collaborative team that is changing how we think about Cloud Security! At Amazon Web Services (AWS), Security is our highest priority. The International Security team is responsible for driving innovative enhancements that raise the bar for how AWS employees delivery security Of the cloud to support customer facing engagements.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As a Senior Technical Program Manager (Sr. TPM) with our team, you'll influence and own long-term security outcomes for AWS. You'll be working for government and regulated industries to understand their needs. You'll be able to design security systems and solutions that enable them to operate more effectively, securely and safely. You will work with your manager, peers, partners, and customers to innovate and deliver on the vision and purpose of your programs. We encourage team members and management alike to have a high degree of ownership for their program vision and execution of ideas. While working directly with AWS service teams, infrastructure, and administrative teams you'll identify opportunities to improve AWS' project security posture. This will include building tools, driving process improvements, and working with service owners and cutting-edge technology to develop innovative solutions to complex technical challenges.
   

  

 You prioritize well, communicate clearly, and demonstrate a consistent track record of delivery. You are proactive in removing roadblocks, pave the way for innovation, and can handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced environment. You will be a positive influencer across diverse international teams, be able to effectively rally support for your initiatives, and be able to help deeply technical teams create simple solutions to meet your program goals.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, we embrace our differences. We are committed to furthering our culture of inclusion. We have ten employee-led affinity groups, reaching 40,000 employees in over 190 chapters globally. We have innovative benefit offerings, and we host annual and ongoing learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences. Amazon's culture of inclusion is reinforced within our 14 Leadership Principles, which remind team members to seek diverse perspectives, learn and be curious, and earn trust.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 Our team is dedicated to supporting new members. We have a broad mix of experience levels and tenures, and we're building an environment that celebrates knowledge sharing and mentorship. Our senior members enjoy one-on-one mentoring. We care about your career growth as a passionate learner that is motivated to take on challenges.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 Our team also puts a high value on work-life balance. Striking a healthy balance between your personal and professional life is crucial to your happiness and success here, which is why we aren't focused on how many hours you spend at work or online. Instead, we're happy to offer a flexible schedule so you can have a more productive and well balanced life—both in and outside of work.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Technical leadership roles; technical program management, systems architecture, or system development
* Experience in core project management disciplines, including scope, schedule, budget, quality, along with risk and critical path management, on highly technical initiatives
* Experience with software development lifecycle from conception to delivery


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Comfort and experience with cross-organizational communication; excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Proven experience driving overall strategy and teams across organizations
* Demonstrated experience identifying and resolving down-stream programmatic risks (i.e. system incompatibility, resource unavailability) and opportunities (i.e. schedule opportunities, decoupling dependencies)
* Clear understanding of cloud computing services/deployment architecture
* Demonstrate innovative security approaches in non-traditional IT environments


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

title: Digital Process Developer
description:
**Are you passionate about digital innovation and eager to make a real impact?**
 Join our dynamic team as a Digital Process Developer and help us revolutionize the way we work! If you're a creative problem-solver with a knack for technology, we want to hear from you! Apply now and be a part of our exciting journey towards a digital future.
   

  

 At If, we are dedicated to creating positive customer journeys through data-driven solutions and innovative technology. Insurance is all about life, and when unexpected things happen, we are always by our customers’ side.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking an experienced and adaptable professional to join our team as a Digital Process Developer. In this role, you will translate business and customer needs into actionable tasks, lead testing and develop test plans and routines with stakeholders and the team.
   

  

 You will initiate and drive various projects, handle day-to-day contact with the development team, and drive cooperation within the squad, with stakeholders, and manage good relations with other teams.
   

  

 Additionally, you will bridge the gap between business needs and technical solutions with diverse teams and non-technical stakeholders.
   

  

**We offer**
 In the same way that we place high demands on you as an employee, we also expect you to place high demands on us as an employer. With us, you get the opportunity to become part of a team where everyone walks that extra mile – both for our customers and our colleagues. We welcome you to an informal working environment with lots of smiles and a positive attitude.
   

  

 Additional benefits of working at If:
   

  

* An including work environment where everyone is welcome
* Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics
* Social activities, as well as highly skilled professional environment
* Possibility of hybrid workplace
* Health promoting workplace with e.g., wellness allowance and various sports activities
* Great insurance benefits
* Lunch benefit
* High pension savings


**About The Team**
 You will be part of the Digital Development unit in Claims, responsible for meeting digital expectations across all Nordic markets and customer segments. Our agile mindset ensures efficient and effective value delivery. You’ll work closely with your squad and share experiences with colleagues across the Nordic region.
   

  

**Who are you…?**
 An initiative-taker, always looking for ways to improve processes and outcomes.
   

  

 A problem solver, tackling complex issues head-on with a can-do attitude.
   

  

 A collaborator, natural at facilitating, challenging, and analyzing with colleagues. A team player, building strong relationships and fostering collaboration across departments. Proactive and energetic, contributing to a positive team and company culture.
   

  

 An excellent communicator, bridging the gap between IT and operations, making complex information accessible.
   

  

 A self-leader, taking ownership, managing time effectively, and setting clear goals. Possessing a growth mindset, thriving in dynamic environments and open to new ideas.
   

  

 A tech enthusiast, enjoying working with stakeholders and development, with a keen interest in technology. Knowledge and/or experience in agile methodologies and a structured approach.
   

  

**You also have**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Systems Engineering or related field.
* Strong analytical skills and experience in business and process requirement analysis.
* Excellent communication, collaboration and stakeholder management skills.
* Proactive attitude with a passion for solving complex problems.
* Experience in creating, preparing and working with test management and test planning
* Fluency in English, both written and verbal


**Additional Facts And The Recruitment Process**
**Application deadline:** 
 Screening and interviewing will start immediately. However, the application deadline is 20th of September 2024.
   

**To apply for the position:** 
 Please attach your CV. After submitting your application, you will receive a set of tests designed to assess your skills and suitability for the role. These tests are an integral part of our recruitment process and help us ensure a fair and thorough evaluation of all candidates. Based on the test results will candidates be invited to interviews.
   

**Work location:** 
 Gothenburg or Stockholm, Sweden.
   

**Travelling:** 
 Some travel within the Nordics will be required.
   

  

**Start:** 
 As soon as possible/by agreement.
   

  

 For more information, please contact
   

  

 Hanna Lindahl, Chapter Lead, Service Development, Digital Claims +46 761 39 75 18.
   

  

 Martin Pettersson, Chapter Lead, Service Development, Digital Claims, +46 706 74 72 77.
   

  

 In addition to referral, candidates can also be checked via the internet and social media, to the extent it is allowed by local legislation.
   

  

 We look forward to your application!
   

  

**About Us**
  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.**
 To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Cloud Security Architect
description:
If IT Security is an If Group organization supporting If´s insurance business by maintain and develop cyber security actions within the entire If. If’s IT Security team provides security capabilities associated to the total infrastructure area. Our task is to review and assess the potential risk of new industry threats, as well as implement and manage technologies capable of detecting, investigating, and/or eliminating those threats.
   

  

 We are looking for a new Cloud Security Architect for IT Security team to work in the Cloud Security area where main responsibility is in the Cloud security. Our team is working with the business and IT architects as well as driving our own security initiatives to plan, build, deploy security controls within If’s environment.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Cloud Security Architect, you will play a critical role in ensuring the security and integrity of cloud-based systems within our organization. Your expertise will be focused on Microsoft Azure, but you may also work with other cloud platforms such as Google Cloud.
   

  

 Main responsibilities:
   

  

 Security Leadership and Architecture
   

  

* Act as a lead evangelist on security-related subjects related to Microsoft Azure, public cloud, container technologies, infrastructure transformation, networking, and data center operations.
* Create secure design recommendations for cloud applications, covering areas such as data protection, key management, authentication, and authorization.


 Subject Matter Expertise
   

  

* Serve as the subject matter expert (SME) on cloud security for our organization.
* Develop standards, policies, and procedures best practices documentation.
* Participate in working groups to tailor the company’s security policies and standards for use in cloud environments.


 Risk Assessment and Communication
   

  

* Translate security and technical requirements into business requirements.
* Communicate security risks to different audiences, ranging from business leaders to engineers.


 Technical Solutions
   

  

* Design technical solutions, including creating prototypes and proofs of concept while maintaining a security mindset.
* Collaborate closely with application developers and system administrators to deliver creative solutions to complex technology challenges and business requirements.


 Who are you?
   

  

 You have a security-oriented mindset with strong knowledge of cloud security principles and practices, and you have excellent communication skills to address client information security concerns. You are familiar with Azure security architecture and Azure Security portal. You have an ability to create and implement secure design patterns.
   

  

 You also have:
   

  

* A relevant degree such as Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Business, Technical, Engineering, Information Systems, Design, Education, Information Security, or Information Technology is preferred.
* Relevant certifications such as CISSP, TOGAF and cloud technology-related ones from Microsoft and Google are valuable but not mandatory.


 Additional facts and recruitment process
   

  

 Application deadline: Last date to apply is 6th of October
   

  

 Location: Turku, Espoo, Stockholm, Oslo or Copenhagen.
   

 To apply for the position: Please attach your CV and answer the questions on the application form. Please notice that we are not able to handle any applications via email.
   

 Travelling: Some travelling will be required since the role has responsibility throughout the countries in which If operates.
   

  

 Background check: Final candidates will undergo a background check before a job offer can be presented.
   

  

 For more information regarding the position, please contact Mika Rintamäki, Head of IT Security +358503291855, mika.rintamaki@if.fi.
   

  

 We are eager to hear from you!
   

  

**About Us**
  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.**
 To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Social Media Specialist & Creative
description:
**Job Description**
 As the Social Media Specialist & Creative, your mission is to execute a dynamic organic social media strategy that engages our community and aligns with our business objectives. You will drive the growth and performance of our social media channels to support sales, brand awareness, and customer engagement, ensuring a cohesive presence across platforms.
   

  

**Main tasks & responsibilities:**
* Collaborate with the Media & CRM Manager to set and optimize the strategy for our organic social media channels, including Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, Pinterest, LinkedIn, and emerging platforms.
* Develop and implement plans to enhance channel performance, meet sales targets, and achieve brand and customer KPIs.
* Analyse key metrics using a data-driven approach, making informed decisions to improve channel effectiveness and drive business results.
* Create, coordinate, publish, and optimize organic content across various digital platforms, ensuring it aligns with our brand and resonates with our audience.
* Work closely with Brand & Marketing Leads, AD, Merchandisers, Copywriters, PR, and Store teams to secure and adapt content for social media channels.
* Stay up to date with digital media innovations, identifying new opportunities and working with the tech team to integrate emerging technologies into our social media strategy.


**Qualifications**
 We are seeking a creative and analytical individual with a passion for fashion, social media and a keen understanding of digital trends.
   

  

 To be successful in this role, we expect you to have:
   

  

* Proven experience in social media management and content creation – from a fashion brand preferably
* Strong ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights to optimize social media performance.
* Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to convey complex information clearly and effectively.
* Collaborative mindset, with experience working cross-functionally to achieve shared goals.
* Up-to-date knowledge of social media trends and technologies, with a proactive approach to incorporating new tools and techniques.
* Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines efficiently.
* Experience with content creation tools and platforms is a plus.


**Additional Information**
 This is a full time (
 **maternity cover)** 
 role based in Stockholm (
 **Kungsholmstorg 5** 
 ) starting asap. If you feel your experience, skills, and ambitions are right for this role, please send your application (in English) and no need for cover letter, latest by
 **September 22nd, 2024** 
 .
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**Global Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**
 At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.
   

  

**Company Description**
 & Other Stories offers fashion-loving women a wide range of shoes, bags, accessories, beauty and ready-to-wear – all equally important for the whole look. We inspire women to create their own personal style and expression. Our ateliers design diverse collections with great attention to detail and quality, always with modern femininity in mind. Learn more about & Other Stories here.

title: Application Owner in Financial Crime Prevention
description:
**Job ID: 24739** 






  
 





 Do you have a can-do attitude and are you ready to take the next step as Application Owner in Financial Crime Intelligence, Investigations and Analytics (FCIIA)? Come and join the dynamic fight against international financial crime using the latest technologies and processes in a leading financial institution!
   

  

 Due to expanding requirements and continued success, we are looking for an Application Owner to expand our Financial Crime related Data team within FCIIA.
 





  
 





**Joining the Data team will provide you with multitude opportunities to support data-savvy end-users using your experience in:** 





* The day-to-day management of applications
* Maintenance and operations of applications in accordance with changing requirements
* Opportunities and threats impacting the future of applications
* Strategy for maintaining and renewing the applications



  
 





 The key to our success is the gift of having an enjoyable working environment with intellectual, driven colleagues who are keen to solve issues and continually improve the data and application landscape.
 





  
 





 At Nordea, we’re committed to being a partner our customers and society can count on. Compliance and integrity go hand in hand. Joining us means you’ll have an impact on how we do banking – today and tomorrow. So bring your ideas, skills and unique background. With us, you’ll be in good company with plenty of opportunities to collaborate, grow and make your mark on something bigger.  
 



**About this opportunity** 






  
 





 This is a role within the Financial Crime Investigation, Intelligence & Analytics (FCIIA) unit in Group Financial Crime Prevention (GFCP).
 





  
 





 Application Owners
 
 are accountable for applications being kept within risk appetite. That means they are accountable for providing the needed funding and priority to secure that requirements in the following areas are met:
 




* Application Documentation and Assets
* Application Access Management
* Application Incident and Problem Management
* Application Risk Management
* Application Technical Compliance
* Application Availability and Continuity Management
* Application Logging, Backup, and Retention
* Application Life Cycle, Portfolio, and Change Management
* Application Service Level and Support Management
* Application Information Classification, Integrity, and Data Governance



  

  



 The role is available in our Stockholm office.
 





  
 





**Who you are** 








  Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.
 





  

  



 To build a successful career with us, you’ll work well with others and always act with the stakeholders’ needs in mind. You love learning and trying new things, and you’re excited about bringing your ideas to the table. You’re honest and dependable, willing to speak up even when it’s difficult, and committed to empowering others. You’re passionate about doing a great job.
 







  You are a person who has a passion for data. You can analyse it to answer queries, but also understand where potential limitations exist and can creatively resolve them in either a tactical or strategic manner, as required. Identifying and resolving data issues is something that gives you great satisfaction.
   

  

**Your experience and background:** 





* +5 years of experience in working in application or product ownership
* Good hands-on level of experience in previously owned applications or products
* Academic degree in quantitative subject e.g. Computer Science, Mathematics, Finance
* Excellent English. Meetings, presentations and written materials are in English as standard
* Good interpersonal and stakeholder management skills
* You are proactive and bring a strong sense of ownership for your tasks and responsibilities
* You understand the principles of working with an Agile development approach
* You are excited to share ideas and findings with your team



  
 





**Your application will benefit from demonstrating experience in the below:** 





* Financial industry expertise
* Financial crime prevention
* Project management
* Stakeholder management
* Problem / incident management



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 30/09/2024
 



 . For more information, you’re welcome to contact Engelbert Samson
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered. 
 





  
 





 If you are an external consultant interested in this role and wish to apply please contact the hiring people leader for separate instruction on how to apply.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Finland:** 
 A security clearance will be performed for the person selected for this position.
 







**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.

title: MUST söker Analytiker till Nationella underrättelseenheten (NUE)
description:
**Nationella underrättelseenheten (NUE) är ett stående förband som skall användas i de internationella insatser, där Sverige har eller avser ha förbandsbidrag. Förbandet stödjer i insatsområden multinationella chefer, förbandschefer och nationellt styrkebidrag med nationella underrättelser. Förbandet tar även fram underrättelser för uppdragsgivare inom och utom Försvarsmakten nationellt. Förbandet är underställt chefen Must.**
**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
 NUE erbjuder ett omväxlande, spännande och meningsfullt arbete, där underrättelseanalys vid någon av NUE:s deskar i Sverige varvas med tjänstgöring i något av Försvarsmaktens insatsområden. Du kommer att arbeta med analys avseende ett geografiskt eller tematisk bearbetningsområde kopplat till något av de konfliktområden där Sverige har militära insatser. Arbetet syftar till att beslutsfattare i Regeringskansliet och svenska och multinationella militära chefer ska få bästa möjliga beslutsunderlag. I praktiken innebär detta att utifrån rapportering från olika källor identifiera mönster och dra relevanta slutsatser. NUE arbetar med en bred palett av frågor, från säkerhetspolitisk analys till taktisk underrättelsetjänst. Tjänsten innefattar att delta i planering och inriktning av inhämtning inom bearbetningsområdet, att ta fram skriftliga underrättelserapporter och att genomföra föredragningar. Vidare förväntas du samverka med olika aktörer både i Sverige och utomlands.
   

  

 Utlandstjänstgöring är en obligatorisk återkommande del av befattningen.
   

  

**Krav**
* Akademisk examen på grundnivå.
* Genomförd värnpliktsutbildning, GMU eller annan relevant militär erfarenhet.
* Svenskt medborgarskap.
* Körkort lägst klass B.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i både tal och skrift i svenska och engelska.


**Meriterande**
* Utbildning eller erfarenhet av underrättelseanalys.
* Akademisk examen på avancerad nivå.
* Utbildning i eller erfarenhet av underrättelseanalys
* Tidigare utlandstjänstgöring för Försvarsmakten, annan svensk myndighet eller annan internationell organisation.
* Tidigare arbetserfarenhet från Försvarsmakten eller annan relevant myndighet.
* Goda kunskaper om militära, politiska och kulturella förhållanden i konfliktdrabbade områden.
* Ytterligare språkkunskaper.
* Erfarenhet av och utbildning i samverkanstjänst.
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av kvalificerad analysverksamhet.
* Goda IT-kunskaper särskilt avseende analysverktyg samt Officepaketet.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Vi vill ha dig som är noggrann och har god stilistisk förmåga i både tal och skrift. Du är strategisk och kreativ. Du har systemförståelse och en god analytisk förmåga.
   

  

 Du har ett gott omdöme och är ödmjuk inför uppgiftens komplexitet.
   

  

 Du är en team player men kan även jobba självständigt. Du har god självinsikt och mycket god förmåga att bygga och upprätthålla relationer.
   

  

 Under pressade förhållande har du mycket god förmåga att behålla fokus och prestera. Att hantera korta och långa deadlines är inga problem för dig.
   

  

 Du är nyfiken och vill utvecklas inom verksamhetsområdet och en vilja att utveckla din personliga färdighet inom fältmässiga områden. Två av dina fritidsintressen är läsning och fysisk aktivitet.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 I denna process ber vi dig att ha tålamod, du har många steg att gå igenom och det är ett stort antal sökande som ska genomföra tester vid olika tidpunkter.
   

  

 I denna process använder vi oss av:
   

  

 Logiska tester
   

  

 Personlighetsbedömning
   

  

 Fystester
   

  

 Skrivtest
   

  

 Professionsintervju
   

  

 Säkerhetsprövningsintervju
   

  

 Du informeras löpande om du är kvalificerad för nästa steg.
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med 6 månaders provanställning, tillträde 2025-08-11. Tjänsten innebär att du kommer att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 Tjänstgöringen inleds under augusti 2025 med en gemensam utbildning. Utbildningen omfattas av ca 6 månaders grundkurs som innehåller bl. a. utbildning i underrättelsetjänst och militära färdigheter.
   

  

 Om du inte blir godkänd på grundkursen så avslutas din provanställning, Har du redan en anställning i Försvarsmakten så sker en omplacering.
   

  

 Befattningen är placerad i Stockholm.
   

  

*Då befattningen kommer omfattas av sekretess så uppmanar vi dig att vara restriktiv i din kommunikation angående att du sökt den här tjänsten.*
 Urval sker löpande och din ansökan ska innehålla CV samt ett personligt brev. I det personliga brevet vill vi att du motiverar varför du är lämpad för denna befattning. Bifoga även relevanta betyg och intyg så som OF/SO-examen, akademisk examen samt kurser/utbildningar du hänvisar till i ditt CV.
   

  

*För att bibehålla god fysisk och psykisk hälsa så erbjuder vi 3h fysisk träning i veckan på arbetstid. Arbetsgivaren står för träningskläder och vartannat år får du bidrag (f.n. 1.200kr) till träningsskor. Som anställd på NUE har du tillgång till samtalsledare som är specialiserad på insats och anhörigverksamhet.*
 Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-27
   

  

 Frågor om befattningen eller rekryteringsprocessen kan mejlas till: hkv-rekrytering-must@mil.se, vänligen ange ”Analytiker NUE” i ämnesraden.
   

  

**Fackliga representanter**
 SACO - Anders Markow
   

  

 OFR/O - Roger Ericsson
   

  

 SEKO - Katarina Kruse
   

  

 OFR/S - Maria Ekelund
   

  

 Samtliga nås via 08-788 75 00.
   

  

**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Militära underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänsten (Must) är en del av Försvarsmaktens högkvarter i Stockholm. Vi ger regeringen och Försvarsmakten kvalificerade beslutsunderlag om omvärldsutvecklingen och hot mot Sveriges och Försvarsmaktens säkerhet. Vår vision är ”Ett säkrare Sverige i en osäker värld”. Must är en kunskapsorganisation och erbjuder både spännande och för Sverige angelägna arbetsuppgifter. Här arbetar både officerare och civila experter inom olika områden, t ex statsvetenskap, IT, ekonomi, teknik, matematik och HR. En stor del av Must verksamhet omfattas av sekretess och vi ber dig därför att inte berätta att du sökt jobb hos Must för andra personer än dina närmaste. Läs gärna mer om Must och vår verksamhet här Varje dag och varje timme gör våra medarbetare insatser som påverkar andra människors liv, både i stort och smått, och både på hemmaplan och runt om i världen. Försvarsmakten ger dig möjlighet att utvecklas som människa och växa i din professionella roll. Vi är en ansvarstagande arbetsgivare och har en öppen organisation där vi ställer upp för varandra. I Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård och bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Försvarsmakten tillvaratar de kvaliteter som mångfald och jämn könsfördelning tillför verksamheten. Vi välkomnar därför sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter i våra rekryteringar. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Senior Teknisk Testare
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en Teknisk Testare och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.
   

  

**Vår ambitioner**
 Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* delta i fastställande av teststrategier
* analysera krav dokumenterade i användningsfall
* skapa manuella testfall och autotester.
* Skapa testdata
* Testa utvecklad funktionalitet manuellt både baserat på krav och utforskande test
* bygga automatiska tester av ny- och befintlig logik med Java i främst JBehave, Selenium, RestAssured.
* analysera incidenter och reproducera dem på testmiljöer.
* delta i supportarbetet (schemalagd 1 vecka var ca 6 vecka)
* tillsammans med övriga teamet analysera resultat av automatiska tester.
* delta i att kontinuerligt utvärdera och förbättra arbetssättet och dela sin kompetens och erfarenhet.


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av automatisering med Selenium, Cypress eller Playwright under de senaste 5 åren.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av automatisering med RestAssured, SoapUI eller motsvarande under de senaste 5 åren.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av test i JavaEE eller Spring Boot/Framework på Unix/Linux-plattform under de senaste 5 åren.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av manuell test mot användningsfall eller user stories av webbaserade applikationer de senaste 5 åren.


**Meriterande**
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av att bygga prestandatester med JMeter under de senaste 3 åren.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att automatisera tester på OpenShift/OCP under de senaste 5 åren.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av automatisering med JBehave eller Cucumber under de senaste 5 åren.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av Jenkins och IntelliJ eller motsvarande, under de senaste 5 åren.


 ISTQB-certifiering minst Foundation level.
   

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 19-09-2024
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.
   

  

 Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: ASIC Designer to global leader in ICT-solutions
description:
Ready to shape the future of mobile networks? Our client is seeking an ASIC Designer to join their dynamic team and drive innovation in 5G and 6G technology. If you have a passion for pushing boundaries and making a real impact, this is your chance to help create tomorrow’s connectivity solutions. Apply now!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Kista, Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Technology
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time
 



  

**Start date :**
 Immediately or by agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 Our client, a leader in information and communcation technology solutions, is at the forefront of creating the IPs that drive today's and tomorrow's mobile standards. With their ASIC IP unit based in the vibrant tech hub of Stockholm, they leverage the most advanced technologies, tools, and methodologies to stay ahead in the industry—and reshape it.
 


  


 They are currently seeking a highly skilled engineer with expertise in ASIC IP design to lead innovation in the rapidly evolving telecommunications sector. In this role, you will play a key part in steering and contributing to the advancement of 5G and 6G technologies.
 


  


 This is a consultant assignment, which means you will be hired by Academic Work and work as a consultant at the company in question. This is a long term assignment.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* The opportunity to work with tomorrow's technology and methodologies
  
* An international work environment characterized by a strong sense of collaboration and team spirit
  
* Being part of a dynamic unit where you can learn new things and experience exciting challenges through collaboration and creativity, with the possibility to grow within the company
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Implement and systemise IP or subsystem designs that enable 5G and 6G communication.
  
* Work closely with experts and senior specialists to drive who is responsible for IP or subsystem development, including modelling, RTL design, block and subsystem level verification.
  
* Drive continuous improvements in products and processes and develop competence in the technical domain.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Post-secondary education in engineering physics, electrical engineering, or embedded systems.
  
* Work life experience within ASIC and/or FPGA Design.
  
* Experience with SystemVerilog and/or VHDL.
  
* Fluency in English, both spoken and written.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Dedication to continuous improvement and optimizing workflows and processes.
  
* Passion for learning, innovation, and making a meaningful impact.
  
* Strong problem-solving abilities with a creative approach to finding solutions and seizing opportunities.
  
* A collaborative mindset that promotes teamwork and communication, while also thriving in independent tasks.
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Erik Örtegren or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth4@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15106988

title: Threat Analyst L2 - VMS & Threat Hunting
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for** 
**an Level 2 Threat Analyst,** 
**to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Managed Security Services domain.**
**About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**
 Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.
   

  

 Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.
   

  

 Today, we employ around 300 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Level 2 Threat Analyst who wants to make a difference in our Managed Security Services.
   

  

 Managed Security Services
   

  

 Truesec helps customers globally with Attack Prediction Services, Vulnerability Management Services and Managed Detection & Response services for IT and OT environments. Our services are all delivered by skilled security analysis teams that conducts 24/7 attack monitoring, threat hunting, threat intelligence analysis, and threat remediation. Our team of experts works tirelessly to identify and prevent cyber breaches, and to help increase our customers’ proactive cybersecurity defenses. Our goal is to be an extension of our customers’ IT organizations, customizing a combination of capabilities and tooling, tailored to prevent cyber attacks in the most efficient way.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 As an L2 Threat Analyst in the Threat Analyst team at Truesec you will work with a wide range of assignments, including vulnerability research and the production of remediation recommendations to customers of our Vulnerability Management Service (VMS). You will engage in external monitoring of the threat landscape, conduct active hunting and publish threat intelligence reports on your findings.
   

  

 As a Threat Analyst L2 at Truesec you are expected to have one or more focus areas where you excel in expertise utilized for both internal and external engagements. For this particular L2 Threat Analyst position we are looking for someone with a good understanding of vulnerabilities and how they can be exploited, as well as documented threat hunting experience and good understanding of different attack vectors. You will also be responsible for researching and writing technical reports on the latest trends within the cyber threat landscape.
   

  

 Your Potential Background
   

  

 We believe you have extensive experience in advanced security technologies such as EDR, NDR, vulnerability management, and threat intelligence. A genuine interest in threat intelligence, report writing, and a strong technical background are also crucial to fulfill the expectations within the role. Equally important is being actively engaged in developing new skillsets and knowledge development in the entire team by having a continuous learning mindset.
   

  

 Required Skills:
   

  

* ~3 years documented experience within cybersecurity
* A good and broad understanding of cyber kill-chains
* A basic understanding of malware
* A strong analytical mindset and way of working
* Experience in technical report writing e.g. Incident response reports or Penetration testing reports
* Confident in verbal and written communication with internal and external stakeholders


 Documented experience in one or more of the following areas are meritorious:
   

  

* Vulnerability Management (Web, OS)
* Penetration testing (Web, OS)
* Threat Hunting
* KQL (Kusto Query Language)


 Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.
   

  

 Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future
   

  

 If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.
   

  

 So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Projektekonom
description:

 Vill du vara med och forma framtiden? Är du en driven ekonom med passion för att optimera projektresultat? Vill du vara en nyckelspelare i ett innovativt företag där du får möjlighet att utvecklas och ta ansvar? Då har vi den perfekta rollen för dig!

* är certifierad redovisningsekonom eller har motsvarande utbildning i form av praktiskt arbete.

* Goda IT-kunskaper



  





**Varför välja oss på INTEC?** 




 Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande projekt i en tillväxtorienterad organisation. Vi erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsmiljö med goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och generösa förmåner.
