title: German-speaking Account Manager
description:
***Are you passionate about Sales and want to make an impact?***




  





*Academic Positions is a leading digital recruitment marketing provider for the global academic and research community. With over 16 years of experience, we have proudly partnered with more than 2,500 universities and research institutes across 60 different countries to assist in attracting exceptional talent. Our comprehensive solutions include job advertising, social media campaigns, and content marketing on academicpositions.com, as well as through external digital channels.* 




  





*Our primary focus is to support our customers in filling PhD, postdoc, and professor positions while enhancing their recruitment strategies. By leveraging our expertise in higher education talent attraction, we strive to help our clients become better recruiters. Over the past decade, we've experienced consistent growth and have emerged as one of the foremost academic career platforms visited by more than 4 million academic job seekers a year.* 




  





**The Role** 




 As Account Manager at Academic Positions, you will be overseeing a portfolio of new and existing customers and effectively managing relationships to drive profitable revenue growth.
 



 The suitable candidate will be responsible for sales and customer relations in the German-speaking market. Our clients are universities and academic institutions in the higher education and research sector. You will focus on establishing new relationships and developing existing accounts.
 



 Academic Positions provides our customers with a variety of services to attract international talents, such as job advertisement, employer branding, content marketing and social media solutions. You will receive continuous coaching and sales training from the team in order to develop and improve your sales skills over time.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




 We are looking for someone preferably with previous experience in new customer sales, and a proven track record. You are a fearless person determined to succeed and be motivated by challenges. High levels of creativity, problem solving-capability, goal-orientation, collaborativeness are highly regarded characteristics for this role as well as generally at Academic Positions.
 



  





**Your profile** 



* Used to working under pressure and gets motivated by challenges
* A positive person and a problem solver
* Dynamic and communicative, able to dispatch energy among the team
* Experience from a high level of competitive sports is a merit.
* Motivated by working towards challenging goals.
* Speak and write the German language fluently



  





  





**We are Academic Positions** 




 Team spirit is at the core of our company. Our employees come from all over the world and we love to share experiences and dive into different cultures. New employees can learn from our very talented and experienced colleagues and get support from them throughout their Academic Positions journey. We strive to live up to our core values (proud, brave, curious, fun, and passionate) in everything we do and create a dynamic environment to facilitate personal growth and professional development. We work in a bright new office space with great views in the middle of the city centre.
 



  





 We are not just hard-working, we also love to have fun! Enjoy Table tennis, Tv-games and go out for the occasional after work—or have it at work as we have a fully stocked refreshment fridge Learn more about our team, people, and values at weare.academicpositions.com.
 



  





 We evaluate candidates on an ongoing basis so we recommend that you apply early. We aim to respond to suitable candidates within 3 working days and an assessment is part of our selection procedure.
 



  





**Duration** 




 Permanent
 



  





**Working hours** 




 Full time, Monday - Friday, 08.30-17.30
 



  





**Employer** 




 Academic Media Group International AB
 



  





**Office location** 




 Kungsgatan 60, 111 22, Stockholm
 



  





**Website** 




 www.academicpositions.com
 



  





**Contact persons** 




 Jonas Marin
 



 +46(8) 408 35 000
 



 jonas.marin@academicpositions.com
 



  





**Application details** 




 We are reviewing applications continuously and will be calling for interviews during the application period.

title: System Engineer Domino
description:
Cambio är en av Nordens ledande leverantörer inom e-hälsa med ett heltäckande erbjudande inom hälso- och sjukvård. Vi erbjuder innovativa digitala lösningarna som skapar värde för vårdgivaren och en bättre och säkrare upplevelse för patienten. Vi är en viktig pusselbit i svensk sjukvård och är stolta över det. Idag är vi runt 1000 anställda i flera länder. Vi skapar framtidens hälso- och sjukvårdslösningar idag, och vi vill bli fler!  



  

**Din roll och teamet**  

Vill du vara med att förvalta och utveckla samhällsnyttig teknisk infrastruktur? Vill du använda dina kunskaper till att förbättra och digitalisera arbetet i våra kommuner? Då är den här rollen något för dig!  

  

I rollen som System Engineer blir du en viktigt del av Cambio Welfares tekniska organisation. Du ansvarar för att utveckla, specificera, bygga, förvalta och stödja våra kunders tekniska infrastruktur och våra interna IT-system.


Vår produkt Cambio VIVA är ett kraftfullt verksamhetssystem som underlättar arbetet för våra kommuner genom att samordna processer och arbetsflöden inom vård-och omsorg. Tillsammans spelar ni en viktig roll i att ge våra användare en bra användarupplevelse och ett pålitligt verksamhetssystem.  

  

Rollen innebär komplexa uppgifter inom olika systemområden som felsökning, test och dokumentation. Du arbetar såväl självständigt som i team och i nära samarbete med våra kunder.


På Cambio uppmuntrar vi egna initiativ som bidrar till utveckling av företaget och oss själva. För oss är det viktigt att du får möjligheten till att växa, både personligt och karriärmässigt. Vår kultur beskrivs genom tre ord ’’Trust’’, ’’Care’’ och’’Together’’ som karaktäriserar allt vi gör på Cambio.  



  

**Om Dig**  

För den här rollen söker vi dig som är en ansvarsfull, självgående och ödmjuk teamspelare. Du brinner för teknik och att arbeta med komplexa uppgifter inom olika systemområden. Du har lätt för att knyta nya kontakter, är pedagogisk i ditt sätt att kommunicera och sätter värde i bra samarbete såväl internt som externt.

**Krav**

* Genomförd gymnasieutbildning inom IT, teknik eller liknande
* Förmåga att kommunicera flytande på svenska i tal och skrift
* Förmåga att arbeta strukturerat, planera och prioritera ditt arbete
* Erfarenhet av HCL Domino/server/klient administration

**Meriterande:**

* HCL Notes/Domino utveckling
* Windows servers
* Paketering av programvara för distribution
* Certifikatshantering, SSL-certifikat m.m.
* SAML, OIDC (OpenID Connect)
* Linux
* DevOps
* Erfarenhet av journalsystem eller andra IT-lösningar i kommunal verksamhet eller hälso- och sjukvård

  



**Placeringsort**: Linköping eller Motala


För oss på Cambio är det viktigt med ett hållbart arbetsliv och därför tillämpar vi en hybrid arbetsmodell. Tillsammans med ditt team kommer ni överens om vilka dagar ni ska samlas på kontoret. Övriga dagar kan du arbeta hemifrån om du vill, men du är självklart alltid välkommen till kontoret också.


**Omfattning**: Heltid

**Anställningsform**: Tillsvidareanställning, 6 månaders provanställning


Urval sker löpande så varmt välkommen med din ansökan så snart som möjligt.


Vi uppmuntrar till och välkomnar alla ansökningar, men har tyvärr bara möjlighet att gå vidare med kandidater som befinner sig i Sverige och har rätt att arbeta här. Vi kommer att be om underlag under rekryteringsprocessen gång.  

  

**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**


Läs mer om oss**här!**


Passar inte just den här tjänsten dig? Läs mer om våra andra tjänster på karriärsidan **här!**

title: Data Scientist
description:
**We are looking for a Data Scientist or Data engineer within the field of Predictive Maintenance. We are driving a relaunch of Asset Health Monitoring AND Predictive Maintenance to accelerate digital transformation. In order to re-imagine our flexible, secure, and scalable cloud-based Internet of Things (IoT) platform we are looking for an Asset Health Monitoring Data Scientist.**

### **Assignment Description**


* You will drive development and continuous improvement that enables our business to connect to thousands of equipment in a secure, scalable and flexible way, with a focus on data analysis.
* You will design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and optimize algorithms using both conventional methods and as well as Machine Learning/AI tools, leveraging Tetra Pak equipment knowledge for predictive maintenance, condition monitoring and machine health monitoring.
* You will design, write, test and assist in implementing highly scalable and robust software to fit a variety of Food & beverage industrial equipment such as Homogenizers, Pasteurizers, Heat exchangers, Mixers, Freezers.
* You will collaborate closely with our global back-end teams, front-end developers and business owners to ensure system consistency, improve user experience and data-to-insight reliability.
* You will explore different ways of integrating the solution into the ecosystem.
* You will use your digital skillset to identify patterns and anomalies in equipment data, converting these insights into meaningful metrics for senior management, operators, service engineers and developers alike.


**Required Skills**


* A Bachelor’s degree, MSc or PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, Data Analytics, Information Technology or related field.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, Scala, and tools such as Jira, DevOps, Git, or similar software and cloud platforms such as Microsoft Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud.
* Work experience within the data analysis field with demonstrated achievements.
* A strong technical foundation with the ability to bridge the gap between data and insights, effectively “making sense of data” for a large group of end-users.
* Extensive experience with data: **cleaning, aggregation and visualization.**
* Demonstrated expertise with signal processing, including techniques for analyzing, filtering and interpreting.
* Experience with applying Machine Learning and AI on top of this is a strong plus.
* Previous experience in an Agile working environment is highly valued.
* The ability to work effectively in a global team setting, as well as independently, with a focused drive and commitment.
* An interest in hardware, mechanical systems and how it relates to the above will be meritious.


**Desired Skills**


* You are a natural team player with the ability to work in a multi-organizational environment.
* You are excited by complex problems, love to learn and have a hands-on mentality. You are a self-motivated person with strong result orientation.
* You understand the link between technical activities and business implications.
* Good communication skills are needed and as the work is conducted in an international environment being comfortable in the English language, written as well as spoken, is required.

title: Product Owner in Process Automation
description:
**Product Owner in Process Automation**
=======================================

#### **At ABB, we are dedicated to addressing global challenges. Our core values: care, courage, curiosity, and collaboration - combined with a focus on diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities - are key drivers in our aim to empower everyone to create sustainable solutions. That's our story. Make it your story.**

### **Your role and responsibilities**


As a Product Owner, you will play a crucial role in bridging product management with cross-functional teams to ensure system requirements are clearly defined and well understood. You will be responsible for communicating the product vision, setting objectives, and removing obstacles to drive the team towards successful outcomes. You’ll work hands-on with the team, analyzing product requirements and helping them grasp the nuances of each feature. Owning and managing the team backlog, you’ll prioritize tasks, and define clear acceptance criteria to ensure smooth progress. In your day-to-day, you will collaborate closely with the Product Manager, Release Owner, Architect, and System Product Owner, working in unison to deliver each release successfully. Your focus will be on delivering technical solutions that drive both the product and business outcomes, ensuring that everything is aligned for success. You will also work with leading technologies like IIoT, Cloud, Edge, container orchestration, Kubernetes, and more, ensuring the team leverages the most innovative tools to meet product and business goals. Join us and become part of an innovative team where your expertise will shape cutting-edge solutions and drive meaningful business outcomes, all while working in a dynamic and collaborative environment that values your growth and creativity.

### **Qualifications for the role**

* You hold a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
* You have 5+ years of experience in development or research within the relevant discipline.
* You possess professional experience with Agile methodologies, including Scrum, and are proficient in Azure DevOps.
* You are a collaborative team player, a fast learner who stays updated with industry trends, and you are comfortable working in teams spread across different countries and technologies. Additionally, you have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English

### **More about us**


As part of ABB Process Automation business area, the ABB Process Control Platform (PCP) organization is the value generating partner, creating digital control solutions for industries. We are managing the entire extended value chain from suppliers to the delivery, creating competitive advantage through improved customer satisfaction with optimized responsiveness, lead time, quality, cost and on-time delivery. In this role you will lead the delivery of high-quality software solutions being developed and distributed within Process Automation. Recruiting Manager Ashalatha Kunnappilly, +46 724 61 25 87, will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer: Mikael Blomqvist, +46 768 06 00 11; Ledarna: Leif Öhrberg, +46 724 64 40 16; Unionen: Krista Andersson, +46 706 44 02 85. All other questions can be directed to Talent Partner Linda Lundstedt, +46 722 05 65 54. Apply at the latest by October 6 (documents submitted in English are appreciated). Please note that interviews are held on an ongoing basis, apply today to secure your spot in the recruitment process! Please note that, to be eligible for employment at ABB AB, you will need to pass our pre-employment screening steps. This includes a reference check, a health- and drug test and could also include a background check. We kindly decline any direct contact with staffing and recruitment agencies as well as sellers of additional job advertisements We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe. #MyABBStory
company_description: ABB is a leading global technology company that energizes the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future.

title: 100% Remote! Senior DevOps/Engineer
description:
**100% Remote! Senior DevOps/Engineer**
---------------------------------------


Recas söker nu för HAVD-Groups räkning en duktig projektledare som ska arbeta på plats i HAVD Group Purtech AB i Ed. Fabriken producerar formgjuten polyuretanskum. Med över 40 års erfarenhet utmärker sig anläggningen i Dals-Ed inom produktion av formgjutet polyuretanskum.

**Du kommer att arbeta som DevOps/Engineer**
--------------------------------------------

**Kontor: 100% Remote**  

**Start: ASAP**

### **Vad du kommer att göra:**

* Utföra strategier som kan stödja ingenjörerna som gör hundratusentals byggen dagligen och mer därtill.
* Stötta med operativa uppgifter för att hålla systemen friska och uppdaterade.
* Driva automatisering och förbättringar av utvalda tekniska stackar.
* Hjälpa till att skala infrastrukturen för att stödja automatiserade system som gör massändringar över tjänsteflottan.
* Samarbeta med infrastrukturteam över hela företaget för att upptäcka vad en världsklass-infrastruktur innebär.

### **Vem du är:**

* Du är en erfaren ingenjör som är bekant med Linux och grundläggande nätverkskunskaper.
* Du är en erfaren mjukvaruingenjör med Java, och kännedom om Ruby är ett plus.
* Du har erfarenhet av att implementera lösningar och distribuera till GCP eller AWS.
* Du tror på iteration och vet att det viktigaste är att hitta rätt lösning, inte den första.
* Du gillar att fokusera på standardisering och automatisering och letar alltid efter sätt att förbättra utvecklarens upplevelse.
* Du har mer än 6 års erfarenhet av att bygga och implementera storskaliga system över olika projekt och team.
* Du har kunskap om och entusiasm för bästa praxis inom mjukvaruutveckling som testning, kontinuerlig integration och kontinuerlig leverans.

### **Färdigheter:**

* Erfarenhet av Linux-systemadministration
* HTTP/nätverk
* Google Cloud (föredras) / AWS
* Github (Administration/Operations), Gitlab skulle vara en fördel (om de inte har Github)
* JFrogs Artifactory-instans (Administration/Operations) eller Nexus
* Expert på Git
* Terraform
* Ansible
* Java (standardprogrammeringsstack)
* Docker
* Bra kommunikatör
  
* 

**Som en del i Recas familjen erbjuder vi dig:**
------------------------------------------------

* Maxat friskvårdsbidrag och årlig hälsoundersökning!
* Samtalsstöd för livets alla utmaningar.
* Möjlighet till förmåncykel.
* Rabatter på gymkort.
* Möjligheten att nyttja Innovatums badmintonhall under lunchtid.
* Frekventa AW:s och gemensamma aktiviteter som stärker oss som ett team.
* Pensionsrådgivning i samarbete med Max Matthiessen.
* Du är försäkrad via Euro Accident.
* Marknadens kaske bästa och mest intressanta erbjudande gällande semester


Vi väntar på dig. Vad väntar du på?

title: Kafkaspecialist
description:
*Det händer mycket inom integrationsområdet på Länsförsäkringar. Vi är mitt i en spännande resa där vi anpassar vårt område till nya affärskrav, där den gemensamma Kafka-plattformen en central del. Andra spännande områden som vi driver är införande av stöd för API-Management, Operational Datalayer, Self Service och förmåga för Asynkron meddelandeplattform. Är du den centrala spelaren vi söker till vårt Kafka-team? Verkar det intressant? Skicka din ansökan idag!*  


*I rollen kan beredskapsarbete förekomma.*  


**Om jobbet**
Som Kafkaspecialist kommer du initialt att arbeta med etableringen av lösningen samt arbetssätt. Du kommer att få vara med och göra design samt implementation av alla miljöer av ett Kafka-kluster från grunden.  


Ett annat viktigt område är utveckling av automatiserade skript och distributionsartefakter för Azure DevOps och OpenShift. Andra arbetsuppgifter är etablering av Self-service komponenter och att vara ett bollplank i diskussioner med utvecklare från andra affärsenheter.  


Du kommer att ha en viktig roll när det gäller att maximera värdet som teamet producerar och se till att stories uppfyller användarens behov och följer definition of done. Du arbetar nära Product Owner, Lösningsarkitekt och övriga Kafkaspecialister.  


**Vem är du?**
Du har erfarenhet att jobba i komplexa integrationslandskap och har ett stort intresse för integration och integrationsutveckling. Vi tror att du har några års erfarenhet av att arbeta med Confluent Kafka.  


Personliga egenskaper för att passa in hos oss är att du är ödmjuk, ansvarstagande och proaktiv med eget driv. Du har också förmågan att kommunicera på ett pedagogiskt och tydligt sätt på både svenska och engelska mot olika roller och verksamheter. Tidigare erfarenhet av bank/försäkringsbranschen är meriterande.  


På din meritlista tror vi att det står:
* Confluent Kafka (installation, administration samt utveckling)
* OpenShift alternativt Kubernetes
* Azure DevOps
* GIT, Pipelines & CI/CD
* Automation Scripting ( Bash & Unix)
* Event-driven architecture

  


**Om oss**
Det händer mycket inom integrationsområdet på Länsförsäkringar. Vi är mitt i en spännande resa där vi anpassar vårt område till nya affärskrav, där den gemensamma Kafka-plattformen är en viktig del.  


Andra spännande områden som vi driver är införande av stöd för strömmande data, Self Service och förmåga för asynkron meddelandeplattform. Vårt integrationslandskap består även av BizTalk, IBM Sterling Integrator, Nodinite, Apache Active, MQ/Camel och API-management. Har du erfarenhet av någon av dessa så är även det meriterande. Teamet präglas av en öppen dialog mellan varandra, mycket god stämning och högt engagemang.  


**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande?* *Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*  


**Sista ansökningsdag:** **2024-10-04**
  
Kort om tjänsten


**Anställningsform:** Tillsvidare
**Arbetsplats:** Stockholm
**Chef:** Ola Sundin
**Kontaktuppgifter:** ola.sundin@lansforsakringar.se
Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?


Bli en del av något större och börja jobba hos oss. En karriär hos Länsförsäkringar handlar lika mycket om att vara en hjälpande hand för våra kunder genom alla livets skeenden som att stärka lokalsamhället där du verkar.
company_description: Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?

title: Senior Cloud Arkitekt – Hjälp oss forma framtidens molnresor!
description:
**Ansök nu**

**Senior Cloud Arkitekt – Hjälp oss forma framtidens molnresor!**


**Vi står inför en otroligt spännande fas! Nu söker vi en driven och passionerad Cloud Arkitekt (SME) som vill vara med och bygga framtidens agila team och utveckla regionens mest spännande kunder. Som Microsoft Gold Partner och vår regions kraftiga tillväxt på området gör vi en stor satsning på att hjälpa våra kunder på deras resa med Microsoft-teknologi.**  

  

**Vad vi erbjuder dig:**


* En central roll där du får vara med och driva kunders molnresa framåt, från strategi till implementation.


* Konkreta case hos våra kunder som är pågående och under uppstart.


* Stöd och mentorskap från vårt nationella Portfolio-team, ett tight nätverk av experter som hjälper dig att leverera på topp.


* Möjligheten att jobba med en globalt erkänd stor kund och vara en del av deras transformation.


* En roll där du får vara med och bygga ett agilt team som arbetar med många av regionens mest intressanta företag.


* Utrymme att växa i en dynamisk miljö med Microsofts senaste teknologier och verktyg.


* En unik chans att skapa långsiktiga kundrelationer och vara en nyckelspelare i regionens utveckling.


**Vem är du?**


* Du är en Subject Matter Expert (SME) med en stark teknisk bakgrund inom molntjänster, särskilt inom Microsoft Azure.


* Du har erfarenhet av att leda projekt och driva framgångsrika molnmigreringar.


* Du trivs med att arbeta i ett agilt team och har en passion för att bygga långsiktiga lösningar.


* Du är kommunikativ, affärsmässig och har förmågan att anpassa tekniska lösningar till kundens specifika behov.


* Du vill vara en central person i vår regions tillväxt och skapa långvariga kundrelationer.



Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper som nyckelperson att driva våran regions affärer framåt.  

  

**Vad gör denna roll unik?**  

  

Det här är en möjlighet att bli en viktig kugge i en expansiv region där vi tillsammans med våra kunder formar morgondagens tekniklandskap. Du kommer få ingå och ta del av ett starkt, nationellt team och jobba nära både kunder och kollegor i en miljö där innovation och tillväxt står i fokus.  

  

**Vill du vara med på resan? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt fantastiska team!**


**Läs mer om några av de många anledningarna som finns för att jobba hos oss:**


* Våra förmåner - Här hittar du en översikt av de förmåner vi erbjuder på Sogeti.
* Din utveckling - Vårt mål är att den som är anställd hos oss ska vara på en ständig utvecklingsresa och bli den bästa versionen av sig själv.
* Topp 3 Sverige Bästa Arbetsgivare - Sogeti korrades som topp 3 Sveriges Bästa Arbetsgivare 2022 i Universums ranking. En utmärkelse vi är extra stolta över då det är en intern mätning från de som känner oss allra bäst - våra fantastiska sogetiare!

  
**Vi ser gärna att har erfarenhet av några av nedstående områden:**


* Expertis inom Microsoft Azure gärna i rollen som Cloud-arkitekt
* Molnmigrering och hybridlösningar
* Säkerhet i molnet
* CI/CD-pipelines med Azure DevOps
* Dataplattformslösningar kopplat till Azure
* Förståelse för Azure AI för att skapa innovativa lösningar


**Meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:**


* Att ha genomfört AI-pilotproject inom Microsoft plattformen
* Enterptise landingzones
* Azure Security Center, Azure Active Directory (ADD)


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan idag, urval sker löpande! Hoppas vi ses!

title: Teamlead
description:
*PostNord Group AB is a leading provider of communication and logistics solutions in the Nordic region. The Nordic Support department is responsible for enabling and ensuring the service management in Group function IT. The unit contributes with designing processes, concepts and implementing them in the service management areas to ensure that the processes provide desired business result.*

**Position Overview:**
----------------------


Do you want to be part of a dynamic and rapidly changing environment at one of the Nordic region´s largest companies? Are you interested to lead guide and support a team of system administrators and engineers toward achieving specific goals and objective this is the job for you!


As a Team Lead in System Operations, you will be responsible for leading a team of system administrators and engineers to ensure the smooth functioning and reliability of the organization's IT infrastructure. Your primary focus will be on managing daily operations, coordinating tasks, and providing technical guidance to team members. You will play a pivotal role in optimizing system performance, implementing best practices, and driving continuous improvement initiatives to enhance operational efficiency and effectiveness.

**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------

* Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of system administrators and engineers offshore.
* Goal Setting: Define team goals, objectives, and priorities aligned with organizational objectives.
* Incident and Problem Management: Lead incident response efforts and conduct root cause analysis for major incidents.
* Change Management: Manage change requests and coordinate system changes, ensuring adherence to processes.
* Performance Monitoring: Implement monitoring tools and analyze system metrics to optimize performance.
* Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations and procedures.
* Knowledge Sharing: Promote knowledge sharing and best practices within the team.

**We are looking for you who have**
-----------------------------------

* Fundamental knowledge in AWS cloud platform, DevOps, cloud operations
* Jira software, confluence and service management
* Prior experience as team lead in a global organization
* ITIL principles and foundation knowledge
* MS Office

### **Meritorious experience:**

* Knowledge in Azure cloud platform
* Team lead experience preferably in a technology or cybersecurity environment


We believe you are curious and motivated to learn new things - open to opportunities for further training and education. Strong communication skills, with the ability to engage team.

**We Offer You:**
-----------------

* Work in a Nordic and dynamic environment
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord´s own personnel foundation PostNord Plus
* Great occupational pension terms
* Great development opportunities

**We make everyday life easier**
--------------------------------


PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.  

We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at www.postnord.com

**Apply**
---------


Click here to apply


Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. In this recruitment, PostNord collaborates with Experis IT, which has extensive experience in recruiting IT specialists and managers. If you have any questions or need more information, please contact Recruitment Consultants Carina Eyoma at carina.eyoma@se.experis.com, +46 73-086 22 75 and Pia Boström pia.bostrom@se.experis.com, +46 70-3146866


We look forward to receive your application! The last application date, 2024-10-14


For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga


We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: SRE/DevOps/Back-End Engineer
description:
SRE/DevOps/Back-End Engineer


Swedium Global is looking for a Back-End Engineer for one of its customer


Do you love being in the flow as a developer and want to enable that for everyone else as well? Do you believe that the key to personal flow is in making the local developer build experience fast, well-integrated, automated and with meaningful insights? We are seeking a collaborative and curious Engineer to help drive and develop our CI infrastructure forward.


Introduction  

Continuous Integration (CI) is at the core of our developer experience. Company's growth and widespread presence has led us to require an ever wider and deeper range of target platforms to run CI against. In a context where early adoption and swift flexibility is at utmost importance we need to provide CI environments that enables us to deliver functionality to our customers with both speed and safety.  

This role will be part of a team collaboratively creating and owning our CI infrastructure for the customer which aims to provide our developers with a streamlined, simple to use and safe build experience at scale.  

The role is located in the Platform Developer Experience (PDX) studio within the Platform Mission. The PDX Studio oversees and owns the infrastructure that cuts across all engineering disciplines at Customer


What you’ll do  

Execute on Customer’s future CI infrastructure strategy that is able to serve 3000+ engineers doing 100’s of thousands of builds daily and beyond  

Support with Operational tasks keeping our systems healthy and UpToDate  

Drive the automation and improvements of our CI system across our current technical stacks.  

Help scale our CI infrastructure to support large-scale Monorepos.  

Collaborate with Infrastructure teams across the company to discover what a best in class CI infrastructure means.


Who you are:  

You are an experienced engineering familiar with Linux, MacOS, and Windows as well as Networking fundamentals  

You are an experienced Software Engineer with Java and Python  

You have experience deploying to and implementing solutions in GCP, Azure, and/or AWS.  

You believe in iteration and know that finding the right solution is more important than the first.  

You like to focus on standardization and automation; always looking for ways to improve the developer experience  

You have 6+ years of experience in building and implementing large-scale systems across various projects and teams  

You have familiarity with and enthusiasm for software engineering best practices such as testing, continuous integration, and continuous delivery


Skills  

Linux, MacOS, and Windows system administration experience  

HTTP / networking  

Google Cloud (preferred) / Azure / AWS  

Teamcity Integrations  

Ansible  

Java  

Python  

Docker  

Communication


  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : Linux, MacOS, and Windows system administration, HTTP/networking, GCP(preferred)/Azure/AWS, Anisble, Java, Python, Docker, Teamcity Integrations

title: Senior Technical Architect
description:
HCL is hiring Senior Technical Architect with good Devops Experience
  
Job Role
  
Provision and develop observability solutions on Azure and Kubernetes platforms, ensuring comprehensive monitoring and visibility across all services.
  
Design and develop Terraform code to implement Infrastructure as Code (IaC) for the onboarding and automation of observability tools such as Grafana, ELK, Opensearch Fluentbit, InfluxDB and other TICK stack components.
  
Deploy and configured observability tools such as Grafana or ELK using GitOps methodologies, ensuring streamlined, automated, and version-controlled deployments across the infrastructure.
  
Implement GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps pipelines to automate the deployment, upgrade, and configuration management of observability tools and ensure continuous integration and delivery.
  
  

**Knowledge/Experience must have:**  

**Monitoring experience:** Splunk, Grafana, Prometheus, , Uptime kuma
  
**Dev tools and knowledge:** Docker, Ansible, Git, Python, Java,Redhat Linux, SSL, OTM experience, , Weblogic
  
Self-drive, curious, enjoy and capable of problem solving, well organized,
  
See value of documenting team processes, happy sharing knowledge
  
  

**Good to have:**

title: System Engineer Domino
description:
Cambio är en av Nordens ledande leverantörer inom e-hälsa med ett heltäckande erbjudande inom hälso- och sjukvård. Vi erbjuder innovativa digitala lösningarna som skapar värde för vårdgivaren och en bättre och säkrare upplevelse för patienten. Vi är en viktig pusselbit i svensk sjukvård och är stolta över det. Idag är vi runt 1000 anställda i flera länder. Vi skapar framtidens hälso- och sjukvårdslösningar idag, och vi vill bli fler!
  
  

Din roll och teametVill du vara med att förvalta och utveckla samhällsnyttig teknisk infrastruktur? Vill du använda dina kunskaper till att förbättra och digitalisera arbetet i våra kommuner? Då är den här rollen något för dig! I rollen som System Engineer blir du en viktigt del av Cambio Welfares tekniska organisation. Du ansvarar för att utveckla, specificera, bygga, förvalta och stödja våra kunders tekniska infrastruktur och våra interna IT-system.
  
Vår produkt Cambio VIVA är ett kraftfullt verksamhetssystem som underlättar arbetet för våra kommuner genom att samordna processer och arbetsflöden inom vård-och omsorg. Tillsammans spelar ni en viktig roll i att ge våra användare en bra användarupplevelse och ett pålitligt verksamhetssystem. Rollen innebär komplexa uppgifter inom olika systemområden som felsökning, test och dokumentation. Du arbetar såväl självständigt som i team och i nära samarbete med våra kunder.
  
På Cambio uppmuntrar vi egna initiativ som bidrar till utveckling av företaget och oss själva. För oss är det viktigt att du får möjligheten till att växa, både personligt och karriärmässigt. Vår kultur beskrivs genom tre ord ’’Trust’’, ’’Care’’ och’’Together’’ som karaktäriserar allt vi gör på Cambio.
  
  

Om DigFör den här rollen söker vi dig som är en ansvarsfull, självgående och ödmjuk teamspelare. Du brinner för teknik och att arbeta med komplexa uppgifter inom olika systemområden. Du har lätt för att knyta nya kontakter, är pedagogisk i ditt sätt att kommunicera och sätter värde i bra samarbete såväl internt som externt.
  
Krav
  
Genomförd gymnasieutbildning inom IT, teknik eller liknande
  
Förmåga att kommunicera flytande på svenska i tal och skrift
  
Förmåga att arbeta strukturerat, planera och prioritera ditt arbete
  
Erfarenhet av HCL Domino/server/klient administration
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

HCL Notes/Domino utveckling
  
Windows servers
  
Paketering av programvara för distribution
  
Certifikatshantering, SSL-certifikat m.m.
  
SAML, OIDC (OpenID Connect)
  
Linux
  
DevOps
  
Erfarenhet av journalsystem eller andra IT-lösningar i kommunal verksamhet eller hälso- och sjukvård
  
  

**Placeringsort:** Linköping eller Motala
  
För oss på Cambio är det viktigt med ett hållbart arbetsliv och därför tillämpar vi en hybrid arbetsmodell. Tillsammans med ditt team kommer ni överens om vilka dagar ni ska samlas på kontoret. Övriga dagar kan du arbeta hemifrån om du vill, men du är självklart alltid välkommen till kontoret också.
  
**Omfattning:** Heltid
  
**Anställningsform:** Tillsvidareanställning, 6 månaders provanställning
  
Urval sker löpande så varmt välkommen med din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
  
Vi uppmuntrartill och välkomnar alla ansökningar, men har tyvärr bara möjlighet att gå vidare med kandidater som befinner sig i Sverige och har rätt att arbeta här. Vi kommer att be om underlag under rekryteringsprocessen gång.Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
  
Läs mer om osshär!
  
Passar inte just den här tjänsten dig? Läs mer om våra andra tjänster på karriärsidan här!

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.


At Boeing, we are all innovators on a mission to connect, protect, explore and inspire. From the seabed to outer space, you’ll learn and grow, contributing to work that shapes the world. Find your future with us.


Boeing Digital Support Operation Center is currently looking for a Senior DevOPS Engineer to join their team in **Gothenburg, Sweden**. This position will focus on supporting the Boeing Global Services (BGS) business organization.


As a DevOps Engineer at Boeing, you will play a pivotal role in streamlining our development and operations processes to ensure seamless software delivery and infrastructure management. You will collaborate closely with our development, operations, and quality assurance teams to build and maintain robust systems, automate deployment pipelines, and optimize performance, reliability, and scalability of our applications.

**Position Responsibilities:**

* Design, build, and maintain scalable and highly available infrastructure using modern DevOps practices.
* Collaborate with development, operations, and quality assurance teams to implement efficient and reliable deployment pipelines.
* Automate deployment, monitoring, and scaling processes to optimize system performance and availability.
* Implement and manage configuration management tools and infrastructure-as-code frameworks to ensure consistent and reproducible deployments.
* Identify and resolve bottlenecks, performance issues, and system failures in a timely manner.
* Implement and enforce security best practices throughout the software development and deployment lifecycle.
* Monitor system metrics and logs to proactively identify issues and propose solutions for improvement.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement new tools, technologies, and processes to enhance DevOps practices.
* Mentor and provide technical guidance to team members, fostering their growth and professional development.
* Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies to drive innovation and continuous improvement in our DevOps practices.
* Effectively contribute to building the overall knowledge and expertise of the technical team.
* Pioneer and support special projects, including integrations between SalesForce and JIRA for ticketing systems. Serve as a go-to resource for tools development and process improvement, with the ability to write small custom web-based tools for internal use.
* Lead initiatives to improve the experience of engineers and support staff by identifying and addressing pain points in their workflows. Actively seek feedback and implement changes to enhance productivity and job satisfaction.
* Conduct training sessions and provide mentorship to team members and other departments. Focus on teaching others to enable them to take on newer and bigger tasks, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement new tools, technologies, and processes to enhance DevOps practices.
* On call based roster (24x7 standby) every fourth to fifth week-additional compensation(overtime) and time off applies


This position is hybrid. This means that the selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite 2 days a week. This is at the hiring team’s discretion and could potentially change in the future.

**Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.**

**Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* 10+ years in software development or advanced technical support role
* 5+ yrs. of proven experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar role, with a track record of successfully implementing and managing infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
* Proven experience with AWS or Azure cloud platforms, with a focus on security, storage, compute, and monitoring services.
* Strong understanding of IAM policies, Key Vaults, and security best practices in cloud environments.
* Hands-on experience with Azure Monitor, AWS CloudWatch, or other similar monitoring tools. Proficiency in managing storage solutions such as Azure Storage, AWS S3, and related services.
* Experience with container orchestration platforms like AKS and/or EKS.
* Familiarity with disaster recovery and business continuity solutions.
* Fluency in English language

**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**

* 7+ yrs. of proven experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar role, with a track record of successfully implementing and managing infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
* Strong knowledge of AWS and experience deploying and managing applications within the AWS cloud environment.
* Proficiency in scripting and automation using languages such as Python, Bash, Perl, and PHP.
* Solid understanding of configuration management tools (e.g., Ansible, Chef, Puppet) and infrastructure-as-code tools such as Terraform, ARM templates, and AWS CloudFormation.
* Ability to write and integrate with small custom web-based tools for internal use, demonstrating basic web development.
* AWS Cloud Practitioner or AWS Cloud Developer certification
* Azure AI fundamentals certification
* 24X7 work environment on call

**Typical Education & Experience:**

Education/experience typically acquired through advanced education (e.g. Associates) and typically 1 or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience.


Relocation:


This position does not offer relocation. Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expense.

**Join us if you want to:**

* Get professional skills development with our virtual learning tools and platforms (Digital Campus, LinkedIn Learning, Degreed, EdX, Enterprise Mentoring, and Communities of Excellence & Practice)
* Broaden your experience in international projects, technical workshops and hackathons
* Enjoy additional days off for Christmas break (December 24th-January 1st)
* Participate in employee recognition program (Boeing PridePoints)
* Have Private Medical Insurance (Skandia)


Applications to this role will be accepted until the end of 26th September 2024

 **Export Control Requirements:** Not an export control position **Equal Opportunity Employer:**


We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not accept unlawful discrimination in our recruitment or employment practices on any grounds including but not limited to; race, color, ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military and veteran status, or other characteristics covered by applicable law.


We have teams in more than 65 countries, and each person plays a role in helping us become one of the world’s most innovative, diverse and inclusive companies. We are proud members of the Valuable 500 and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. Applicants are encouraged to share with our recruitment team any accommodations required during the recruitment process. Accommodations may include but are not limited to: conducting interviews in accessible locations that accommodate mobility needs, encouraging candidates to bring and use any existing assistive technology such as screen readers and offering flexible interview formats such as virtual or phone interviews.

title: System Engineer till Visma PubliTech
description:
***Är du en duktig System Engineer med intresse för teknik som vill bidra till ett agilt team? Vill du jobba i en familjär miljö med produkter som gör skillnad för vårt samhälle och välfärd ? Då kan detta vara tjänsten för dig!***

**Om rollen**


I rollen som System Engineer arbetar du med teknisk installation och uppgraderingar av våra applikationer och komponenter kopplat till våra HRM- och affärssystem. Du ingår i ett drivet mindre team med kunskap och förmåga att tillsammans hantera och utveckla vår SaaS-miljö. Vi arbetar främst med kunder inom den publika sektorn, kommuner och regioner. Placeringsort är flexibelt och det finns möjlighet till distansarbete.


Dina främsta arbetsuppgifter kommer att vara:

* Installation och underhåll av våra produkter i Hosting (SaaS tjänst)
* Konfiguration och felsökning av server/applikation
* Övervakning av applikationer/integrationer
* Säkerhetsarbete
* Teknikstöd vid kundprojekt

 **Vem söker vi?**

  

Vi söker dig som har ett stort intresse för teknik och serverdrift. För att lyckas i rollen ser vi gärna att du är projektorienterad, utåtriktad och noggrann. Vi tror att du ser vikten av din roll och värdet i en god leverans till kund. Vidare tror vi att du är lagspelare som sprider positiv energi i teamet. Du tar initiativ till och genomför förändringar som leder till förbättrade processer, bättre tillgänglighet och kundnöjdhet.


Vi tror att du har en högskole-/universitetetsexamen inom teknik/IT eller motsvarande kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt. Vidare kommunicerar du obehindrat i tal och skrift på både svenska och engelska.


För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har följande kvalifikationer:

* Windows Server, IIS
* SQL Server
* Tidigare arbete med serverinfrastruktur
* Erfarenhet av applikationsdrift

  

En eller flera av följande kompetenser är meriterande:

* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsarbete
* Erfarenhet våra produkter (Sesam,Personec P, Affärslösningar)
* Erfarenhet av DevOps och automatisering
* Erfarenhet av Linux och Containerteknik

 **Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**


Visma PubliTech är ett bolag inom Visma-koncernen. Vi drar fördelarna av att vara ett mindre, entreprenöriellt bolag med ett nära samarbete och en varm familjär kultur, samtidigt som vi ingår i en av Europas ledande IT-koncerner. Vår vision är att stärka offentlig sektor med innovativa lösningar som bidrar till maximerad verksamhetsnytta och ett hållbart samhälle.  

  

Vi är oerhört stolta över vårt höga medarbetarengagemang som placerar oss på topp-fem procent i tech-branschen!

**Gör skillnad från dag 1:** Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka såväl företaget som din egen utveckling. Vi vill se dig äga din roll, och ger dig således frihet under ansvar för att nå de mål som vi har kommit överens om.

**Flexibilitet i alla skeden av livet:** Vi vet att du är så mycket mer än bara ditt jobb. Det är därför viktigt för oss att vi erbjuder dig en bra balans mellan fritid och arbetsliv. Vi har en flexibel hybridmodell mellan arbete hemifrån och på kontoret utifrån behov och önskemål.

**Framför allt är vi ett team:** Teamkänsla är det som får oss att kunna hålla våra löften och leverera på en hög nivå, men också det som gör att vi kan främja en hållbar företagskultur där vi stöttar och bryr oss om varandra.

 **Ansökan**


Du söker tjänsten via länken. Vi kommer gå igenom urvalet och kalla till intervjuer löpande, skicka därför in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Har du frågor eller önskar mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta: Joacim Mansfeldt, Tech Manager: joacim.mansfeldt@visma.com


I denna rekrytering kommer bakgrundkontroller att genomföras på slutkandidat


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

  

Läs mer om vår Privacy Statement här: https://www.visma.com/privacy/.

title: Software Integration Engineer
description:
We are now looking for a driven and proactive software integration engineer. We expect that you must be an open-minded person who likes to discuss technical solutions and are not afraid to take on new ways of working. You will be the part of a constantly developing team in order to meet the continuous integration and deployment vision.

 **Your Background**


We would like to see that you have a degree in IT and 5 years or more of working experience within software engineering industry. The service requires that you have a wide range of skills ranging from practical development to the mentioned knowledge and qualities below. You will join the newly created CI/ CD team, and play a very critical role and influence a lot. It is expected that you should have previous experience in DevOps set-up work in combination with management of build environments and build release tasks.

 **Duties and Responsibilities**

* Integrating software applications
* Maintaining and developing build environment infrastructure
* Modifying and developing quality assurance tools and other tools used
* Discussing technical solutions with suppliers (internal/ external)
* Supporting technical investigations and task force activities
* Assisting the development teams in best practice around build and test automation
* Set-up and maintaining CI/ CD infrastructure
* Tooling setup and configuration

**Qualifications**

* B.Sc. within electrical/ computer engineering or equivalent level of education
* Love writing clean code with Shell Script, Python, Groovy, Ruby, etc.
* Familiar with version control .e.g Git and understand git workflow
* Experience with Jenkins/ GoCD/ Gitlab-CI
* Experience with Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Salt
* Experience with Jira + confluence
* Experience with Docker, Kubernetes
* Experience with Cucumber, RobotFrameWork
* Fluent in English in both speech and writing
  

  

**Merit****s**

* Experience from software integration, design and development
* Experience in formal software development processes, such as Kanban and Scrum
* Good communication skills
* Good collaboration ability within development teams and other stakeholders
* Comfortable working with many others in an dynamic agile set-up
  

  

**Personal Qualities**

* Strong commitment to develop world class products with high precision
* Structured with good documentation and communication skills
* Self-driven and reliable
* Result and business oriented
* Strong team player with persistence

title: (Associate) Software Delivery Manager – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The EIB, the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Group Corporate Services Directorate – Group Digital Office (GCS - GDO) – Business Solutions Department (BSD) - Risk Management & Regulatory Division (RD) - Credit Risk Unit (CR) at its headquarters in Luxembourg, an
 **(Associate) Software Delivery Manager** 
 \*.
   

  

**This is a full-time position at grade 4/5 for which the EIB offers permanent contract** 
**(an 80% part time could be accommodated)** 
**.**
*Panel interviews are foreseen as from September 2024.*
* internal benchmark:(Associate) Officer IT Applications.


 Purpose
   

  

 The Credit Risk (CR) Unit develops applications that are at the heart of the EIB, supporting core business activities. We are constantly innovating the way we work and how we develop software, using state of the art technologies.
   

  

 We are looking for someone who is passionate in shaping the future of digital experience for the EIB Group as part of the Group’s Digital Transformation Program. You will be assisting multiple cross-functional teams in the design and implementation of software products providing solutions to business needs in credit risk management.
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 You will be reporting directly to the Head of Credit Risk Unit and closely collaborating with IT teams and internal business customers.
   

  

 What will you do?
   

  

* You coordinate with cross-functional teams including functional analysts, software engineers and quality assurance engineers to fulfil project-specific tasks, assign roles based on expertise, and foster a high-performing and continuously improving team dynamic.
* You take on the challenge and make it happen! You focus on results with a self-driven and can-do attitude.
* You oversee and facilitate business analysis activities alongside business analysts, stakeholders, and external consultants, aiming to create application specifications that meet business requirements.
* You work closely together with the squad leader and business owner to develop a vision and path to achieve it, defining priorities and coordinating with all relevant stakeholders.
* You apply and promote DevSecOps and agile development practices to deliver business value on a regular basis.
* You are a firm believer of continuous improvement and actively monitor key performance indicators such as DevOps Research and Assessments (DORA) metrics.
* You actively disseminate information, share knowledge, and promote a culture of compliance with IT policies, procedures, and guidelines among all staff members.


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in computer science or related disciplines
* Minimum 3 years of relevant professional experience in coordinating internal and external Agile software development teams and projects, preferably in the financial or banking sector. (Preference will be given to candidates with more senior exposure)
* Excellent knowledge of agile and project management principles, methods and practices
* Project experience preferably with in-house developed applications, using technologies such as Java, JavaScript, React and Python
* Experience working in multicultural teams, preferably working with external service providers in a multisource environment
* Good understanding of DevSecOps principles (experience with Azure DevOps is preferable)
* Additional knowledge of Credit Risk is a strong advantage
* Additional experience working with managed services or dealing with service providers is a strong advantage
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*), with a good command of the other.


 Competencies
   

  

 Find out more about EIB core competencies here
   

  

*(\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

**This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until the position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.**

title: Solution Architect
description:
*Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside you”, ”behind you” och ”before you”. Vi kallar det för ”The Iver way”.*
*Nu söker vi en lösningsarkitekt med intresse för Presale som vill bli en del av Iver och som vill vara med och bidra till bättre IT-lösningar som gör skillnad för våra kunder!* 
*Är du vår nya kollega?*
**Din roll på Iver?**
 Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation. Iver har cirka 1 500 medarbetare och omsätter drygt 3 miljarder SEK.
   

  

 I rollen som Solution Architect blir du en del av vårt team inom affärsvertikalen Bank & Fintech. Tillsammans arbetar vi för att säkerställa att våra kunder får bästa möjliga lösningar, med djup förståelse för kundens verksamhet driver vi digital transformation med ett gemensamt intresse för hur vi kan utveckla kundens affär.
   

  

**Vad ingår i tjänsten som arkitekt hos oss?**
* Designa och implementera tekniska lösningar som uppfyller våra kunders behov.
* Vara med och utforma nya tjänster och leveranser.
* Ansvar för arkitekturen av våra kundleveranser och vidareutveckling inom området.
* Du kommer få fria händer för att hitta nya spännande lösningar/effektiviseringar på utmaningar inom leveranserna.


 En viktig del av din roll kommer vara att utbilda och vägleda andra tekniker i våra team. Detta kan innebära att du hjälper dem att förstå komplexa tekniska koncept, ger feedback på deras arbete och hjälper dem att utveckla sina tekniska färdigheter.
   

  

 Du kommer att behöva kommunicera effektivt med både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter. Detta kan innebära att förklara tekniska koncept på ett sätt som icke-tekniska kunder kan förstå, samt att kommunicera teamets framsteg och utmaningar.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
**Iver - Where technology meets business.** 
 Hos Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. Iver är ett bolag med entreprenöriella rötter och en kultur som präglas av flexibilitet och samarbete. Vårt mål är att våra kunder – här i Norden och internationellt – ska se oss som en ledande partner för digital transformation.
   

  

 På Iver är vi inkluderande och strävar efter genuint samarbete där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer – inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden.
   

  

 Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser och vi är övertygade om att det är så vi utvecklas.
 **We’re not big blue. We’re yellow.** 
 Stora nog att skala och agila nog att innovera.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
 Vi söker dig som har en bakgrund inom systemutveckling eller drift men som har jobbat med arkitektur de senaste åren. Arkitektrollen kräver att du är lösningsfokuserad med god kommunikationsförmåga. Rollen innefattar även mycket fria händer där vi ser att du är driven att skapa förbättringar och trivs med att grotta i komplexa tekniska lösningar för våra kunder. Du kommer att behöva förstå våra kunders affärsbehov och översätta dem till effektiva tekniska lösningar som är förvaltningsbara och säkra.
   

  

 Tjänsten kräver goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift. Erfarenhet ifrån Bank & Fintech är meriterande men inget krav.
   

  

**F** 
**ör att lyckas i rollen vill vi att du har kunskaper inom flera av områdena:**
* Kubernetes/OpenShift, IaC (t ex Terraform).
* Mycket goda kunskaper inom Windows & Linux.
* Hårdvara och mjukvara för cybersäkerhet som NGFW, EDR, SIEM m.fl.
* Flertalet operativsystem och databaser samt nätverkskunskap.
* DevOps (CI/CD, automation)
* Något utvecklingsspråk (Python, Go, C#, PowerShell)


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av något modelleringsverktyg Visio, Draw IO.
* Erfarenhet av arkitektur inom moln-teknologier.
* God erfarenhet av PCI-DSS.


 Ivers affärsområde Bank & Fintech ansvarar för tjänsteleverans och drift för kunder med särskilda säkerhetskrav. Av denna anledning kommer vi i rekryteringsprocessen genomföra bakgrundskontroller.
   

  

**Placeringsort**
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Sverige & Norge. För denna roll ser vi att du utgår från ett av våra kontor i Solna, men rätt kandidat kan bo med omnejd till Stockholm.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-09-30. Du är välkommen att kontakta Poonam Jain (poonam.jain@iver.se) vid frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Välkommen till Iver!

title: Security Operations Engineer
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, TV channels and production studios. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Security Operations Engineer** 
 for our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The role**
 We’re looking for a Security Operations Engineer to manage and implement best-in-class web cybersecurity to protect our platform at all times.
   

  

 To thrive in this role, you enjoy the technical details. You will be working with engineering to evaluate and configure new observability and monitoring systems. Also, you will be researching and adopting new security measures, ideating new scenarios for incident xresponse dry-runs and tabletop exercises. This is a hands-on role where you will work both individually and be part of a wider community with whom you will collaborate closely.
   

  

 Viaplay is in the forefront of the streaming industry offering both VOD and Live Sports content, which means that the stakes are constantly high since customers count on a stable and uninterrupted viewing experience. We offer a diverse workplace, a learning culture and a high degree of autonomy.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Owning and evangelizing web cybersecurity initiatives as part of Technical Operations
* Ownership of the edge security domain including Web Application Firewalls, automatic mitigation, third-party integrations, monitoring, and data processing pipelines
* Security Operations including monitoring, detecting, analyzing, and responding to web security events
* Collaborate with product engineering to help secure their web applications and APIs against web security threats
* Full-stack development of security tooling in support of Security Operations


**What We’re Looking For**
* Experience of Security Operations and DevOps
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Cybersecurity, or a related field, or equivalent experience, with at least 3 years in IT security or related roles
* Knowledge of security vulnerabilities in web and mobile platforms and proficiency with advanced security tools for detection and remediation
* Strong communication skills for effective collaboration and leading security initiatives
* Experienced with AWS cloud services and security solutions including AWS WAFv2
* Experience with Splunk Cloud or similar observability environments
* Full-stack application development, experience in Golang, JavaScript and Python


**Our offering** 
  

  

* We’ve got the basics covered (and then some)! 30 days of paid vacation every year and extra compensation on top of a parental pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We have an attractive pension and insurance scheme with full health care coverage should you need it.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill with the freedom to try new things in autonomous teams. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development, while always making sure you feel supported with regular knowledge-sharing sessions, technical training, mentorship opportunities and peer-to-peer networks.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including live sports & pay per view events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Non-Functional Test Engineer
description:
**Job ID: 25916** 






  
 





 Would you like to be a part of Quality Assurance community and enable, as well as improve non-functional testing in development initiatives? 
 



 We are looking for a Non-Functional Test (NFT) Engineer with several years of experience who will drive and manage the non-functional testing in IT initiatives.
 







 Nordea is a place where traditions meet tomorrow. We’re not just a bank, we’re a tech employer on a mission to evolve finance securely and responsibly. Together, we impact millions of people’s daily lives by ensuring they can access our solutions anytime, anywhere, while safeguarding their personal data and wealth. So bring your skills, ideas and unique background. With us, you’ll find plenty of opportunities to grow and make your mark on something bigger. Join us in making an impact on the banking industry.
 





  
 





**About this opportunity** 






  
 





 Welcome to the Quality Assurance Team in Sanctions Technology. You will be joining a highly competent team of testers and automation engineers within Sanctions Technology. We work very closely with GFCP Sanctions business unit which sits within Nordea’s Group Financial Crime Prevention unit and comprises employees across Denmark, Finland, Norway, Sweden, Estonia, Poland, the United Kingdom and consultants from IT services vendors in India. you’ll play a valuable role in increasing quality of delivered solutions, focusing on the different quality attributes.
 





  
 





**What you’ll be doing:** 





* Responsible for driving NFT activities to meet common goals of Nordea Quality Standard
* Improvement of NFT test process within our continuous delivery environment
* Conduct Performance tests for features and applications based on the non- functional requirements
* Create test scripts, test scenarios , execute tests , analyzing test reports
* Working closely with Testing, Development, DevOps and Product Management teams in a Continuous Delivery environment
* Ensure pre-requisites like Test data and Environments are achieved before each test cycle
* Communicate test results on a timely basis to stakeholders and defect reporting
* Support Implementing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for test libraries
* Identifying and implementing improvements for day-to-day tasks/challenges



  
 





**Who you are** 






  
 





 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.  
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe that you :** 





* Have experience in end to end non-functional testing and analysis/ troubleshooting
* Have a proactive, innovative, and solution & self-driven mindset.
* Are technically strong and passionate about getting to know modern technologies
* Are eager to learn and comfortable with delivering a variety of tasks in an evolving and changing environment
* Demonstrates a high degree of structure, flexibility, planning and prioritization skills, and delivers in a timely manner, with focus on quality
* Are familiar with working in a complex environment with multiple streams cross multiple internal organizations, with people from different cultures and companies
* Strong Communication Skill



  
 





**Your experience and background:** 





* Bachelor in Computer Science, Information Systems or related discipline, or equivalent work experience
* Have good hands on experience in performance test using JMeter/Load runner
* Experience in load testing JMS messaging systems-IBM MQ
* Have good knowledge in SQL and Linux commands and queries
* Have hands on experience with :Jenkins , JIRA , GIT , Putty , Splunk ,AppDynamics, Grafana
* Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment
* Experience in CI/CD / DevOps toolchains
* Experienced working agile according to SAFe
* Fluent in English, spoken and written



  
 





**It will be an advantage if you:** 





* Have a solid grounding in Financial Service
* Have proficiency in managing functional and non-functional testing on a large-scale project
* Are able to coach more junior engineers, support others with effective testing
* Are ISTQB Certified
* Are familiar with DORA



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps** 






  

  



 Submit your application no later than 30/09/2024.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





**For candidates from Sweden:** 
  For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





**For candidates from Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
   

  

 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
   

  

 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf.
   

  

 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Solutions Architect, ISV
description:
**Description**
 Are you passionate about guiding top software companies in the Nordics and Baltics in their global innovation and acceleration? Do you want to help our customers adopt agile operation models, build modern SaaS architectures, and help them be at the forefront of their Generative AI transformation?
   

  

 As a Solutions Architect at AWS, you’ll build technical relationships with customers of all sizes and operate as their trusted advisor, ensuring they get the most out of the cloud at every stage of their journey.
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.
   

  

 We're also open to hire for the position in Helsinki, Oslo and Copenhagen.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 You will manage the overall technical relationship between AWS and our customers, making recommendations on security, cost, performance, reliability and operational efficiency to accelerate their challenging projects.
   

  

**You Will Also**
* Educate customers on the value proposition of AWS, and participate in architectural discussions to ensure solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloud.
* You will build the technical relationship with customers and operate as their trusted advisor. The best interests of the customer will shape the guidance you provide.
* Internally, you will be the voice of the customer, sharing their needs and wants to inform the roadmap of AWS features
* You will participate in the creation and sharing of best practices, technical content and new reference architectures (e.g. whitepapers, code samples, blog posts) and evangelize and educate about AWS (e.g. through workshops, user groups, meetups, public speaking, online videos or conferences).
* Contribute to the growth of the Solutions Architecture organization by hiring, coaching and mentoring others.
* Develop areas of depth in technical domains relevant to your interests and your customer's outcomes.


 If you can educate AWS customers about the art of the possible, while challenging the impossible,
   

  

 come build the future with us.
   

  

**About The Team**
 The AWS ISV Solutions Architecture team is dedicated to working with software companies. We’re here to help customers to design and build some of the most scalable, flexible and resilient cloud architectures and solutions – cost efficiently to enable them to expand their business globally.
   

  

 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

 The ISV Solutions Architect team is part of the global Sales, Marketing and Global Services (SMGS) AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) which is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Background in Cloud Architecture, Systems Design, Software Development, Infrastructure Architecture or DevOps across industries.
* Technical Degree (Computer Science, Maths, Engineering or equivalent) and/or relevant tech experience
* Experience in managing complex sales processes with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product and technical challenges
* English business level communication skills written and verbal


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience and familiarity with software companies.
* Prior domain experience in enterprise cloud adoption and operating production workloads on AWS
* Knowledge of cloud native design patterns, DevOps practices and AWS services
* Experience with or understanding of common enterprise regulations, security and compliance standards
* Public speaking experience or passion for creating technical content
