* Work in a Nordic and dynamic environment
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord´s own personnel foundation PostNord Plus
* Great occupational pension terms
* Great development opportunities

**We make everyday life easier**
--------------------------------


PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.  

We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com

**Apply**
---------


Click here to apply


Welcome with your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. In this recruitment, PostNord collaborates with Experis IT, which has extensive experience in recruiting IT specialists and managers. If you have any questions or need more information, please contact Recruitment Consultants Carina Eyoma at carina.eyoma@se.experis.com, +46 73-086 22 75 and Pia Boström pia.bostrom@se.experis.com, +46 70-3146866


We look forward to receive your application! The last application date, 2024-10-14


For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga


We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Receptionist Scandic S:t Jörgen
description:
Scandic S:t Jörgen är ett modernt och trevligt hotell mitt i Malmös stadskärna. Hotellet är stort med ett varierat gästutbud – från affärsresenärer och konferenser till idrottsgrupper och events. Vi har ett väl utvecklat samarbete med övriga Scandichotell i Malmö vilket gör att utvecklingsmöjligheterna på hotellet sträcker sig längre än över avdelningsgränserna. Vi är ett stort gäng som är stolta över vår arbetsplats, vi ser efter varandra och gör vårt yttersta för att alla ska trivas på vårt spännande hotell. Genom precis detta arbetssätt skapar vi fantastiska hotellupplevelser till våra gäster.


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic S:t Jörgen.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en visstidsanställning på deltid.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

10963 Berlin

title: Marketing Manager to Epishine
description:
Are you a driven and confident communicator with a passion for working in dynamic and innovative settings? Do you bring experience in content strategy and digital marketing, with a track record of driving impactful initiatives? Are you ready to take on an important role in a fast-growing scale-up within the clean energy sector, contributing to a more sustainable future? If so, the position of Marketing Manager at Epishine could be the next exciting step in your career!
  
  

About Epishine Epishine is a Swedish energy impact company, reimagining the capture of light with market leading printed organic solar cells. Our technology captures indoor light to make electronics self-powered, making cables, disposable batteries and unnecessary maintenance a thing of the past. At Epishine, we foster a culture of collaboration, creativity and innovation where we encourage our employees to challenge the status quo and drive innovation. Go to www.epishine.com to read more about Epishine and our vision.
  
The missionWith two of our brilliant marketing and communication colleagues going on an exciting journey to raise future global citizens, we are now seeking an experienced Marketing Manager to support and bring their expertise to our Commercial team.
  
As our Marketing Manager, your focus will be on shaping our external communications by bringing our strategy to life across all media platforms and connecting with diverse target groups. You'll be crafting engaging content for our channels to strengthen Epishine’s tonality and brand recognition. You'll also be diving into the data, measuring the impact of our communications and fine-tuning them to support our sales team in the best way possible. You'll get to wear many hats, working closely with external partners like customers and service providers, and you'll be the go-to person for coordinating with press and media outlets. Your mission? To make sure Epishine is present in all the right places and spaces.
  
Whilst this is a temporary position, based in our headquarters in Linköping, there may be opportunities for long-term employment depending on future needs and circumstances—while we can’t make any promises, we're always excited to see where things might lead!
  
Who are we looking for?We are seeking a marketing professional with at least 3 years of experience who enjoys crafting targeted messages and content for various stakeholders. Ideally, you have experience with messaging orchestration and content creation, especially in written form. Familiarity with Adobe Creative Cloud or similar tools is a plus and a degree in communication is beneficial, but not essential. It’s also an advantage if you have experience in press-related activities, project coordination, and working with diverse stakeholders.
  
We’re looking for a proactive and self-motivated individual who takes initiative and handles tasks with precision and organization.You excel at building strong relationships both interally and externally, and your technical interest helps you toeffectively communicate the value of Epishine and our products.With youropen-mindedness and creativity, your contributionwill be key in shaping and promoting our brand with fresh and impactful ideas.Strong English skills are important, as all our communication is conducted in English, and you’ll be collaborating with colleagues and customers worldwide.
  
What do we offer? This is a temporary full-time position, starting as soon as you are ready, until August 2025. During your time at Epishine, you will gain valuable experience in navigating an exciting scale-up journey, using your and your colleagues’ creativity and marketing abilities to contribute to our mission to pioneer printed solar power - for people and planet. At Epishine, we offer the chance to be part of an exciting journey and the opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable planet. As a quickly growing scale-up, there will be opportunities for development, and you will have brilliant colleagues to collaborate with and learn from. Additionally, we offer pension and insurance benefits, yearly wellness allowance and a friendly company culture where collaboration, innovation and sustainability are at our core.
  
Application procedure Does this role sound exciting? We work with ongoing selection, so send in your application today if you are interested. The start date is flexible, but as soon as possible if we get to decide!
  
At Epishine, we believe in finding the right fit—not just for us, but for you too! As part of our recruitment process, we use personality and logic tests to get a deeper understanding of your strengths, problem-solving skills, and how you approach challenges. These tests help us ensure that we’re building a team where everyone can thrive and work well together.
  
We value diverse perspectives and believe that each individual brings something unique to the table. Our aim is to make sure that the role aligns with your skills, personality, and aspirations, and that you'll feel right at home within our team. So, don’t worry—these tests aren’t about catching you out; they’re about making sure we’re the perfect match for each other!
  
If you have any queries about this recruitment, please contact our recruiter Emma Bjurling (emma.bjurling@epishine.se)

title: Junior Mekanikkonstruktör till Saab i Linköping
description:
Tog du nyligen examen inom maskinteknik och vill arbeta med framtidens stridsflygsystem? Saab söker nu en nyexaminerad mekanikkonstruktör med intresse för design.Rollen är kopplad till ett talangprogram som ger dig den ultimata övergången mellan studier och arbetsliv!
  
Att jobba som junior Mekanikkonstruktör hos Saab
  
Till ett av våra team söker vi nu en nyexaminerad mekanikkonstruktör som vill arbeta med attdesigna och ansvarar för systeminstallationer.Du kommer att erbjudas ett roligt och intressant jobb där du får vara med och designa kablage och mekaniska artiklar för installationen av hela elsystemet i flygplan. Du får dessutom möjlighet att tillsammans med kollegor driva förbättringar och utveckla vår metodik.
  
Du kommer att tillhöra ett team om ca 25 personer som tillhör området System Installation Design. Området ansvarar för systeminstallationen i Saabs flygande produkter, så som Gripen och T-7. Design finns i hela flygplanet, vilket leder till att du kommer skapa dig en bred produktkunskap och kommunicera mycket med andra områden inom affärsenheten Gripen.
  
Som konstruktör inom elinstallation kommer dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter innebära:
  
* Design av kablage och mekaniska delar i CATIA V5, från koncept till färdig produkt.• Tätt samarbete med andra konstruktörer,skrovkonstruktion, hållfasthet och produktionsteknik.• Studier för införande av ny funktionalitet i våra existerande produkter.• Support till produktion och våra kunder med operativa flygplan.


Rollen är placerad i Linköping.
  
Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos Saab, i Linköping med start under hösten. Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet,men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.
  
Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hos Saabsamt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos Saab.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

Är i början av din karriär och har enexamen i(t.ex. YH, Högskole- eller Civilingenjör i maskinteknik
  
Du är van att samarbeta med andra och har förmågan att kommunicera med både teammedlemmar och andra kollegor utanför din avdelning
  
Som person är du driven och har ett intresse av produktutveckling
  
Har goda kunskaper ikonstruktion eller tillverkning av kablage, mekanik, elektromekanik eller angränsande områden
  
Har goda kunskaper iinom CAD, företrädelsevis inom CATIA V5
  
Vi ser det som meriterande omdu bakgrund inom eller intresse av flyg
  
  

Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. Befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.Ansökan
  
Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan snarast möjligt. Om du har du frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta Tech Recruiter Johanna Norman på johanna.norman@nexergroup.com
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
  
  

Om Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.
  
Om Saab
  
Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga.

title: infrastructure for generative AI use cases on Microsoft Azure
description:
Job Description
Infra Engineer - infrastructure for generative AI use cases on Microsoft Azure  

Consultant´s Location: Stockholm, Sweden (Remote is allowed)  

Duration: 6 Months  



Responsibilities:


12+ years is required.


* Design, build, and maintain infrastructure for generative AI use cases on Microsoft Azure
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of infrastructure components
* Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaaC) best practices using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or Azure Resource Manager templates
* Manage and monitor network protocols, keys, encryption/decryption for secure data transmission
* Develop monitoring and alerting mechanisms to ensure the smooth functioning of the infrastructure
* Write scripts in Bash, Python, and Shell to automate repetitive tasks and improve efficiency
* Design, implement, and manage containerized environments using Docker and Kubernetes for scalable and efficient deployment of AI applications
* Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies related to generative AI, Azure cloud computing, Docker, and Kubernetes
* Provide technical guidance and support to team members


Experience with streaming systems MQ, Kafka , Azure Event Hubs


Requirements:


* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* 5+ years of experience as an Infrastructure Administrator with a focus on IaaC
* Proficient in Docker, and Kubernetes
* Strong knowledge of Microsoft Azure platform
* Strong understanding of container networking, storage, and security
* Proficiency in scripting languages like Bash, Python, and Shell
* Experience with networking protocols, encryption/decryption techniques, and secure data transmission
* Familiarity with monitoring tools like Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK Stack
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team
* Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms


Nice to have:


* Microsoft certified: Azure Administrator
  

  

  

  

  

  

  

About Company
Axiom is a global information technology, consulting and outsourcing company and services provider. Our IT solutions empower organizations and individuals throughout the world to maximize value and quality to succeed in today's challenging business environment. As a fast-growing new economy company, we focus our strengths to offer world-class solutions and services through the convergence of technology, innovation, expertise and experience. We provide software consulting, development and IT-enabled services to clients across the globe. We work towards delivering sustained value creation for customers, employees, industries and society at large. Core offerings include data warehousing, middleware development, product development and web-enablement of legacy applications in verticals like telecom, finance, healthcare, manufacturing, energy & utilities, retail & distribution, enablement of legacy Relentless exploration of technology horizons and a Global Delivery Model that is a judicious combination of onsite, offsite and offshore development, offer a complete range of high-ROI business solutions spanning the consulting, technology, operations and process outsourcing value chain.


We are committed to providing solutions that are simple to use and cost-effective, that meet the specific set of needs defined, and that are adaptable to meet future needs.


Our aim is to work in partnership with our clients to deliver innovative and tailored solutions. Listening to and understanding your issues To deliver benefit—rapidly—to our clients. To create a unique customer focus, both in our relationships with our clients and in our approach. To use our world beating, innovative applications and methodologies to deliver high business value to our clients. Attaining senior level commitment to your project. Collaborative working and transparency. Building the right team for the job. Regular communication and documentation. Respecting the knowledge and experience of your staf.

title: Software Release Engineer / Release Train Engineer
description:
Ängelholm On-site  



The Koenigsegg Software & Electronics department is responsible for designing and developing software, electronics and supporting tools for all Koenigsegg’s hyper cars. We are working very closely with the other engineering departments, production and service/aftersales. We are now looking to expand the team with a skilled and experienced Software Release Engineer to support and improve our rapid software development cycle. You will have the ability to affect the way we do things and improve our tools, build environment and the release process.


While the responsibilities associated with this position put a strong requirement on your ability to cooperate with other departments in other technical domains, it offers you a uniquely dynamic environment to push the capabilities of our release management to a new level. The development activities are primarily focused on the software release and configuration management.


**Responsibilities**


* Manage the software processes for configuration and release
* Lead the planning for releases together with the different software teams
* Manage the formal software releases for production and ensure their integrity by performing initial sanity tests
* Manage and improve our software tools, build environment, continuous integration setup
* Contribute in improving scripts for automation of the test and quality setup as well as the whole setup
* Participate in the development of our way of working

  
Skills & Requirements


**Need to have**


* A minimum of 3 years of proven experience in software release and configuration management
* Experience with complex software branching strategies
* Experience with build toolchains, git workflow, CI/CD, Jira, jenkins pipelines, bitbucket
* Good knowledge of scripting languages (bash, python)
* Good understanding of software development practices
* Willingness to learn new technologies
* High standards for code quality, maintainability, and performance
* Fluency in English (Swedish is not a requirement).


**Good to have**


* Experience with software testing methods, tools, and environments
* Experience with cloud infrastructure and tools, Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform
* Experience with Embedded software systems and Quality and safety standards like ASPICE, ISO 26262, etc.
* Experience with agile software development process
* Ability to work in a multi-tasking and dynamic ever-changing environment


**What we offer**


* Inspiring work with a small, agile cross-functional team of hardware engineers, application/UI software engineers, QA/Validation and designers
* Rare opportunity to impact a growing company, backed by Koenigsegg’s long track record of success and profitability
* Engaging and friendly work environment, guided by leadership with a strong vision
* Work alongside world-class talent in tech and automotive
* Quick decision making, flat hierarchy
Great Place to Work


Opportunity to impact a growing company


Work alongside world-class talent


Flexible work schedules + Culture of collaboration


Long track record of success and profitability


Engaging and sharing work environment


Quick decision making, flat hierarchy


About the company


Koenigsegg is most known for building some of the fastest cars in the world; with almost all of our megacar technologies that are patented and made in-house by our almost 500 world-class technicians, engineers, sourcing experts, production craftsmen, and communicators.


What we’ve created is a unique proving ground of engineering creativity that makes use of our breakthrough megacar development and legacy to push the boundaries of sustainable mobility technology.



So, what’s next?


We are on a universe-denting mission to develop the next generation of breakthrough tech and products. We are looking for outstanding, impactful, and authentic individuals to grow with us. Our ambitions are inspiring but will push the limits of what is possible – requiring one to work efficiently amid our cross-functional teams to execute at high-quality levels.


**The goal is clear: innovate and transform.**

title: Junior Mekanikkonstruktör till Saab i Linköping
description:
**Tog du nyligen examen inom maskinteknik och vill arbeta med framtidens stridsflygsystem? Saab söker nu en nyexaminerad mekanikkonstruktör med intresse för design.** **Rollen är kopplad till ett talangprogram som ger dig den ultimata övergången mellan studier och arbetsliv!**

**Att jobba som junior Mekanikkonstruktör hos Saab**

  

Till ett av våra team söker vi nu en nyexaminerad mekanikkonstruktör som vill arbeta med att designa och ansvarar för systeminstallationer. Du kommer att erbjudas ett roligt och intressant jobb där du får vara med och designa kablage och mekaniska artiklar för installationen av hela elsystemet i flygplan. Du får dessutom möjlighet att tillsammans med kollegor driva förbättringar och utveckla vår metodik.


Du kommer att tillhöra ett team om ca 25 personer som tillhör området System Installation Design. Området ansvarar för systeminstallationen i Saabs flygande produkter, så som Gripen och T-7. Design finns i hela flygplanet, vilket leder till att du kommer skapa dig en bred produktkunskap och kommunicera mycket med andra områden inom affärsenheten Gripen.


Som konstruktör inom elinstallation kommer dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter innebära:

* Design av kablage och mekaniska delar i CATIA V5, från koncept till färdig produkt.
* Tätt samarbete med andra konstruktörer, skrovkonstruktion, hållfasthet och produktionsteknik.
* Studier för införande av ny funktionalitet i våra existerande produkter.
* Support till produktion och våra kunder med operativa flygplan.


Rollen är placerad i Linköping.

 **Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent**

Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos Saab, i Linköping med start under hösten**.** Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet, men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.


Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hos Saab samt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos Saab.

**Vi söker dig som:**

  

* Är i början av din karriär och har en examen i (t.ex. YH, Högskole- eller Civilingenjör i maskinteknik
* Du är van att samarbeta med andra och har förmågan att kommunicera med både teammedlemmar och andra kollegor utanför din avdelning
* Som person är du driven och har ett intresse av produktutveckling
* Har goda kunskaper i konstruktion eller tillverkning av kablage, mekanik, elektromekanik eller angränsande områden
* Har goda kunskaper i inom CAD, företrädelsevis inom CATIA V5
* Vi ser det som meriterande om du bakgrund inom eller intresse av flyg


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. Befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.  

  

**Ansökan**

  

Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan snarast möjligt. Om du har du frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta Tech Recruiter Johanna Norman på johanna.norman@nexergroup.com


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

 **Om Nexer Tech Talent**

*Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent* *här**.*

 **Om Saab**


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.  

Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga.

title: Commercial Product Manager Cloud
description:
* Application Deadline: Oct. 13, 2024
* Multiple locations
* Hybrid
**Job Description**
-------------------


*If you are a commercial wizard with a desire to make an impact on the Swedish B2B market, look this way. As the Commercial Product Manager for Tele2 Cloud services within the B2B organization, you will be part of a team of highly skilled professionals on a quest to maximize customer value, based on our services, and financial growth. Sounds interesting? Please read on.*

  

**About the role**  

  

At Tele2 B2B (Business to business), we work every day to enable a society of unlimited possibilities through our broad portfolio of IT- and Telecom related Products and Services. With a team of knowledgeable experts, we help Private and Public customers to digitalize and secure their business potential. We are now looking for new members to join our successful team and contribute to our growth, superior customer experience and high employee engagement.

  

Purpose of the function  

As a Commercial Product Manager within Tele2 B2B organization, you will have the mandate, in close cooperation with other units within B2B organization, to excel the portfolio for Cloud services, focused on IaaS, Paas and Hybrid Cloud solutions, for Tele2 customers. In addition, you will also be Commercial Product Manager for the IT workplace services portfolio, including hardware, management and support, to Tele2 customers.


Your main contribution and responsibilities are;


* Own and maximize P&L performance for your product portfolio
* Own, develop and optimize the product portfolio
* Develop combined products with other adjacent portfolios such as networking and security
* Champion business growth and excellence through innovation in business models and proposition design
* Improve Tele2’s position on the market for Cloud and IT workplace services



Key Responsibilities in the role include


* P&L management, including budget, forecasting and follow-up for the product portfolios
* Evolve and establish a strong market position for Tele2 B2B Cloud and IT workplace services through own capabilities and selected partnerships
* Business steering and prioritization for Tele2 Cloud and IT workplace services
* Ownership of commercial product strategy development and detailing into roadmap execution
* Ownership of the business framework for Tele2 B2B Cloud and IT workplace services with focus on agreements, business rules, partnerships and business models
* Business casing and commercial/financial decision making
* Challenge status quo by innovation and development of Tele2 Cloud and IT workplace services
* Participate and support sales in customer engagements and dialogues



The preferred position is located in our headquarter in Kista, Stockholm or in our office in Gothenburg.

  

**Who are you?**



To thrive and succeed in this role we believe that you have...



* Strong commercial experience preferably within cloud services, specialized in IaaS, PaaS and Hybrid Cloud solutions, with focus on market positioning, partnerships and business development
* Strong business acumen with excellence in understanding revenue & cost dynamics in a complex business
* Strong product development skills with ability to take a business idea into a commercial product
* Proven track record of leading innovation that has generated tangible value for consumers
* Strong team-player and stakeholder management capabilities, with excellent communication skills to efficiently collaborate in a cross-functional environment, preferably gained from experience in a larger company
* Fluency in both Swedish and English, in written and spoken form
* Swedish citizenship



Nice to have:


* Experience in IT and telecoms sector
* Business and technical understanding in the domain of IT workplace services
* Technical understanding in the domain of IaaS, Paas and Hybrid Cloud
* High proficiency in quantitative tools, such as Microsoft Excel
* Ability to compile presentations for diverse set of stakeholders and higher management teams



Who we think you are as a person?  

We believe you are an individual with strong ambition to make a change. You are probably a forward thinker updated on the latest trends and market needs. In addition, you are a team player, business savvy and detailed oriented, all complemented with a drive to change the status quo and improve on past performances. You can present and communicate innovative ideas and complex matters in a way all types of stakeholders understand


**Great Place to Work**
-----------------------


* Pension and health care
* Hybrid and flexible work life balance
* Career opportunities
* Parental benefit
* Employee benefits and Tele2 discounts
* Inclusive workplace
* Stora utbildningsmöjligheter
* Tydliga karriärvägar och utvecklingsmöjligheter
* Lön och försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
* Generöst förmånspaket
* Inkluderande arbetskultur där alla är välkomna
* Rabatter på Tele2s produkter och tjänster
* Convenient parking next to our office in Kista
* Leading in technology
* Tjänstepension
* Möjlighet till interna karriärvägar och utveckling
* Lön och försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
* Inkluderande arbetskultur
* Rabatter på Tele2s produkter och tjänster
* Föräldralön
**Skills & Requirements**
-------------------------


**A few words from the manager Andreas Dahlqvist, Head of B2B UC & Hybrid Cloud**


*As the Commercial Product Manager you are the spider in the web for the Tele2 B2B Cloud and IT workplace business. As such, you thrive in a high-paced environment where excellent teamwork, and well-thought-out plans, are key to success. You relish the opportunity to own, expand and improve an already profitable business that enable Swedish companies and organizations to benefit from the power of cloud services*


*Both your manager and your managers-manager have held Commercial Product Manager roles in the past. That means you’ll have great support and experience to tap into. It’s also a testament to the career development potential inherent in this role.*

 **Why Tele2**


* We believe in fostering a creative and flexible work environment. You will be part of a culture where teamwork and inclusion are leading the way forward, a place where you bring your whole self to work as the unique person you are. We are committed to building a company that values diversity in all its forms.
* Every employee is important for the company’s success and you will always have an impact through your work with opportunities for growth and development through internal paths.
At Tele2, we work hard to our commitment to lead in sustainability, which has made us the number one climate leader in Europe and we keep reaching new goals as we are bound to shift to a circular economy.  
* 

**Interest and application**  

Would you like to be a part of the Tele2s value-driven and including culture? Then hit the “apply now” button and let’s find out if we’re a match! We want to create an inclusive culture where all forms of diversity are seen and for this position we are happy to see female applicants. At Tele2, we aim to build an inclusive company in a diverse world.


If you have any specific questions regarding the position, please feel free to contact TA specialist: [email protected]



Please note that in compliance with personal data management regulations (GDPR), we are unable to accept CVs via email.
  

As a step in the recruitment process, Tele2 performs a background check on final candidates.


**Work with great people**
--------------------------


Emma
Digital Capabilities & Technology
*"Everyone at Tele2 always aim for the stars in order to create unlimited possibilities."*
Marika
Head of IT Operational Excellence
*"We’re serious about what we do, and we get things done."*
Emma
Digital Capabilities & Technology
*"På Tele2 siktar vi högt för att skapa obegränsade möjligheter"*
Marika
Head of IT Operational Excellence
*"Vi är ambitiösa i det vi gör, och vi får saker gjorda."*
**About the company**
---------------------


At Tele2 we work hard to fulfill our commitment to lead in sustainability being named the number one climate leader in Europe by The Financial Times and we keep reaching new goals as we are bound to shift to a circular economy.


We take great pride in delivering customer value by being Reliable, Insight Driven and Collaborative. We call it the Tele2 Way.

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:
Are you passionate about technology and have a service-oriented mindset? Do you excel at problem-solving, take responsibility seriously, and thrive when tackling challenges alongside your colleagues? If so, continue reading!

**About the role**


As a Technical Support Specialist at Visma PubliTech, you'll be a member of a team of committed colleagues that share a passion for troubleshooting and solving problems. Your primary responsibility will be to provide technical support to our clients, which include municipalities and regions across Sweden.


In this role, your duties will centre around offering technical support and troubleshooting for our system for healthcare logistics, Sesam. This position is customer-centric, involving frequent interaction to ensure our clients receive the best possible assistance.


Your internal interactions include not only your immediate colleagues in the support team but also a broader collaboration with other teams in technology, product & development, and application consulting. Together, we are dedicated to ensuring our customers' satisfaction with our products, system solutions, and services.  

  

**Your primary tasks will include:**

* Troubleshoot and guide customers with questions and issues
* Perform version upgrades to ensure our customers are always on the latest and best developed version of the software
* Perform complete, accurate, and timely entry of information into Service Cloud (CRM) for all cases worked on by prioritising and classifying cases according to appropriate criticality
* Work continuously with improving our processes and contribute to upkeep our innovative mindset
* Prioritise high customer attendance and personal support to achieve best in class customer experience measured through tNPS
* Assist customers in shorter consulting assignments, enabling their IT to perform local installations such as server migrations, db back-ups etc.
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders and contribute to a knowledge sharing environment
* Contribute to our communication and development of Visma Community and participate in events and-or webinars when arranged.

The position is a permanent employment, with Stockholm or Malmö as the primary location since most team members are based there. However, for the right candidate, other locations may be considered.

**Who are we looking for?**


We are looking for someone who is analytical and skilled at problem-solving, with a passion for diving into complex issues. You are a team player and enjoy working collaboratively. Customer focus is important to you, and you understand the value of delivering quality. You enjoy guiding clients, are perceived as service-oriented, attentive, and reliable. Additionally, you communicate fluently in both Swedish and English, both verbally and in writing.

**Requirements and personal qualities**

* Higher education in IT or similar
* > 4 years of technical customer service experience
* Ability to work in a high pace and continuously changing environment
* High attention to detail and a sense of urgency
* Excellent troubleshooting and analytical skills
* Microsoft SQL Server
* Scripting in PowerShell
* Server infrastructure, Windows server
* Ability to decipher, analyze, and troubleshoot problems related to query execution

 **What can we offer you?**


Visma PubliTech is a company within the Visma group. We benefit from being a smaller, entrepreneurial company with close collaboration and a warm, family-like culture, while also being part of one of Europe's leading IT groups. Our vision is to empower the public sector with innovative solutions that contribute to maximised business benefits and a sustainable society.


We take immense pride in our high employee engagement, placing us in the top five percent in the tech industry!

**We love to hear your ideas:** You will become part of a culture where we encourage you to try new things, valuing your initiatives and perspectives.

**Flexibility at all stages of life**: We understand that you are more than just your job. It's important for us to offer you a good balance between leisure and work. We have a flexible hybrid model of working from home and in the office, based on needs and preferences.

**Above all, we are a team**: Team spirit is what allows us to keep our promises and deliver at a high level, but it's also what enables us to promote a sustainable corporate culture where we support and care for each other.

**Application**


To apply for this position, please use the link provided. We will review applications and invite candidates for interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to submit your application as soon as possible. If you have any questions or would like more information about the position, please contact Sara Mensi, Customer Success Manager, at sara.mensi@visma.com.


We look forward to receiving your application


Learn more about our Privacy Statement here: https://www.visma.com/privacy/.


  
Department
Customer Experience
Roll
Technical Support
Platser
Stockholm, Malmö
Distansarbete
Hybridarbete

Customer Support

5 oktober 2024

title: Software Embedded Engineer
description:
We are now looking for a driven and proactive embedded developer for our client’s behalf. You get to step into work life with exciting assignments. Examples of projects currently being conducted: development of autonomous vehicles, cloud-based services, embedded software development and artificial intelligence. We are looking for candidates who love challenging assignments, who is not afraid of networking and challenging each other. Besides being technically skilled, you probably also enjoy explaining to others how things work and help each other in a team. It’s key for you to enjoy a varied and a high work rate in the role as a software developer. The work is most often based on an agile approach and we believe that you have a deep understanding of the software development workflow and life cycle.

 **Your background**


To succeed in the role, we see that you have a degree in IT and 5 years or more of working experience within the software engineering/Automotive industry. The service requires that you have a wide range of skills ranging from practical development to the mentioned skills below.

  

* Design and implementation of new products in cooperation with electronic engineers
* Experience of C and C++ in an embedded, real-time, resource constrained device
* Experience in writing software for embedded systems
* Knowledge of Unix-based operating systems and the GCC toolchain
* Proven problem solving ability
* Knowledge of CI/CD, Jenkins, Yocto, Bitbucket, GIT, Artifactory
* Communication protocols e.g. CAN (CANoe, CANdela, CANalyser), LIN, FlexRay
* Knowledge of the Qt Application Framework
* Knowledge of modern user interface concepts
* Create prototypes that connect to either new or existing physical components
* Quick mock-ups using e.g. Arduino, Raspberry Pi
* Integrate with various cloud services via HTTP, TCP/IP, MQTT, etc

  

Personal characteristics

  

As a developer, it is highly important that you have a flexible and solution-oriented approach. You are communicative and strongly driven. Furthermore, you are result-oriented and want to work towards concrete goals to contribute to the team success. We believe you are an analytical team member and well experienced within information presentation. You show a can-do attitude and are not afraid of taking responsibility to solve tricky problems. It is meritorious if you have an interest and experience in new technology.

title: Property Systems Support Specialist
description:
**Hotel Distribution Systems, Connectivity and Customer Service are no alien words to you?**
 Join BWH Hotels, where we celebrate what makes each of our hotels unique and the special experiences they offer. As a global hotel chain, we are all about going the extra mile to support our hotels and help them to deliver top-notch guest experiences.
   

  

 Right now, we are looking for a service-savvy superstar who is eager to help our hotels conquer the world of Property and Distribution Systems.
   

  

 If you thrive on making a difference, value personalized service and have a passion for all types of systems we want you to become our next
 **Property Systems Support Specialist.**
**Do you have previous experience with reservations and booking systems and are you now ready to take the next step by supporting and navigating our hotels through the maze of Systems? Would you like to describe yourself as hands-on and pro-active?**
 If the answer is Yes – look no further and apply to become BWH’s next
 **Property Systems Support Specialist** 
 .
   

  

 As
 **Property Systems Support Specialist** 
 you are part of the Technology and Distribution Team based in Stockholm.
   

  

 As a person you are a creative problem solver, and you have a passion for all types of systems.
   

  

 You are someone who naturally likes to find solutions, has no difficulty in connecting the dots and likes to help people in any way. In your view, obstacles are only opportunities in disguise.
   

  

 You enjoy working as part of a dynamic team which not only strives to succeed but also values collaboration and celebrates achievements together. You are a team player, pro-active and you like to go the extra mile.
   

  

**Your superpowers**
* 2-3 years’ experience in hotel operations / hotel reservations and/front office or booking systems
* In depth knowledge of at least one PMS system: Opera | Opera Cloud, Hotsoft, Suite8 or Mews
* Experience in a helpdesk or customer/guest service environment
* Confident to set up and hold training and webinars for our hotels
* Communicate fluently in Swedish and English


**Your tasks as a Property Systems Support Specialist**
* Provide day-to-day support to hotels with any questions related to property and distribution systems
* Play a supporting role during the onboarding of a new BWH franchise property or PMS and complete distribution related tasks during the integration phase of a new Hotel/PMS
* Facilitate and hold trainings/webinars and be the hotel’s go-to person during the first months as a BWH franchise property
* Continually observe day-to-day system status and assure BWH hotels are bookable in all BWH systems and booking channels (OTA, GDS, Brand Web, Direct Connects)
* Assists in the development and documentation of standard operating procedures (SOPs), work instructions, training materials, and checklists
* Take ownership of assigned products and projects


**BWH Hotels Scandinavia** 
**–** 
**local gems everywhere in Scandinavia**
 BWH Hotels is a leading global hotel network consisting of three hotel chains – WorldHotels Collection, Best Western Hotels & Resorts, and SureStay Hotel Group.
   

  

 Best Western Hotels & Resorts (BWHR) is an iconic hotel chain with over 70 years of experience. Today, BWHR comprises 10 brands with 3- and 4-star hotels. To enhance its offerings, SureStay Hotel Group was also created, featuring three brands in the economy segment.
   

  

 WorldHotels boasts an incredible collection of hotels and resorts in various destinations worldwide, spanning the exclusive and luxurious segments. The acquisition of WorldHotels creates a hotel portfolio with options in every market segment – from economy to luxury.
   

  

 BWH Hotels acts as an umbrella organization for the 18 different brands. This establishes a global network of approximately 4,300 hotels in nearly 100 countries around the world.

description:

 Som Cloudspecialist Azure på SIS IT får du ett helhetsansvar för vår IT-infrastruktur och du får arbeta med moderna och innovativa lösningar i Microsofts molntjänster. title: Snr Customer Success Manager - Cyber Security, pre-IPO, SaaS, Stockholm, Sweden
description:
**Snr Customer Success Manager – Cyber Security, pre-IPO, SaaS, Stockholm, Sweden** 




  





 My client is leading Cyber Security vendor who are expanding their Customer Success team in Europe. We are looking for a Swedish speaker to be based in the Stockholm to cover the region and customers.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* As a Senior Customer Success Manager, you will be responsible for all post sales activities including adoption/onboarding, retention, and growth within our strategic accounts.
* Develop and maintain key relationships with stakeholders across your account base
* You will be responsible for driving customer adoption, identifying, and mitigating potential roadblocks with subscription renewals, and performing system and process health checks to maximise the value customers receive from the platform
* Build a strategic roadmap for every customer that defines how they should consume and adopt the products to meet their desired outcomes
* Be the voice of the customer internally, including feeding customer priorities into the Product team for issues and enhancements
* Work with the Account Executive, Solutions Engineering and Product teams to retain a strong service offering and deliver the best experience possible to their customers



  





**Requirements** 



* 5+ years of experience in customer success, technical account management, Professional Services, or related, customer-facing role
* Ideally you will have worked within the Cyber Security or Enterprise SaaS environment
* Proven ability to build trust and communicate effectively with C-Suite, VP, and Director-level contacts, along with day-to-day users of the platform
* Excellent communication skills verbal, written and presentation
* Detail-oriented with the ability to set priorities and be flexible in an ever-changing environment



  





**To apply please send your CV to waquas@wmtech.io** 




  





**WMTech** 




 WMTech is trusted by leaders in the Cyber Security, AI and Enterprise Software sectors to advise on talent strategy specifically for Start-Ups. Our clients are heavily VC backed, unicorn status, pre-IPO start-ups with pioneering technology.
 



  





*WMTech is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate in employment on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy and gender identity), national origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, genetic information, age, membership in an employee organization, retaliation, parental status, military service, or other non-merit factor.*

title: IT Service Manager, Applications, Solna
description:
*Do you want to be part of a dynamic and rapidly changing environment at Postnord IT Workplace department. If you have experience of Managerial role/s and background around Application Service Management or very similar this is the job for you!*
*We are seeking a person with relevant experience that is interested in processes and standardization and enjoy driving continuous improvements?*
 Join us
   

  

 The Workplace department today has around 15 team members who are responsible for Postnord’s IT Workplace for both administration and production workforce.
   

  

 The Workplace technologies are constantly evolving and we always aim for secure, reliable and user friendly services. In our work we continuously keep an eye on Postnord’s overall vision and strategies to ensure our services enable and support the company’s market positioning.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 In the role as IT Service Manager for Applications, you will be working with both strategic, tactical and operational duties around Application Management.
   

  

 The role is on senior level and among other things working with:
   

  

* Manage IT's application portfolio and it's lifecycle.
* Work with application owner community to ensure updates are made in the portfolio and when relevant explain or refresh the application management roles and responsibilities.
* Support stakeholders that need help or guidance around application management and application packaging services.
* Manage the lifecycle of Workplace common core applications including collaboration with stakeholders and communication, as well as ensuring that the expectations and feedback of the users, customers, and sponsors are met and addressed.
* Work closely with the Service Manager for User Experience and ensure the IT knowledge and end-user instructions are up to date and available.
* Budget, follow-up and forecasting according to internal standards and expectations.
* Collaborate and support the other Service and Platform Managers within the Workplace unit.
* Collaboration outside Workplace, both with internal and external work areas around Software Asset Management.
* Stay up to date on IT market trends and innovation.


 We are looking for you who have
   

  

* At least three years of experience in managing software applications and services, preferably in a large and complex environment.
* Experience and knowledge of the application domain, technologies such as application packaging and automatization for installation, methodologies, and best practices.
* General Subject Matter expert of the Application Management area.
* Basic understanding of ITIL framework
* Fluent English, both spoken and written
* Fluent Swedish or Danish, both spoken and written


 We believe you are a person that is thorough, analytical and easy to get acquainted with and learn new systems. Your way of working is inclusive, structured and responsible.
   

  

 You need to be able to handle stressful situations and prioritize job tasks independently. You are communicative and easy to collaborate with, and are diplomatic in your way of creating and nurturing long-term relationships.
   

  

 Additionally, you have previous experience of systems like Service Management Tooling, MS 365 Office applications, Power BI and other tools required for Business Planning (budget, follow-up, forecast), SNOW and Intune.
   

  

 It is an advantage if you have previous experience from working in an IT senior managerial role and is used to coach and guide others around the solution area where you are the expert.
   

  

**We Offer You**
 We offer a role that is part of our dynamic team including Service Managers, Engineers respectively a Chief Architect. The roles in Workplace are dedicated to certain solutions areas and are responsible for governing outsourced Workplace services and/or some of the internally managed services. The daily work varies in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


 We make everyday life easier
   

  

 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com
   

  

 Apply
   

  

 We look forward to receive your application!
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Susanne Wetterstrand on phone number: +46 72-585 32 85.
   

  

 Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga

title: Program Manager to SEB Group | SEB, Solna
description:
We are seeking a skilled and high performing Program Manager to lead exiting and complex programs at SEB. You will play a pivotal role in leading SEB programs targeting digitalization, new and improved products, staying compliant with emerging regulations and much more.
   

  

**About the job:**
 The market we operate in and the world around us is rapidly changing. We thrive to be on top of the emerging trends and developments by adapting our financial solutions to our customers. We’re leading projects cross the bank, in an agile environment, to ensure our transformation journeys that will future proof the bank.
   

  

 You will be long to the central project team within Group CIO, which focuses on technology to ensure the future of banking, with a forward-leaning mind-set and work in areas such as Cloud, Artificial Intelligence, and data management.
   

  

**Role responsibilities includes;**
* Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of large-scale programs, managing dependencies and risk efficiently
* Securing the right prioritization, coordinating the project´s progress and proactively identify and address impediments to ensure delivery
* Lead and interact with stakeholders, vendors and partners
* Collaborate with a project sponsor, usually a senior business manager
* Utilize agile frameworks, to guide and coach teams to achieve their full potential


**Qualifications needed to succeed in this role;**
* Demonstrated success in delivering large-scale programs
* 10+ years of experience of leading change as a Program Manager or similar leading role
* Ability to navigate complex organizational structures and drive consensus
* Strong understanding and application of Scaled agile principles and practices
* Exceptional leadership and communication skills, have the ability to inspire, motivate teams and build your own network
* A background from the Finance business is seen as an advantage


**What we offer:**
* Make a lasting impact by leading prioritized programs that are important to future proof the bank
* Opportunities for professional growth and development
* Be a part of a great, professional, and welcoming team. Most of your colleagues are very experienced Project and Program Managers but there are also a few more junior colleagues.
* You will have the possibility to contribute to the development of methodology and ways of working to continuously improve our way of delivering on SEB’s vision


 This is a full-time employment positioned in Arenastaden, Stockholm.
   

  

**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

**Welcome with your application**
 Attach your CV and a short personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to this role. We select candidates on running basis, so feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2024-10-02. If you have questions about the position, please contact Elina Burvall, Head of Group CIO Project Management, by e-mail elina.burvall @seb.se
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Gruppchef Engineering
description:
**En ögonblicksbild av din dag**
 Vi söker en gruppchef som brinner för automation, digitalisering, drivteknik och kompetensutveckling. Du arbetar i teknikens framkant och leder ditt team mot framgång i spännande projekt.
   

  

**Hur Du kommer att påverka**
* Du har kvalitetsansvar för det arbete som utförs inom ansvarsområdet.
* Bevaka utvecklingen internt och externt inom området, samt behålla och utveckla en hög kompetens genom en kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och rekrytering.
* Du deltar aktivt i olika forum för att styra och koordinera aktiviteterna inom ditt ansvarsområde samt nätverkar inom teknikområdet gentemot huvudkontoret.
* Du stödjer produktansvariga Lead Engineers för respektive teknikområde.
* Du kommer ha en delad roll som gruppchef samt operativt arbete.


**Vad Du medför**
* Vi söker dig som är drivande och är intresserad av ledarskap och som kan engagera och entusiasmera dina medarbetare
* Du har en relevant utbildning och kompetens för tjänsten, civilingenjör eller högskoleingenjör inom datateknik/automation och flera års erfarenhet inom området.
* Arbetslivserfarenhet inom tillverknings- och processindustri är meriterande
* Du har god analytisk förmåga samt ett noggrant och strukturerat arbetssätt. Du är initiativrik, har lätt för att knyta kontakter och att samarbeta internt och externt samt globalt inom Siemens Energy.


**Om Teamet**
* Gruppen arbetar med projektleveranser till svensk tillverknings- och processindustri och ansvarar för projektering, utveckling, programmering och avprovning baserat på Siemens automationssystem (t.ex Simatic PCS7, WinCC, Sipaper).
* Branschen står på tröskeln för att ta nästa steg inom digitalisering. Allt ifrån Digital Twin, Process Simulation, Digital Engineering, Industrial Cloud Services och Mobile Solutions diskuteras för industriell miljö.
* Du kommer att leda och utveckla personalen inom ansvarsområdet.
* Du kommer att ingå i en ledningsgrupp som arbetar med att driva och förbättra projektgenomförandet.


 Inom divisionen
 **Transformation of Industry** 
 minskar vi koldioxidutsläppen för industrisektorn. Vi ser en ökad efterfrågan på grön vätgas och bränslederivat för att stötta en ökad elektrifiering och effektivitet. Med en stark industriell kundbas, ett globalt nätverk, ett flertal olika teknologier och integrerade kapaciteter för dess utförande, skapar vi förutsättningar för utfasning av fossila bränslen och övergång till hållbara processer inom industrin.
   

  

 Vi kan erbjuda dig förmånliga anställningsförmåner såsom arbetstidsförkortning, förskottssemester, friskvårdsbidrag och ev. möjlighet till flexibel arbetsplats.
   

  

**Vilka är Siemens Energy?**
 På Siemens Energy är vi mer än bara ett energiteknikföretag. Vi möter den ökade efterfrågan på energi i mer än 90 länder samtidigt som vi bidrar till att skydda vårt klimat. Med fler än 94,000 engagerade anställda genererar vi inte bara elektricitet till mer än 16% av världens befolkning, utan vi använder också vår teknologi för att skydda människor och miljön.
   

  

 Vårt globala team är engagerar sig i att göra hållbar, pålitlig och ekonomiskt överkomlig energi till verklighet genom att tänja på gränserna för vad som är möjligt. Vi förvaltar ett 150-årigt arv av innovation som uppmuntrar oss att söka efter personer som stödjer vårt fokus på reducering av koldioxidutsläpp, nya teknologier och energiomvandling.
   

  

 Hur kan du göra skillnad på Siemens Energy? Titta här: https://www.siemens-energy.com/employeevideo
   

  

**Vårt engagemang för mångfald**
 Som tur är, så är vi alla olika. Genom mångfald genererar vi kraft. Vi drivs framåt av inkludering och vår gemensamma kreativa energi kommer från ca 130 olika nationaliteter. På Siemens Energy ser vi mångfald som något självklart - oavsett etnisk bakgrund, kön, ålder, religion, identitet eller funktionsvariation. Vi ger samhället energi, hela samhället, och vi diskriminerar inte utifrån våra olikheter.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Tveka inte – skicka in din ansökan via https://jobs.siemens-energy.com/en\_US/jobs, id nr 256882 senast 2024-09-01
   

  

 Löpande urval tillämpas, tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten kan du kontakta rekryterande chef Marianna Blomqvist på marianna.blomqvist@siemens-energy.com eller tel. 0707281415
   

  

 För frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Shannen Foley på shannen.foley.ext@siemens-energy.com.
   

  

 Vi undanber oss all kontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag, eller annonsförmedlare.
   

  

 Placeringsort: Solna
   

  

**Fackliga representanter:**
 Anders Häll, Unionen, +46122-887514
   

  

 Simon Von Eckardstein, Sveriges Ingenjörer, +46122-842 24
   

  

 Jan Lundgren, Ledarna, +46122-812 33
   

  

 Mikael Malmgren, IF Metall, +4676-6958685

title: Solution Architect, Solna / Hybrid
description:
Do you want to be part of a dynamic and rapidly changing environment at one of the Nordic region's largest companies? If you have a strong background within the area of Service Management and Agile development, this is the place to be.
   

  

**Join Us**
 The team responsible for the Atlassian tool suite in PostNord is expanding. Facing more than 30.000 users in the Nordic Countries including subsidiaries and thousands of agents within IT and Business units. Supporting the organization with an efficient and reliable platform including large automation capabilities and an expanding scope. Connect the worlds of Service Management and Agile development. Join the team to be a part of this exciting journey. Our work environment is flexible, offering a hybrid working model with 50 percent remote work.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 In the role of Solution Architect, you will be responsible for the following:
   

  

* Define and align the architectural framework in collaboration with stakeholders, ensuring it aligns with business goals. Ensuring compliance with industry standards and best practices.
* Align teams to a shared technical direction and partner with them in elaborating the solution, validating technology assumptions, and evaluating implementation alternatives.
* Ideate and create enablers to evolve the technical landscape, fostering adaptive design and engineering practices.
* Collaborate closely with Enterprise and System Architects to address architectural concerns at respective levels.
* Collaborate with team, Product Owner, Tech Lead to anchor the architectural framework. Establish governance structure with architectural principles and standards to be followed within the tool’s ecosystem.
* Ensure systems compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, safeguarding data privacy and security.


**You will work with:**
* An Agile team with technical and business-oriented roles overseeing the Atlassian tool suite.
* SAFe practices, taking part in relevant ceremonies with the team and in the ART.
* A network of architects and related roles.
* Collaborating with stakeholders from business as well as IT in understanding their requirements.
* Collaborating with partners and suppliers to have the latest insights.


**We are looking for you who have**
* Strong communication skills, able to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
* Extensive experience with service management and agile development tools. Such as Atlassian suite (Jira, Confluence and BitBucket).
* Proven experience in designing and implementing complex solutions.
* At least 5 years of experience in IT Service Management, preferably ITIL. Experience working in agile environments, preferably within the SAFe framework.
* At least a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Good verbal and written skills in both Swedish and English.


**We offer you:**
**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at group.postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receive your application!
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns, please e-mail johan.lovblad@postnord.com .
   

  

 Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: group.
 **postnord** 
 .com/sv/karriar2/fragor-och-svar/facklig-kontakt/
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Säkerhetskonsult inom Microsofts
description:
**Vi kan vara ditt nästa karriärsteg!**
 Din roll hos oss:
   

  

 Som säkerhetskonsult får du chansen att arbeta med några av Sveriges mest intressanta kunder och deras komplexa IT-miljöer. Du kommer att spela en central roll i att säkerställa och förbättra deras säkerhetslösningar inom Microsofts ekosystem.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av arbete med Microsoft 365 eller Azure.
* Bakgrund inom compliance och informationssäkerhet.
* Grundläggande kunskaper om Azure, Power Platform och systemutveckling.
* Förståelse för molntjänster och Microsoft 365.
* Förmåga att kommunicera väl på svenska i både tal och skrift.


 För att lyckas i denna roll bör du vara en kommunikativ och driven individ som trivs med att lösa problem och som kan ta egna initiativ.
   

  

 Om B3 Cloud:
   

  

 Som experter på molnteknik och den digitala arbetsplatsen av morgondagen, hjälper vi våra kunder att transformera sin infrastruktur från traditionell till molnbaserad. Vi stödjer kunderna genom hela processen, från analys och planering till migrering och förvaltning. Vi är också en viktig del i att skapa en modern arbetsplats med Microsoft 365, och är stolta över att vara både Guldpartner och Cloud Service Provider (CSP) för Microsoft.
   

  

 På B3 Cloud är det viktigt att ha roligt på jobbet. Vi bygger en stark företagskultur med fokus på wellness, frihet och balans i livet. Vi erbjuder en attraktiv ersättningsmodell som ger stor frihet för allt från uppdrag till ledighet och kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 Intresserad? Känner du att denna roll skulle kunna vara ditt nästa karriärsteg? Skicka din ansökan idag! Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Melinda på melinda.andersson@b3.se.
   

  

**Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!**
*B3 Cloud är en del av B3-koncernen, utsedd till Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work och till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord: erfarenhet, olikheter och energi. Vi jobbar för hållbarhet i alla led och tror att välmående medarbetare presterar bättre. Därför arrangerar vi regelbundna wellness-aktiviteter, från yoga och simning till musikquiz, stickcafé och föreläsningar om stress och mental hälsa."*

title: Product Owner
description:
Bannerflow is a fast-growing company transforming the Ad Tech industry. Delivering over 15 billion ads monthly worldwide, our platform empowers enterprise brands to create in-house advertising at scale, making the process seamless and user-friendly.
   

  

 ⭐
 **Ready for a new challenge? Here is what we offer** 
**:**
* Flexible & autonomous teams, built on trust. At Bannerflow, we empower our teams to make decisions and take ownership. We foster a culture of trust, where collaboration and open communication are at the core of everything we do.
* New challenges and personal growth. We embrace our entrepreneurial spirit by taking risks, identifying opportunities, and constantly seeking innovative solutions.
* A passionate and fun culture. We love what we do, and we believe in having fun while doing it. Our workplace is diverse, inclusive, and filled with exciting activities — from hackathons to team activities, company trips, and even board game nights. At Bannerflow, creativity and success go hand in hand with a lot of fun.
* A stable, global leader with a constantly evolving Product Based in Stockholm, Bannerflow is a well-established company with a solid financial foundation and a rapidly growing international customer base. Our product is continuously evolving to meet the shifting needs of our customers, and we are committed to expanding into new markets with ambitious growth goals.


**🦋 Are you + Bannerflow = true?**
 We are seeking an experienced and driven Product Owner to join one of our agile feature teams.
   

  

 In this role, you will break down the product vision and roadmap into actionable deliverables, taking full ownership of the backlog. You will prioritize and prepare user stories with clear acceptance criteria to guide your development team. Collaboration is key, and you will work closely with cross-functional teams, other Product Owners, and Engineering Managers. Your contribution will be vital in fostering a highly efficient and motivated team where everyone feels a strong sense of purpose.
   

  

 Additionally, you will serve as the voice of the customer and domain expert within your area, ensuring that development aligns with user needs and expectations. You will contribute to key product metrics, such as feature adoption and usage, to measure the impact of your work and guide future development. Furthermore, you will share best practices through support articles, onboarding presentations, and tips, driving adoption and usage of your features.
   

  

**So, what are we looking for?**
* 3+ years of experience working with software products, ideally within a SaaS environment, with additional experience in the advertising industry being a plus.
* A strong sense of ownership and personal drive to create impactful products.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills — you thrive in a team environment and know how to bring people together to achieve great things.
* Experience in managing backlogs and making tough product decisions while balancing innovation and speed.
* A passion for understanding user needs and translating them into effective solutions.
* An ability to navigate a rapidly changing environment, staying adaptable and proactive.


 We believe that our employees are the key to our success and we are dedicated to building a positive and supportive work environment where our employees can thrive and grow. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities. To support our employees, we offer a competitive compensation package and inclusive benefits, including pension (ITP1), healthcare insurance, and parental leave top-up.
   

  

**If you’re ready to take your career to the next level and be a part of our exciting journey, we want to hear from you!**

title: Junior SAP Data Consultant
description:
Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.
   

  

 We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.
   

  

 “Across the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.” –
 **Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO.**
**About our Nordic SAP Business Group:**
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP transformation programs with some of the biggest companies.
   

  

 Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP and SAP RISE.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking for candidates on several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**SAP Data Nordic Value Tower:**
 Within the SAP Value Tower Data, we offer you the opportunity to work with SAP Data and to grow your knowledge within the area of Information Management, connected to SAP MDG, Master Data Management and Data Migration.
